story:
Introducing the KAZOO D1. It’s not only a mini wireless iron, it’s a lint remover and portable charger. Compact and lightweight, you can take it wherever you go. Keep your clothes clean and flat anytime, anyplace. Make the memories from your travels wrinkle-free ones.

 

The last thing an iron needs is wires getting in the way. Take KAZOO D1 out of the house with confidence and without cords. It’s convenient, straightforward, and makes your clothes look dynamite. Now, a neat and clean appearance can always be yours.

KAZOO D1 offers two temperature options (120°C, 170°C), suitable for ironing different fabrics. It has a stable heat output and rapid 30-seconds heating that remains strong - keeping your clothes flat long after ironing. We know you’re on the go, so KAZOO D1 is designed to make it quick.

 

KAZOO D1 is equipped with a common three-leaf blade design, like razors. The knife net is only 0.15mm, which removes all the hairballs to the greatest extent without damaging the clothes. Result: your clothes look like new, whether it’s a sweater, wool coat, or t-shirt.

 

As an awesome added feature, KAZOO D1 can also be used as a mobile power bank. It has the power to fully charge an iPhone 8 three times and an iPhone 12 twice. It’s great for your clothes and a clutch emergency helper for your mobile devices. It just might become your best travel friend.

 

Being just the length of an iPhone makes KAZOO D1 suitable for any portable storage: backpacks, messenger bags, suitcases. And the ultra-lightweight design is equivalent to carrying around a headset like AirPods Max. Unburden your travels.

With KAZOO D1’s power, you can iron up to 20 pieces of attire, solve the hairball problem of 1,000 items of clothing, and power up 2 mobile phone batteries, before you need to charge it again. 

 

KAZOO’s one-touch activation button lets you easily switch between iron and lint remover. Simplicity and control.

 

KAZOO D1 is equipped with silicone heat insulation pads, which can effectively protect both your skin and clothing from burns. It’s just a simple set you can take out at any time. When the iron is not in use after pressing the close button, power will cut off automatically after 20 seconds - preventing burns caused by misoperation.

 

 

 

 

We are a professional team consisting of R&D personnel, engineers, product managers, marketers, publicity planning experts, and others. It is a skilled collective integrating R&D, production, sales, and after-sales service.

We focus our attention on clothing care and surrounding areas, with precise insight and professional technical support. We commit to bringing solutions to more clothing problems.

With our own R&D room, more than 100 electrical appliances, and related science professionals at home and abroad, we are using professional theoretical foundations and unconstrained creativity to continuously gain insight into user needs and polish products that can change our lives. At present, in the field of clothing and care, we have more than 300 new national and international patents, providing solid technical support for solving the world’s clothing problems.

story: The campaign has now ended.
story_txt: The campaign has now ended.

story:
Slim is not only about the figure. It means saving space for things that are more valuable to you. 

We want to save your air AND your precious space. 

* The following screen is optimized for desktop.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We wanted to change the mechanical appearance of air purifiers. To overcome this artificiality, we studied the opposite: designs that look natural and focus on the essence of what the product does.

Since air purifiers tend to stay in one place, they should blend into their surroundings.

Nature is the world’s air purifier, so natural, Scandinavian design was our biggest inspiration.

 

 

 

 

 

 

In 2018, we started collecting images and words from our two sources (nature and Scandinavian design) to sketch our plans.

Luckily, we met a young design team in Denmark, and our global project was born.

Finally, we hit upon the perfect design that combines our nature-inspired shape with the Scandinavian style…

…and we named it Löv.

 

 

 

 

 

 

To analyze how consumers use air purifiers in their real life and which functions they need the most, we visited numerous furniture and interior design showrooms, exhibitions, and consumers’ houses.

 

So, we thought it would be great if an air purifier could be adjusted to suit different spaces and situations while, of course, maintaining its beauty as well.

 

 

 

With a one-touch cradle dis/assembly, you can change your Löv to be positioned any way you want.

 

 

Whether you change your furniture, room, house—or even just your mood—Löv is there to match your needs.

 

 

 

 

 

This problem is not yours alone. That’s why we made Löv: to bring freedom to your precious space.

"Slim" means something more special.

Löv helps you to save space for things that are valuable to you, like another plant in your small apartment or maybe some more toys in the children's room.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We rearranged the inlet, fan, and outlet to enable the slim profile. Then, we patented Löv technology, which combines high performance with a narrow profile. 

 

 

 

To develop this innovative FAN blade, we went through countless CFD [Computational Fluid Dynamics], including Flow simulations of Solidworks and ANSYS Fluent program, to make it withstand the pressure of the filter within the set width and noise limit.

 

 

 

The Central Air Guide, which also got a patent, reduces the pressure drop of the airflow coming out from several fans, which provides soft and wide air and eventually cuts the noise as well. By making samples with a 3D printer and CNC machine and testing them, we determined the optimal structure for the air guide.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

This compact body shoots out about 25 single cubic meter boxes of clean air in just 10 minutes.

*This is an estimated performance, which is planned for KS official standard test.

 

 

 

 

We removed all the distracting functions, so we can focus more on the things that matter most.

 

 

Fine dust concentration is displayed in both numbers and 4 different levels of colors. This Auto Mode helps you to check how well the air purifier is working without needing an extra device.

When the device is used horizontally, the display changes to be horizontal as well.

 

 

According to the graph above, Löv’s laser dust sensor produces exactly the same air measurement value as other professional dust measuring devices. These devices are normally more than $100, making Löv both beautiful and economical.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Komma is the same word as “Comma” in Nordic countries. Our aim is to change home appliance paradigms by creating a beautiful Interior object that is both functional and beautiful. Your precious backing will be an essential step to realizing this goal and enabling more innovative home appliances to be born.

 

 

 

 

We pursue global cooperation to reach our goal. With a young design team in Denmark and partners from top-notch Korean electronics corporations, such as Samsung and LG, we obtained high technology and design standards.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

No project is without risk and challenges, but we do our absolute best to minimize them. If there is any small problem during the process, we promise to keep you informed.  

About Covid-19 
Our manufactures are mostly in Korea, and they are operating well these days. Also, supply chain formation from abroad and factory inspection are all prepared and finished. Therefore, there is a low risk of delay because of Coronavirus and quarantine. 

Production 
We are finally ready to get down to making molds after constant tests of numerous prototypes to make the perfect fan and blade. Still, we are aware of the risks involved in such projects. Therefore, we minimized the risks as much as we could by preparing all the modules and finishing the quality control before the campaign. 

Remote Control Batteries 
According to the shipping option, a few countries might not receive the remote control battery, R2025 3V coin battery (about 1 dollar/count in Amazon. We will definitely inform you in this case.  

Shipping & Tariff
If your country is not on the list, please let us know. It might not be on the list because of the shipping fee, so we will consider and write you back if we can add it. The HS CODE of an air purifier is 8421.39. 

According to the Korea Customs Service, the current tariff of the product is as follows: 

USA: free 
Europe: free 
Japan: free 
Taiwan: free  
Australia: 5% 
Singapore: free 
India: 5% 

However, please double check in advance since this can be changed. In addition, please note that VAT or other taxes applicable to your region might be charged by the law of each country. We promise to keep you informed every step of the way so that you don’t have to worry about the long shipping from Korea.  

We are committed to providing updates and support to our backers throughout the whole process. If you have any suggestion or feedback, feel free to reach us at hello@komma.kr

story:
Pre-order Lua

Notify When Available

 

You can set up an alert that will notify you when Lua is back in stock and will be available to be purchased:

https://mu-design.lu/preorder-lua

 

 


Your plant has its needs but it can’t communicate them to you.

Lua turns your favorite plant into a spirited virtual pet! It's the perfect addition to your inner garden houseplants: its lively personality makes it the ideal plant companion.

 

Stretch Goals:

  • €50k ✓ =  Water reservoir sub-irrigation system. It means less frequent watering and your plant receives all the water it needs automatically. When Lua is thirsty = reservoir is empty; Lua is sick = reservoir is full.
  • €100k ✓ = Standard QI wireless power transfer

You will be able to choose your color after the end of the campaign.

 

 

Lua saves your greenery and makes you skip the hassle of an intricate setup: the free mobile app only requires an internet connection once for the download, and is then operational, even offline! Using Lua’s app is literally as simple as scanning a QR code!

  • Lua displays 15 different real-time animations:

 

6 animations are directly related to your plant’s health and overall well-being, while the 9 others give Lua and your plant, a spark of life.

 

6 essential animations:

 Thirsty: When soil moisture drops under the defined threshold, you need to water your plant.

 Sick: Too much water can kill your plant too, wait until Lua is thirsty to add water.

 Vampire: After a few days Lua will turn into a vampire if exposure to light is not sufficient.

 Squint: Too much exposure to light can harm your plant, when Lua is squinting it’s looking for shade.

 Cold: When the temperature drops. Lua will sneeze the day after.

 Hot: Lua is too hot.

Other animations:

 Happy: Lua is back to normal.

 Puzzled: Lua couldn’t read your QR code.

 Wink: You showed a QR code to Lua and it understood it.

 Tired: Lua will go back to sleep when there’s no movement in front of it.

 Wake-up: When Lua senses a movement.

 Grumpy: Random animation. If stretch goal #2 is reached, Lua will look grumpy when there’s a good chance of rain.

 Tongue sticking out: Random animation.

 

Motion tracking feature:

Lua detects a movement and follows it with the eyes. If nothing happens, Lua will go back to sleep.

 

 

The app has been entirely designed around simplicity and ease-of-use:

  1. Download Lua app & let the easy setup install it in less than no time.
  2. Choose your plant’s family, the exact type of plant or manually set your own preferred thresholds. 
  3. Make Lua read the generated QR code and it’s all set!

 

The app lets you browse your plant’s category and type, then generates a QR code holding info specific to your plant. Lua reads the QR code generated on your device’s screen and sets the parameters.

The app allows you to change Lua’s facial proportions and automatically adapts the animations accordingly. 

The motion sensor allows Lua’s eyes to follow the movement in front of them: it’s like Lua’s looking at you!

 

 

 

 

- The planter comes with a sub-irrigation water reservoir. It means less frequent watering and your plant gets all the water it needs*.

- Lua uses 4 sensors to assist you in monitoring your plant’s well-being: Water level sensor*, light sensor, motion sensor and temperature sensor.

  • Dimensions: Ø 15 cm x 16 cm - Ø 5.9" x 6.3"
  • Inner dimensions: Ø 12 cm x 10 cm - Ø 4.7" x 3.9"
  • Weight: 500g
  • Screen: IPS LCD - 2.4" - 320x240px
  • Power supply: Standard USB

* Soil moisture sensor and saucer have been improved thanks to stretch goal #1 .

- Lua is powered by a standard Qi transmitter.

 

 

Lua’s conception and development took 13 months. We now have a fully working prototype and will soon start: the tooling and the components procurement. The first units will be tested right before starting the manufacturing on the assembly line. 

Lua’s final achievement relies on you! If this campaign reaches its goal, shipping should start in December 2019.

 

Lua was born in our offices at Mu Design, here in Luxembourg. We are the creators of Ulo, an amazing project that we also definitely want to keep on improving. Our team saw Ulo grow, contributed to its development and will keep on doing so. Our motivation and willpower are intact : we’ve put all of our efforts in our latest product. We’ve kept a cool head during surreal moments, but also during harsh ones and we simply couldn’t be any prouder.

Our aim is to build the emotive branch of IoT by making technology more ‘human-friendly’; for that good purpose, expanding our family of products is vital: Lua is the new sibling. Needless to say, Lua means a lot to us: a new product is like a new venture, you don’t start it without a purpose.

 

For journalists, here's our press kit: https://mu-design.lu/lua

story:
While making bread in Seattle... we got frustrated with the butter dishes we had. Knives falling off the tray, lids making butter rings on the counter, bulky lids that slid around while carrying, difficulty scooping up butter.  And we didn't see many stylish designs. So we decided to do something about it. Introducing...

 

 

SMARTER BUTTER DISH DESIGN

MAGNETIC LID - A magnet on the lid keeps the included butter knife with your dish. It also serves as a place to rest a butter-covered knife during use. No more searching for a knife.

EXTENDED FEET - With most butter dishes, you remove the lid, put it down, and have a messy ring of butter on the table. We designed extended feet to hold the lid off the table so the table stays clean.

RAMPS - Ramps on the sides of the dish allow you to scoop up butter easier. They also serve as scraping edges to scrape the knife clean. No more pushing butter onto your knife.

EVERYTHING SECURE - The lid feet lock the lid into the tray and the knife is magnetically held by the magnet. So everything stays together and can be carried with one hand. No more dishes and knives sliding and falling on the floor.

 

Magnetic lid to hold your knife

A magnet built into the lid provides an easy place to rest your knife during use, even with butter on it. Other dishes leave you wondering where to put your knife so you don't get butter on the counter.

 

No more butter mess on the table

 

We designed extended feet under the lid so that any butter mess on the sides of the lid is kept off the table. Most butter dishes have flat lids that leave a ring of butter on the table or you have to flip the lid over before you put it down.

 

Easily scoop up butter

We designed ramps at both ends of the butter dish so you can easily scoop up butter. Just slide your knife up the ramp. Use it to scoop up cold butter or a soft mess of butter. Then use the top of the ramp to scrape the knife clean.

 

Pick up lid and knife with one hand

 

Butter Hub is your "hub" for butter. Everything is together and carried easily with one hand. Other dishes are bulky and require two hands to pickup and then you have to go looking for a knife, usually having to take another trip to the kitchen to get your mug or bread.

 

Easily scrape knife clean

 

We designed raised scraping edges to help scrape knife clean or transfer butter from one side of the knife to the other.  Other butter dishes are too low and have no edge, making it hard to scrape off butter.

 

A lid and knife that doesn't slide off the tray

 

The lid has feet that lock into the tray so that it doesn't slide when carried. And the knife too is magnetically held in place. No more flying knives and sliding ceramic lids.

 

Four colors - Black, Grey, White, Clear

 

 

Butter Knife Included

Our included stainless steel butter knife is shaped with a bend to help scoop up butter at a higher angle of use. It works perfectly with our magnetic lid. But you may use your own steel knife. It's best for magnetic contact if it is more flat and not round.

 

Risks and challenges

We have experience with multiple crowdfunding campaigns with Zubits magnetic lacing solution. With this new product we've already gone ahead with design, prototyping, and manufacturing. We're manufacturing the BUTTER HUB dishes during this campaign. They should be ready to ship about a month after this campaign ends. We've shipped previous products to more than 30,000 backers and don't expect any problems in fulfilling your orders. Our reviews have been super positive. The only possible risks at this point are unforeseen issues with international shipping and customs that could cause a delay.

Other dishes leave you wondering where to put your knife so you don't get butter on the counter. No more butter mess on the table We designed extended feet under the lid so that any butter mess on the sides of the lid is kept off the table. Most butter dishes have flat lids that leave a ring of butter on the table or you have to flip the lid over before you put it down. Easily scoop up butterWe designed ramps at both ends of the butter dish so you can easily scoop up butter. Just slide your knife up the ramp. Use it to scoop up cold butter or a soft mess of butter. Then use the top of the ramp to scrape the knife clean. Pick up lid and knife with one hand Butter Hub is your "hub" for butter. Everything is together and carried easily with one hand. Other dishes are bulky and require two hands to pickup and then you have to go looking for a knife, usually having to take another trip to the kitchen to get your mug or bread. Easily scrape knife clean We designed raised scraping edges to help scrape knife clean or transfer butter from one side of the knife to the other.  Other butter dishes are too low and have no edge, making it hard to scrape off butter. A lid and knife that doesn't slide off the tray The lid has feet that lock into the tray so that it doesn't slide when carried. And the knife too is magnetically held in place. No more flying knives and sliding ceramic lids. Four colors - Black, Grey, White, Clear  Butter Knife IncludedOur included stainless steel butter knife is shaped with a bend to help scoop up butter at a higher angle of use. It works perfectly with our magnetic lid. But you may use your own steel knife. It's best for magnetic contact if it is more flat and not round. Risks and challengesWe have experience with multiple crowdfunding campaigns with Zubits magnetic lacing solution. With this new product we've already gone ahead with design, prototyping, and manufacturing. We're manufacturing the BUTTER HUB dishes during this campaign. They should be ready to ship about a month after this campaign ends. We've shipped previous products to more than 30,000 backers and don't expect any problems in fulfilling your orders. Our reviews have been super positive. The only possible risks at this point are unforeseen issues with international shipping and customs that could cause a delay.

story:
Customers raving about our products @ trustpilot.com/review/ausker.com

Now, we’re back to prove that “good” doesn’t have to be good enough. Amid rapid company growth, we’ve spent countless hours devising a way to do more than just elevate the way you cook. We want to transform it entirely.​

This time around, our goal is to offer you a cookware series that not only looks and cooks like a premium product line, but also features the most groundbreaking non-stick technology to date...all that with the direct-to-consumer prices our supporters have come to expect.

One of the most appealing aspects of modern cookware—and also one of their greatest failings—is the non-stick coating. We wanted to do something truly unprecedented, which is why we spent the past two years searching for technology that could match our lofty standards and take the Masters Collection into entirely new territory.

Our newest cookware series features the most durable and effective non-stick coating ever created, with genuinely remarkable scratch and wear resistance. The coating was initially developed to protect critical parts in medical, automotive, and aerospace tools and engines—and now, we’ve applied it to our cookware to incredible effect.

 

Coin scratch resistance test results. Under normal temperature, using coating scratch resistance tester, with 3Kg vertical pressure to test the coating damage caused by the coin with 10cm moving distance. Back and forth as a cycle.

 

The coat is fabricated with a triple-layer application, which is followed by a double-cooking process for unfaltering resilience. As the molecules set, they interlock to form a robust, dimpled cooking surface that’s been proven to outlast anything else on the market. (We think the texture resembles the rind of a lemon or lime.)

The result is a finish that’s over ten times more scratch-resistant than typical three-layer PTFE coating, and over 35 times more scratch-resistant than ceramic.

 

Beyond its non-stick qualities, this revolutionary technology features several impressive benefits including:

 

 

Not only does our non-stick coating pass standard industry certifications, it also clears the Ausker Tests of Excellence.

Egg test

 

Pancake test

 

This industrial-grade finishing process is ordinarily both pricey and time-consuming. However, with our optimized methods, we’ve managed to dramatically reduce the production cost—a benefit we happily pass along to you.

 

Thanks to the higher amount of steel, induction will require less energy—and therefore less money. Better for your budget and the environment.

Our pots, pans, and grill pan are dynamically thin and formed from die-cast aluminum, which is still the most conductive material per pound on earth. Ideal for holding and conducting heat with powerful efficiency.

Our pot handles feature an aerodynamic design (meaning more wiggle room in the cabinet) and 100% silicone coverage. The handle sleeves can be removed for cleaning, or for baking up to 200°C/392°F.

The pot lids come with anti-slip thumb pads on the silicone rim and a spoon holder built into the silicone knob.

Both lids also feature fast and slow strainers right in the lining, allowing you to pour off liquids carefully. As the lid sizes scale up, so do the filters, accounting for higher volumes.

The pots have been intelligently designed with flat lids and high walls, allowing them to fit inside each other like nesting dolls to minimize wasted storage space.

Along with all the benefits of our non-stick coating, die-cast aluminum bodies, and 100% steel plates, our pans feature detachable handles to dramatically reduce wasted cabinet space. They also make the pans much easier to clean.

With the handles removed, you can slide frying pans right into the oven (up to 200°C/392°F), which blends the braising, searing, and sautéing process into a single, seamless experience.

Unlike other models on the market, our handles’ intelligent lock-and-release mechanisms don’t use springs. This means the handles are more durable, and can be attached or removed with just one hand.

Once again, our grill pan features the same non-stick coating, die-cast aluminum body, and a 100% steel plate on the underside. It also features two channel spouts to easily pour off excess grease while cooking.

Thanks to a vertical lip and the same detachable handle system as the pans, our grill pans are easily stored in a cabinet—or slid right into the oven to make toast for a serving of bruschetta (up to up to 200°C/392°F).

The grill pan comes at an impressive size, allowing you to cook multiple steaks, burgers, vegetables, and more at the same time.

 

Nearly five years ago, Ausker was founded by three Italians who believed in bettering the everyday lives of others. To do that, they wanted to make their goods available to chefs, grandmothers, bachelors, newlyweds, and takeout specialists alike.

You might say they’re idealists.

As the company has grown, we’ve continued to focus on that betterment—by leaning into the details, dreaming and ideating, and pushing each design, material, vendors, and partner until our products have been refined into something truly exceptional.

That’s the promise we make to you—with this project, as with each of our goods, we’ll never give you less than our very best.

To give you more than just our word, here are a few of our credentials.

story:
Stop creating more waste and... Embrace Your Plastic. 

Made from recycled plastics, and with removable heads: Doop is the last toothbrush you'll ever buy. 

 

 

One Billion toothbrushes are thrown away just in the United States, every year! Be part of the solution. Join the Doop movement.

 

 

When we began to analyze the sustainability market we were on a mission to create a positive change in our daily behaviours. We paid particular attention to the dramatic amount of plastic that's thrown away each day and doing harm to our planet.

So we asked, what if we embraced our plastic? What if we could transform it into a recycled and recyclable material that everyone can use on a daily basis? This is where the idea for Doop started.

 

 

 

 

 

Plastic reengineered

With the help of academics and scientists, we have designed a conscious toothbrush that directly tackles the problem of plastic pollution by giving it a new life.

 

 

 

Why buy a toothbrush knowing it will one day end up in a landfill? Say no to single-use plastic, and say yes to Doop.

According to our peer-reviewed Lifecycle report, switching to Doop will result in a 66% reduction in ecotoxicity when compared to a traditional toothbrush. 

 

 

 

The click

When you're ready to replace your toothbrush head or want to wash it, you can easily snap off the old one and snap a new one on. You'll never have to replace the toothbrush body.

 

 

 

Free shipping worldwide

You can buy our toothbrushes from anywhere in the world and we'll ship them to you in our sleek packaging... absolutely free.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Doop was specially created with the environment in mind.

The graphics above and below show the environmental impact of Doop when compared to a traditional toothbrush.

 

 

Doop toothbrushes are made from recycled polypropylene, and the bristles are nylon. 

 

 

 

 

The data on the chart above is from our own internally commissioned, and peer reviewed report.  And we are happy to supply anyone a copy upon request.

 

 

Doop is innovative in terms of a systems’ thinking approach, leveraging the benefits of material selection, eco-design, and local production in order to improve the local economies.

Also, our return system after end-of-life promotes a circular economic solution, and transparent communication by measuring all the environmental impacts on the system. By introducing these types of products, and systems into the market, we will be demonstrating their true potential.

 

photograph by: Mohamed Abdulraheem

 

"And because plastic is essentially indestructible, that means nearly every single toothbrush made since the 1930s is still out there in the world somewhere, living on as a piece of trash."

- National Geographic

 

photograph by: Romolo Tavani

 

By buying a Doop toothbrush, you're reducing your carbon footprint and waste because the toothbrush base can essentially last forever. New replaceable heads will be sent to you every few months, while the old ones can be recycled. 

 

 

 

 

Doop has been over one year in the making. Our first prototypes were produced in December 2019. And since then we have been working arduously to make not just the best product we can, but also the most environmentally friendly.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Diogo Almeida

"As an engineer, I am passionate about science and its benefits to the world. Doop is a product developed with science at its core and with an immense impact on the planet."

 

Ines Barata

Brand designer at W-a-D Lab, detail-oriented, black color lover.

 

Bernardo Lourenco

A brand lover and activist about turning brands into social actors. "As the brand CEO, my commitment is to advocate for how Doop is changing the game."

 

Gonçalo Perdigão

Captain at W-a-D Lab, a digital Venture Builder developing new business models and launching disruptive products

 

 

 

 

 

Thank you for your support! And for joining our Doop family! Together we can do our part to help reduce waste, and pollution and hopefully leave the world better than we found it. 

Our toothbrushes are already rolling off the assembly line, and will be ready to ship when the campaign ends.

Captain at W-a-D Lab, a digital Venture Builder developing new business models and launching disruptive products

story:
The Average Cost of Repairing Home Water Damage is $10,000.

Who's Got This Kind of Money Lying Around?

 

Think Insurance Will Pay for It?

Maybe, Maybe Not. 

While insurance covers many instances of water damage, your claim can be denied if the  leak went undetected for a period of time. In that case, you'll be forced to pay out of pocket. Even if insurance covers the damage, think of the inconvenience to you and your family. 

 

Protect Your Home From Hidden Water Leaks With the SimpleSENCE Capteur.

SimpleSENCE Capteur is the next iteration of our popular SimpleSENCE Water Leak and Freeze Detector. The base unit is the same effective and easy-to-use device, but we’ve added a "tail" to it - a fully-sensing, 3-foot cord that can detect water leaks along its entire length.

 

The Tale of the Tail

By adding the sensing tail, we’ve created a much larger leak detection range. So, you’ll not only be able to detect a water leak within a wider surface area, you’ll get earlier notification.

And with the included probe attachment, you can extend your leak sensing range into hard-to-reach places like sump pump wells and under water heaters. 

 

WiFi Makes It Simple – and Unhackable

Capteur works via WiFi, which most people already have in their homes. And it only syncs to the router for a few seconds every 25 hours, making it almost unhackable.  You can get alerts via email, text, or both. An onboard siren alerts you when your phone is out of reach. 

 

Protect Your Most Important Investment

 

Born Simple

The original version of SimpleSENCE was created to be…well, simple. 

 

A Perfect Fit - Anywhere.

The compact design of the SimpleSENCE Capteur allows it to fit into the tightest leak-prone spaces. And with the tail, Capteur can go where no leak detectors have gone before.

 

Capteur Is Always at Home.

 

 

 

Don't Freeze Your Tail Off. 

The SimpleSENCE Capteur is not just a water leak detector but a freeze detector as well. It will alert you to freezing conditions well before your pipes burst and cause serious damage.

 

Why did we create the original SimpleSENCE?

The answer is simple.

Faulty Plumbing - $17,250

Bathroom Fixtures - $10,799

Water Heaters - $5,825

Appliance Leaks - $13,467

Frozen Pipe Failures - $8,189

Washing Machine Failures - $4,218

 

 

 

 

 

"If you want a dedicated app and easy setup, you'll want SimpleSENCE." – Family Handyman

 

"Best Leak Detector with multiple alert contacts" – Good Housekeeping Institute

 

"SimpleSENCE is like a baby monitor for unwelcome drips, puddles, and chills." – doityourself.com

 

"Having something like theSimpleSENCE water leak detector with WiFi alerts can truly save the day in the event of a leak or freezing event." – Pro Tool Reviews

 

CAPTEUR PRODUCTION TIMELINE

The SimpleSENCE Team

Joe Alfrey – Co-Founder - CEO

Joe Alfrey has extensive experience providing financial and executive leadership in companies ranging from start-up to Fortune 500 enterprises.

Mark Hopperton – Co-Founder & CTO

Mark is a pioneer in the data center and IT operations industries, and his 30 years of experience includes building multiple companies to deliver innovative applications. 

Chuck Geiling – Sales & Marketing

Chuck has 25+ years experience in the consumer retail and B2B markets.  He is adept at working with large retail outlets, including Walmart. 

Mike Hidock – Operations Management

Michael has years of experience in all aspects of manufacturing and assembly.  His experience has an emphasis on Operations Development and Supply Chain Management in manufacturing.

 

 

 

With Your Help

We love water leak and freeze detectors. We made a great one ourselves. But we knew that to improve them, we would need to increase the detection area of the device, creating quicker alerts and reducing water damage. That's when the idea of the tail came to us. 

Your contribution will not only get you great savings on Capteur, it will help us increase production so Capteur is available to all homeowners to protect their biggest investment.  

 

Money Talks – So Do People 

Even if you can’t contribute, please help spread the word about SimpleSENCE. Use the Indiegogo share tools. Or tell your friends and family about the simplest, most innovative, water leak and freeze detector around. Don't keep it a secret.

story:
Hi there! We're Misen.

We design and make premium kitchen tools at fair prices. To preorder our Carbon Steel Pan and make it a reality, click Back This Project. Or read on!


Misen Carbon Steel combines the best features of nonstick, stainless steel, and cast iron cookware into a single pan.

Unknown to many home cooks, carbon steel is a staple in professional kitchens for good reason. Misen Carbon Steel is lighter and easier to use than cast iron, has a naturally nonstick surface, and will last forever.

Quite simply, it makes cooking better, easier and more fun!

 

It's Naturally Nonstick


Nonstick performance, without the chemicals.

As a result of its natural composition, Misen Carbon Steel is able to be "seasoned." 'Seasoning' refers to a structure of successive, thin layers of polymerized oil that create a durable, naturally nonstick coating. 

Even better? A pan's seasoning can easily be replenished if it wears down, for a lifetime of natural nonstick use. When you don’t have to worry about delicate foods (like eggs or seafood) getting stuck to your pan, cooking gets a lot more fun! 

 


The benefits of Cast Iron, without the extra weight.

We have a fond place in our hearts for Cast Iron, but it’s a hard pan to cook with for many people because of how heavy it is.

While Cast Iron and Carbon Steel pans have similar compositions, Carbon Steel actually contains 1 - 2% less carbon. This seemingly 'small' difference is actually quite substantial, and gives Carbon Steel pans a stronger, more uniform grain structure.

Misen Carbon Steel provides the same benefits as Cast Iron, but is thinner and lighter, making it much easier to pick up, move, and really cook with.

 


You name it, Misen Carbon Steel can cook it.

Cookware is often about tradeoffs. If you want something (say, nonstick performance), you usually have to give up something else (high heat searing). Fortunately, these rules don’t apply to Carbon Steel.

Misen Carbon Steel’s natural nonstick surface, high heat tolerance, and durability makes it perfect for almost any dish. Pizza, omelets, steak, seafood, veggies — you name it, this pan can cook it to perfection.

 


Love Cooking but Hate Cleaning? Us too.

If you couldn't already tell, we LOVE cooking. Cleaning? Not so much. After a lot of cooking, easy clean-up is something we greatly appreciate. 

Misen Carbon Steel's naturally seasoned nonstick surface makes it incredibly easy to clean. Most of the time a little water and a towel will do the trick!  

 


Misen Carbon Steel is built to last a lifetime

Our Carbon Steel Pan is made from 99% Iron and 1% Carbon, a composition that is stronger than Cast Iron and durable enough to last a lifetime. So your Misen Carbon Steel won’t just be your favorite pan, but one that future generations can enjoy too! 
 

 


The millimeters matter.

Many things have changed at Misen since we launched in 2015. One thing that hasn’t? Our (loving) obsession with creating the best kitchen tools possible. From initial sketches, to 3D prints, to final production samples, creating Misen Carbon Steel was as thorough as it was fun.
story_txt:
Hi there! We're Misen.We design and make premium kitchen tools at fair prices. To preorder our Carbon Steel Pan and make it a reality, click Back This Project. Or read on!   Our Most Versatile Pan Ever
Misen Carbon Steel combines the best features of nonstick, stainless steel, and cast iron cookware into a single pan.Unknown to many home cooks, carbon steel is a staple in professional kitchens for good reason. Misen Carbon Steel is lighter and easier to use than cast iron, has a naturally nonstick surface, and will last forever.Quite simply, it makes cooking better, easier and more fun!   It's Naturally Nonstick
Nonstick performance, without the chemicals.As a result of its natural composition, Misen Carbon Steel is able to be "seasoned." 'Seasoning' refers to a structure of successive, thin layers of polymerized oil that create a durable, naturally nonstick coating. Even better? A pan's seasoning can easily be replenished if it wears down, for a lifetime of natural nonstick use. When you don’t have to worry about delicate foods (like eggs or seafood) getting stuck to your pan, cooking gets a lot more fun!  Misen Carbon Steel is easy to season and gets better the more you use it New Pan (left), 2 - 3 Seasonings (middle), 5+ Seasonings (right) Mmm Cheesy... 
It's Lighter Than Cast Iron

The benefits of Cast Iron, without the extra weight.We have a fond place in our hearts for Cast Iron, but it’s a hard pan to cook with for many people because of how heavy it is.While Cast Iron and Carbon Steel pans have similar compositions, Carbon Steel actually contains 1 - 2% less carbon. This seemingly 'small' difference is actually quite substantial, and gives Carbon Steel pans a stronger, more uniform grain structure.Misen Carbon Steel provides the same benefits as Cast Iron, but is thinner and lighter, making it much easier to pick up, move, and really cook with. 
  It's Incredibly Versatile
You name it, Misen Carbon Steel can cook it.Cookware is often about tradeoffs. If you want something (say, nonstick performance), you usually have to give up something else (high heat searing). Fortunately, these rules don’t apply to Carbon Steel.Misen Carbon Steel’s natural nonstick surface, high heat tolerance, and durability makes it perfect for almost any dish. Pizza, omelets, steak, seafood, veggies — you name it, this pan can cook it to perfection. 
Misen Carbon Steel combines the best features of three classic pans into one
Misen Carbon Steel can do the job of three other pans 
It's Easy to Clean

Love Cooking but Hate Cleaning? Us too.If you couldn't already tell, we LOVE cooking. Cleaning? Not so much. After a lot of cooking, easy clean-up is something we greatly appreciate. Misen Carbon Steel's naturally seasoned nonstick surface makes it incredibly easy to clean. Most of the time a little water and a towel will do the trick!    
It Will Last Forever

Misen Carbon Steel is built to last a lifetimeOur Carbon Steel Pan is made from 99% Iron and 1% Carbon, a composition that is stronger than Cast Iron and durable enough to last a lifetime. So your Misen Carbon Steel won’t just be your favorite pan, but one that future generations can enjoy too!  
Key Features  
Design Process

The millimeters matter.Many things have changed at Misen since we launched in 2015. One thing that hasn’t? Our (loving) obsession with creating the best kitchen tools possible. From initial sketches, to 3D prints, to final production samples, creating Misen Carbon Steel was as thorough as it was fun.       
Rewards

story:
After two years of making an extensive research to find the best quality on materials and technology for our cookware, we finally found the perfect recipe to produce our pans and pots series. 

All our Frying Pans and Pots are made with a Die Cast Aluminium Body. This is our special aluminium alloy and thanks to its high quality, it is extremely resistant to impacts and cannot be deformed. This assures a long lasting family of products.

Our special Aluminium Alloy contains high conductivity, allowing the heat to spread evenly throughout the entire surface. This upgrades the cooking experience to a much higher level while giving you more control over your food.

For our coating, we teamed up with the top quality Swiss brand ILAG, offering the highest quality of nonstick coating. We have chosen the Granitec technology for each of our pans and pots. This consists in a five-layer nonstick coating, reinforced by ceramic scratch proof particles that are able to endure any intense use. Because of its multi- layered system and the ceramic reinforcement, we guarantee a long lifetime and the best abrasion and corrosion resistance.

In addition to its excellent performance characteristics, the coating is also healthy and environmental friendly. All our products are 100% PFOA free for a safe food consumption.

Coupled with our high quality Aluminium Body, we added a special and thick reinforced stainless steel bottom. This will grant a faster heat distribution, allowing these products to cook greatly with gas, ceramic, induction, electric or any other cooking technology.

In order to make our non-stick property so long lasting, we tested our prototypes continuously over a certain period of time. All our non-stick tests were combined with mechanical and chemical abuse to simulate a typical long-term household use and test if the most common cooking ingredients will stick over time.

It is very common to use extremely corrosive ingredients such as tomatoes, salt, vinegar and different spices. Some recipes require long cooking hours within high temperatures. Combining this process along with corrosive ingredients damages average coatings. We tested Granitec in terms of resistance to blistering, undermining, staining and other defects.

Abrasion resistance refers to the capability of coatings to withstand superficial rubbing and scratching without being worn away. Thanks to reinforcing additives and the special ceramic particles, Granitec showed a considerably higher quality surface hardness and wear resistance than any other average coatings. 

LGA Abrasion Test: This test uses a special mixture of steel balls and water, a mixture which heavily abuses the coating. These items are then positioned onto an orbital shaking machine at a speed of 300 rpm for 15, 30 and 45 minutes.

MTP Abrasion Test: The test uses a special rotating “head” to which three ballpoint pen refills are attached under a specific load. The items are positioned on a hotplate and brought up to a temperature of 200°C while the hotplate is moving back and forth.

British Standard Abrasion Test: This test uses a specified Scotch-Brite pad, which is rubbed back and forth on the coating and combined with water and detergent. The test tries to simulate the cleaning and scrubbing action on cook- and bakeware.

Dry Abrasion Test: This test uses an abrasive pad that rotates on the coating under a certain load and a certain speed. The number of rotations carried out to expose the substrate is an indication of lifetime expectation

Comfortable, safe, easy to use and adaptable to any situation! We assure you that after trying our family of pots, you will run out recipes to keep the fun going.

For us, comfort comes always first. This is why we have included these silicone handle holders for the best grip. Our goal is to simplify your life as much as possible so we made them detachable to make cleaning easier.

In addition, we have designed an innovative lid that suits and adapts to all your daily cooking needs. This lid includes two different strainers for water draining and steam release. You can choose between a fast or a slower draining speed for the perfect dosage. The lid rim is made of silicone in order to achieve the best grip when pouring.

We like to think of every single cooking detail, this is why we thought about those annoying moments where you are cooking in a rush, but can’t find a spot for your spoon, so you end up dripping everywhere. Well, our lid contains a perfect silicone spoon holder that will save your counter from all those messy stains. 

Nobody likes messy kitchens and unfortunately most of the storage space in every kitchen is taken by pans and pots. Nevertheless, our pots have been designed to create the best experience for you! We chose the most comfortable sizes  and made them compatible so you wouldn’t have to struggle for storage space anymore.

Our set of pots are suitable for any occasion! If either you need a quick – solo meal, a small friends gathering or make a holiday meal for the whole family, we got all the sizes assuring happy bellies no matter how many people!

This is the opportunity to forget messy kitchens and start enjoying delicious meals having the best frying pans as your assistant!

For our frying pans, we decided to create smart storage solutions. Therefore, we have included a safe and easy detachable handle system. With just one click, storing what it used to be an unpleasant big block of space, will no longer be a dread for an organized cabinet.  

We have also thought of ways to maximize the use of our frying pans. By making a detachable handle, our frying pans can also go directly into your oven (use up to 200°C maximum). Now you have no excuse to follow your favorite recipe or you can even re-heat your food after a long day of hard work.   

We include these two sizes meant to feed as many bellies as you wish! 

We have a special product for our grill lovers! This grill will make you feel like a professional home cook while grilling your favorite meat and sharing incredible moments with your friends!

Our Grill was also designed with a detachable handle for storage purposes and of course, this makes it adjustable for the oven too! 

Often grease is a problem during cooking fattier cuts of meat. So, in order to easily get rid of all that unwanted fat, we included these two pour spouts. 

This grill is not only an item to impress your friends, but it also comes in a very comfortable size!

We are three Italians. This means we were wired to feel passionate for food! We love cooking, but every time we wanted to get new cookware, we felt it was impossible to find good products at reasonable prices.    

Does it really have to be this expensive to be a home cook passionate? We refused to accept this fact as a reality.  

What if passionate cooks didn’t have to buy expensive brands in order to get high quality products? And so, our journey began as we set up our own mission to offer honesty amongst everything.  

We believe in making business by focusing on the quality of our products rather than the profit. For us, offering high quality at a fair price means also setting an example and inspiring other business to run with transparency by all means.

as many times as possible to help us succeed.

use facebook, twitter, google+, and all else.

will get special perks and prizes not specified here.

thanks.


Hi, my name is Loren Kote, and my co-inventor's

and designer's name is Depu Mathew.

as you can see, we have come up with the idea and design

for this Unique Water Spray Alarm Clock Guaranteed To Wake Anybody Up By Water Droplets. but, we lack enough funds to make this a reality,

so that this product can be produced and be available for purchase

in stores and online we currently need a minimum $2,200 dollars

funding to make this a reality. more would be even better.

this alarm clock uses a sound and gentle but perfectly effective

water droplets spraying, guaranteed to wake anybody up on time!!

deep sleeper? or most alarm clocks not working for you?

or simply want or need a gentler alarm clock?

this alarm clock will be for you!!

never wake up late again!! this alarm clock works!!


folks, let's make this a reality, now!!

any funding amount helps, even if only 1 dollars, 2 dollars,

or 5 or 10 or 100 or 1000 dollars or more, it all adds up.

perks available!! see right side with perks details.

please donate and or share this project with everyone possible!!

your donations may be tax deductible.


note: in case we do not receive enough funding,

whatever funding received will also be used

to potentially help poor communities in Pune, India,

the place where Depu Matthew is located.


thank you for your attention and help!!

sincerely, L.K. and D.M.


note: if enough funding received perks will be delivered

in the following 3-7 months after funding campaign end.

story:
save time: No more time spent refilling pitchers, lugging out recycling, and running to the store. Our device connects to your tap, so you can enjoy your favorite drinks without the chores.

save money: Our app tracks your cost savings over time, so you can see the benefits of better decisions for yourself.

save our oceans: More than 8 million tons of plastic are dumped into our ocean every year. Change starts with making better choices more accessible and convenient.

 

    

   

    

 

         

 

The Rocean One carbonates within the device, so it can be used with any container you’d like—from an old Voss bottle to your shiny new S’well.

           

                        

 

 

Our patent-pending eco-friendly rPods are reusable and dishwasher safe, so you can enjoy the drinks you love without the guilt of single-use, throwaway pods.  And our recyclable refill packs can make up to 50 liters of flavor enhanced water each, saving upwards of $2500/year!

    

 

   

 

Taking cues from Modernist Architecture, our design merges form and function. From space-saving silhouettes to customizable magnetic faceplates, our device is versatile enough to seamlessly integrate with any kitchen.

 

From an intuitive app to Google Home and Amazon Alexa integrations, it’s not just the smarter way to water—it’s a smart device designed for a new generation of homes.

      

 

We created Rocean because we wanted to help people kick their plastic bottle addiction and make better, more sustainable choices. Every step of our design process is informed by rigorous research, so we’re able to make thoughtful choices that minimize our carbon footprint and net environmental impact. We know we can’t be perfect, but we believe in always trying to do our best, sourcing materials that range from recycled aluminum to bamboo and other ecologically mindful components. 

 

 

But it doesn’t stop there. We also want to give back to our oceans. We’ve partnered with nonprofit The Hydrous to help clean up our oceans and educate consumers on the importance of our coral ecosystems. In addition, a percentage of our proceeds will go toward global coral restoration. Stay tuned—we’ve got even more in the works.

 

“When our son was born, my wife and I considered the world he was going to inherit, specifically in regards to ocean pollution—there had to be a smarter solution for people who want the same convenience of pre-filled plastic bottles without the inconvenience of single-use plastic waste,” said Sunjay Guleria, Co-Founder and CEO of Rocean. “Given our tech, ecommerce and design backgrounds, and seeing the current solutions in the market, we knew there must be a better way to cut peoples’ monthly consumption of plastic drinking bottles. By creating a single machine that allows the most advanced beverage customization and filtration at home than any other device on the market, Rocean consumers can not only have the most efficient drinking system, but can help to save our oceans while saving thousands of dollars a year. Now that’s smart water.”

While Rocean is a startup, we’re also backed by some of the industry’s top investors. But we’re bringing our product to Indiegogo first because we want to give you early access to our revolutionary device—and more importantly, we wanted to offer special perks for our early supporters. Once we hit our goal, our trusted manufacturing partners will get started, and we’ll make sure that your orders are shipped by December 2018, in time for the holiday season.

 

What does the Rocean One offer that I can't get from my standard pitcher filter?

The Rocean One is the first smart water device built for both homes and commercial environments to filter, flavor and carbonate your water. Our goal is to provide you with the same convenience and breadth of beverage choices that what you've come to expect from the local supermarket - without the plastic and at a fraction of the carbon footprint.

 

I drink bottled water because I don't trust the filtration of tap water. How do I know that the water that comes from Rocean One is just as pure - or purer - than bottled water?

When it comes to water purity, the bottled water industry is actually less regulated than the water that comes from our tap. This means that even after spending money on bottled water and generating a significant carbon footprint, you may still be drinking water that contains contaminants and microplastics. Our carbon block filtration system is 15x more powerful and removes 75 more contaminants than a standard pitcher filter.

 

When it comes to enhanced water, I'm very particular about the level of flavoring and the amount of carbonation. That's why I have my preferred water brands. How would the Rocean One replicate my same preferred taste?

Our team of engineers have spent over 2 years developing our "Precise Personalization" system that allows you to re-create your favorite beverages or create something entirely new. Our RFID-enabled pod technology allows you to select your preferred level of carbonation and flavoring. And through our branded pod partnerships, you can re-create your favorite flavored water beverages (that you're currently drinking from a plastic bottle.)

 

How long does it take to install?

With our remote reservoir system, you can start using your Rocean One immediately or you can have a professional spend 15 minutes connecting it to the cold water supply line under the sink. Either way, it’s incredibly easy to start using your Rocean.

 

How much space will Rocean occupy on my countertop?

We designed rocean to fit perfectly under your cabinet and occupy half the counter space of a standard toaster oven. The size varies depending on whether you opt for the remote reservoir or the plumbed-in option, and measures approximately 15" tall, 16" long and 5" deep.

 

Do I need to purchase a specific bottle to use with my Rocean?

No. The Rocean One is designed to be used with any bottle or even a single glass. You do not need to purchase any specific bottles to properly use the device.

 

What bottle sizes can the Rocean One accommodate?

The bottle area on the Rocean One is approximately 12 inches tall and 5 inches wide, meaning it can accommodate almost any bottle size or even a single glass. Our touch-screen dispenser means that you can fill your carafe, water bottle or even a small sip of your preferred water beverage.

 

How many drinks can I make with one flavor pod?

Depending on your preferred amount of flavoring, 2 flavor pods can make 48 bottles of flavored water at approximately 1/5th the cost.  

 

How much sparkling water does one CO2 canister yield?

1 CO2 canister can make up to 30 17oz bottles of sparkling water at approximately 1/3rd the cost.

 

How often do I need to replace the filter?

Most households will only need to replace their filter once a year. As a smart device, your Rocean One will keep track of your filter usage and remind you as it's time to re-order a new filter.

 

Is the water refrigerated?

To minimize Rocean’s footprint on your kitchen counter - and the environment - we left out refrigeration. The typical temperature of the water coming from your city’s underground pipes is 55 degrees Fahrenheit. Since the Rocean One quickly refills large pitchers and carafes, it’s easy to keep your fridge stocked with your favorite drinks at the temperature you want.

 

What type of water filtration does Rocean use?

Rocean uses carbon block filtration technology that is certified by the National Science Foundation to effectively filter over 75 contaminants from drinking water. That's 15x more effective than pitcher filters. Plus, you can filter up to 300 gallons of water before you need to replace it. 

 

What makes carbon block filtration so effective?

Carbon block filters are smaller, faster, and more efficient than alternate filtration methods, such as reverse osmosis and distillation. Reverse osmosis wastes 4 liters of water per 1 liter of potable water produced, and it requires a large 3' x 2' feet under-the-counter system. Meanwhile, distillation can take 2 hours to produce a single liter of water, and uses as much energy as an air conditioning unit.

 

Does the Rocean filter remove microplastics?

Our submicron water filter traps particles smaller than a single micron in size, meaning that it has no problem filtering microplastics, including synthetic fibers which have a diameter of 10 microns in size. Microplastics are not visible to the naked eye, but have been found in 94% of US tap water samples, and are becoming an increasingly large cause of concern to the scientific community, although their impact on human health has not yet been fully assessed.

 

Does the Rocean filter remove flouride?

Our advanced submicron carbon block filter has been rigorously engineered and re-engineered to effectively reduce upwards of 99% of a multitude of contaminants, including the most dangerous such as asbestos, cysts, industrial chemicals, heavy metals like lead and mercury, and microplastics. It does not, however, significantly reduce fluoride which, in tap water in the US is typically below 0.7 ppm (well below any known risk levels) Here's a full list of contaminants our filter removes from drinking water: http://bit.ly/r0contaminants

Our carbon block filtration system is 15x more powerful and removes 75 more contaminants than a standard pitcher filter.
 
When it comes to enhanced water, I'm very particular about the level of flavoring and the amount of carbonation. That's why I have my preferred water brands. How would the Rocean One replicate my same preferred taste?
Our team of engineers have spent over 2 years developing our "Precise Personalization" system that allows you to re-create your favorite beverages or create something entirely new. Our RFID-enabled pod technology allows you to select your preferred level of carbonation and flavoring. And through our branded pod partnerships, you can re-create your favorite flavored water beverages (that you're currently drinking from a plastic bottle.)
 
How long does it take to install?
With our remote reservoir system, you can start using your Rocean One immediately or you can have a professional spend 15 minutes connecting it to the cold water supply line under the sink. Either way, it’s incredibly easy to start using your Rocean.
 
How much space will Rocean occupy on my countertop?
We designed rocean to fit perfectly under your cabinet and occupy half the counter space of a standard toaster oven. The size varies depending on whether you opt for the remote reservoir or the plumbed-in option, and measures approximately 15" tall, 16" long and 5" deep.
 
Do I need to purchase a specific bottle to use with my Rocean?
No. The Rocean One is designed to be used with any bottle or even a single glass. You do not need to purchase any specific bottles to properly use the device.
 
What bottle sizes can the Rocean One accommodate?
The bottle area on the Rocean One is approximately 12 inches tall and 5 inches wide, meaning it can accommodate almost any bottle size or even a single glass. Our touch-screen dispenser means that you can fill your carafe, water bottle or even a small sip of your preferred water beverage.
 
How many drinks can I make with one flavor pod?
Depending on your preferred amount of flavoring, 2 flavor pods can make 48 bottles of flavored water at approximately 1/5th the cost.  
 
How much sparkling water does one CO2 canister yield?
1 CO2 canister can make up to 30 17oz bottles of sparkling water at approximately 1/3rd the cost.
 
How often do I need to replace the filter?
Most households will only need to replace their filter once a year. As a smart device, your Rocean One will keep track of your filter usage and remind you as it's time to re-order a new filter.
 
Is the water refrigerated?
To minimize Rocean’s footprint on your kitchen counter - and the environment - we left out refrigeration. The typical temperature of the water coming from your city’s underground pipes is 55 degrees Fahrenheit. Since the Rocean One quickly refills large pitchers and carafes, it’s easy to keep your fridge stocked with your favorite drinks at the temperature you want.
 
What type of water filtration does Rocean use?
Rocean uses carbon block filtration technology that is certified by the National Science Foundation to effectively filter over 75 contaminants from drinking water. That's 15x more effective than pitcher filters. Plus, you can filter up to 300 gallons of water before you need to replace it. 
 
What makes carbon block filtration so effective?
Carbon block filters are smaller, faster, and more efficient than alternate filtration methods, such as reverse osmosis and distillation. Reverse osmosis wastes 4 liters of water per 1 liter of potable water produced, and it requires a large 3' x 2' feet under-the-counter system. Meanwhile, distillation can take 2 hours to produce a single liter of water, and uses as much energy as an air conditioning unit.
 
Does the Rocean filter remove microplastics?
Our submicron water filter traps particles smaller than a single micron in size, meaning that it has no problem filtering microplastics, including synthetic fibers which have a diameter of 10 microns in size. Microplastics are not visible to the naked eye, but have been found in 94% of US tap water samples, and are becoming an increasingly large cause of concern to the scientific community, although their impact on human health has not yet been fully assessed.
 
Does the Rocean filter remove flouride?
Our advanced submicron carbon block filter has been rigorously engineered and re-engineered to effectively reduce upwards of 99% of a multitude of contaminants, including the most dangerous such as asbestos, cysts, industrial chemicals, heavy metals like lead and mercury, and microplastics. It does not, however, significantly reduce fluoride which, in tap water in the US is typically below 0.7 ppm (well below any known risk levels) Here's a full list of contaminants our filter removes from drinking water: http://bit.ly/r0contaminants

story:
Finally - A Smarter Way To Stay Cool

Window air conditioners have been around for over 60 years, providing much-needed relief in the hot summer months.  But it has always come at a cost of a terrible user experience. Window air conditioners have always been big, ugly, loud, and difficult to install - until now.

See FAQ's here

Kapsul was designed to address all the pain points of current window air conditioners.  From beautiful design to easy installation to remote connectivity and schedule creation, Kapsul makes living with a window air conditioner a pain-free experience.  The intuitive thermostat knob interface makes interaction simple.  Smart features mean you can control Kapsul via Wi-Fi and make energy saving schedules from your iPhone or Android device.  A low profile design allows you to keep the view from your window, and makes storage a breeze.

Press

 

 

 

 

Features

Specifications  

Cooling Type: Vapor-compression refrigeration using environmentally and ozone-friendly R410a refrigerant.

Cooling Capacity: 5,000 BTU/hour.

Room size: Up to 160 square feet.

Window Opening Size: 21" to 36" wide.

Window Type: Single or double-hung window frames.

Installation Orientation: Currently horizontal only.  We are exploring vertical orientation in the future.

Power Requirement: 120V/60Hz

 

Low Profile Engineering

Kapsul's significant reduction in size in comparison to existing units means that the view outside is no longer obstructed.  The patent-pending engineering required state-of-the-art CFD simulation and years of optimization to get into the final form factor Kapsul offers, trimming the total size by 40%. The highly engineered fans and ventilation system are quiet and efficient. Unlike other window air conditioners, Kapsul directs the cool air up towards the ceiling, creating a convective cycle that prevents cold and hot spots in the room. At 5,000 BTU/hr, Kapsul can cool a 10'x16' room, or two Kapsul units can cool a room up to 330 sq ft. 

When we started this project, we knew window air conditioning needed more than just a pretty grill or smartphone control.  The whole user experience had to be rethought, and Kapsul had to be completely redesigned from the ground up.  Our modern and elegant design not only looks good but also addresses the irritations that users have with existing window AC designs.

Easy to Install

Kapsul comes with a special window frame adapter to ensure a safe and easy installation.  The adapter is installed first to create a secure, sealed socket into which Kapsul slides and locks in place.  No more struggling with a bulky object in an open window. The innovative handle and rounded sides further aid with installation, removal, and storage.

Simple User Interface

We've built Kapsul around a single knob that controls the thing you want to change - temperature.  Plug it in and set the thermostat. There's no complicated modes or settings. Users can set a schedule via the iOS and Android apps to ensure they never use more energy than is needed.

Control Kapsul From iPhone or Android 

Kapsul can be set to a schedule by your iPhone or Android device, ensuring you can come home to a cool space without running your electricity all day. Our simple-to-use app allows you to control several Kapsul units at a time. 

Total Room Circulation

Kapsul is designed to blow cold air upwards to mix with the warm air below as it falls.  This circulation removes the warm spots in the room while preventing cold air from being recirculated, which improves comfort and efficiency.

 

Easy Storage

If you are using Kapsul in a bedroom, you don't have to take it far when autumn arrives.  Kapsul's slim profile allows it to spend the off-season under your bed or in a closet.

 

Rewards

Working Prototypes

During our two year development of Kapsul, we extensively modeled thermal performance to achieve the smallest possible form factor.  After building many small-scale heat exchanger prototypes to check our math, we built a fully functioning air conditioner using custom components made to our specifications.  

Currently, we have designed and built two full-scale prototypes.  One is a thermal prototype which actually works to pump heat at the size we have designed, and a user experience prototype which acts as a testbed for us to work on the installation experience, confirm the function of our light pipe and knob design, and continue to develop the iOS and Android apps to confirm software/hardware integration.

  

 

Our working prototype proves that the underlying technology is ready for production.  The fans, heat exchangers, and other components used in the Kapsul prototype were all custom-built to our specifications.  Our outside heat exchanger manufacturer has checked our math, and an accredited HVAC technician charged the unit shown in this video with ozone-friendly R410a refrigerant.

    

The Team

UL Certification

Like any reputable household appliance, Kapsul will ship on Day 1 with a UL listing, ensuring that a trusted third party has evaluated and tested our product to ensure it is safe for operation in your home. We've budgeted time and money to ensure that all of UL's requirements are met, as set out in the UL-484 requirements document.

                                            HELP KAPSUL BECOME A REALITY!

Risks and challenges

Kapsul has been in development for over two years, and in that time our team of experienced engineers and designers have addressed all the major technical hurdles associated with this product. After many prototypes and much analysis, Kapsul is ready to begin the road to production.

Kapsul worked with the team at Likuma Labs, an established product development firm that has experience bringing projects from the drawing board to the production line in various industries including consumer products, medical devices, and industrial automation. We know what it takes to bring hardware into production, and we know there will be challenges along the way.

No product development process is free from hiccups, and that's why we live by the mantra to "prototype early and often." We've budgeted a year to bring Kapsul into production and into your hands well before the Summer of 2017. We know this is a long time to wait, but Kapsul is a complex device with electronics and mechanical systems, and it must communicate with two separate apps (iOS and Android). Rather than rush to put out a buggy, 0th-generation product, we want our backers to have the user experience they deserve on the first day they open the box.

In the Summer of 2016 we plan to extensively test numerous pre-production units here in our own Philadelphia homes to work out all the bugs and kinks in the design and user interface so that we can move into full production knowing the design is ready for you. We've budgeted extra production time in case the first production units don't meet our exacting requirements. During the production roll-out, some specifications presented above may change slightly, such as precise dimensions and energy data. However, we believe the numbers presented to be a realistic outcome, and are not just optimistic estimates.

There is a risk that Kapsul will not be ready to ship in time for Spring of 2017. Given the seasonal nature of the product, a 3-6 month slip in timeline would result in Kapsul being delivered during or after the Summer of 2017. We know that backers would be incredibly disappointed in this result, and we are working late nights and weekends to minimize this risk. However, given the complexity of the supply chain management, regulatory requirements, and third-party safety verification required, backers should understand there is a risk the shipment timeline could slip into or beyond the Summer of 2017.

FAQ's

 

Can Kapsul be placed vertically in a window?

Kapsul is currently designed to only be placed horizontally. There are a number of engineering issues that must be addressed before Kapsul could be placed vertically, including compressor lubrication and condensate dripping. However, given the feedback from many interested parties, we are exploring incorporating this into the design as we move forward with production. However, potential backers should note that we cannot commit to accommodating a vertical installation at this time.

What type of window can Kapsul be installed in?

Kapsul can be installed in single or double-hung window frames.

What size window will Kapsul fit into?

Kapsul can be installed in windows 21'' to 36'' wide.

Must I remove my window screen before installing Kapsul?

Yes, the screen must be removed or slid out of the way before installing Kapsul.

When will Kapsul be available in my country?

Accommodating the electrical and regulatory requirements of each country will take time, and we can only commit to delivering Kapsul in the United States and Canada at this time.

What type of filter will Kapsul have?

Kapsul will have a standard screen filter that we recommend cleaning once per season. This filter is used to prevent dust from clogging the evaporator coils and is not meant to improve room air quality with regard to pollen, dust, or smoke.

Can I control Kapsul from outside my home?

Schedule creation and temperature adjustments made through the app may initially only work within your home.  However, the units will ship with Wi-Fi connectivity, and control via the Internet is a capability that is planned.

How does Kapsul remove the condensed water from inside the unit?

Kapsul's window frame adapter is designed to tilt the unit 3-degrees up so that the condensate can collect and drip outside of the window it's installed into. Kapsul will protrude about 8-9'' from the window, which will prevent water from dripping down the side of the building.

Is there a warranty?

Kapsul will ship with a 1-year warranty.

Can Kapsul be pushed back into the room from the outside?

No. Kapsul's frame adapter has spring-loaded locking cleats that latch once Kapsul is inserted. These cleats provide three functions.

1. Prevent someone from outside the home pushing Kapsul inside, 

2. Prevent a child from pulling Kapsul into the room on top of themselves, 

3. Allow Kapsul to pass the UL structural loading test which applies 400 pounds of downforce to the top of Kapsul on the outside of the building.

How far will Kapsul protrude from the window outside?

About 8-9'' of the unit will extend outside.

Is Kapsul lighter than existing window AC units?

Kapsul is approximately 8 pounds lighter than current window air conditioners of similar capacity. The ergonomics of Kapsul's installation and handle contribute significantly to its ease of installation in addition to the moderate reduction in weight. Precise weight figures will be available as the project nears completion.

Will Kapsul have a heating function?

No, Kapsul's heat pump only works one way – to cool the inside of a room.

Will Kapsul be HomeKit enabled?

This capability may not be available initially at the time of delivery, but HomeKit support is planned.

How much does it cost to run Kapsul?

Kapsul will cost about $50.00 to run during the summer months. This is an extremely rough estimation, based on the following calculation:

0.480 kilowatts x 9.5 hours of cooling per day x 90 cooling days per season x $0.12 per kilowatt hour = $49 dollars a summer.

Your energy needs will vary depending on your geography, how hot the summer is, at what temperature you set the room,  and how much electricity costs in your locale.

Can Kapsul run on batteries or solar power?

Kapsul is a 480 W, 110-120 V A/C appliance.  It can be powered by an appropriately sized solar and/or energy storage system with an inverter and appropriate electronics.  

Will Kapsul be available in any other colors?

Perhaps in the future, but for now Kapsul will only be available in a single color scheme.

Can I pick up my Kapsul to save on shipping if I live in or near Philadelphia?

Unfortunately, no. Kickstarter does not allow us to vary the shipping based on geographic location, and we aren't certain about where fulfillment will occur yet, either. Sorry about that!

Will Kapsul display Celsius?

The numbers printed around the knob are in Fahrenheit. We will include a Fahrenheit to Celsius conversion via the App.

What maintenance is required for Kapsul?

The refrigerant and lubricant are hermetically sealed during manufacture, so no serious maintenance will be required over the life of the product. The screen filter should be cleaned with water each season.

What is the lifespan of Kapsul?

Kapsul will have an average lifespan of about 10 years depending on the amount of use it gets.

Can Kapsul be installed in an RV or another vehicle?

Not at the moment. RV installation will require a custom adapter that we haven't provisioned for. If you decided to modify Kapsul or it's adapter in any way that's up to you but it won't be UL certified for safety.

Can Kapsul be installed directly into a wall?

We ask that Kapsul is installed per our directions in a single or double-hung window. If you decided to modify it in any way that's up to you but it won't be UL certified for safety.

Does Kapsul come with a surge protector?

There is an LCDI plug on our 6 foot cable per UL requirements.

What type of cable/plug will Kapsul have?

Kapsul comes with a 6' power cord that features an LCDI 3-prong plug suitable for 120V outlets.

What material is Kapsul constructed from?

Materials will mainly be painted metal and a minimal amount of UV-resistant plastic. All materials will be in compliance with Underwriter Laboratories requirements for rain, corrosion, and UV resistance.

How did you come up with the name "Kapsul"?

We considered hundreds of words using an anagram generator. Kapsul came up, and it turned out to be an old, unused dictionary word for a type of water wheel. Since our internal fans and dial-display all look a bit like wheels, we thought it was a fitting name!

story:
Cleaning your floors is now easier, faster and healthier with a Duet. Try it, and you’ll never want to use anything else. What are you cleaning with?

 

 

The broom and dustpan have lived in the dark ages till now. Duet brings modern design with a fully functional and Eco friendly approach to everyday floor cleaning, it's your broom and dustpan reinvented.  Hi, my name is Viviana and I as many of you have experienced the tedious chore of cleaning floors. Using a microfiber dust mop or a swiffer, then having to go grab a regular sweeping broom and a dustpan or a vacuum to collect the larger debris left behind. Not to mention what's still stuck on the cleaning pad or if using a swiffer, well those non biodegradable clothes end up in the trash and in our landfills. Duet solves all those issues, saving you time, effort and expense, while being an Eco friendly product in more than one way.
story_txt: Cleaning your floors is now easier, faster and healthier with a Duet. Try it, and you’ll never want to use anything else. What are you cleaning with?  The broom and dustpan have lived in the dark ages till now. Duet brings modern design with a fully functional and Eco friendly approach to everyday floor cleaning, it's your broom and dustpan reinvented.  Hi, my name is Viviana and I as many of you have experienced the tedious chore of cleaning floors. Using a microfiber dust mop or a swiffer, then having to go grab a regular sweeping broom and a dustpan or a vacuum to collect the larger debris left behind. Not to mention what's still stuck on the cleaning pad or if using a swiffer, well those non biodegradable clothes end up in the trash and in our landfills. Duet solves all those issues, saving you time, effort and expense, while being an Eco friendly product in more than one way.
