story:
Info 24 April 2021:

Our supplier has finished our first batch of Ragdry Cone, and it is now shipped to Europe by sea.

 

 

The perfect dish cloth hanger

After long time use and good experience with the Ragdry Cone we want you to benefit from it too. It is a nice little helper, a perfect and practical solution that makes everyday life in the kitchen a little bit easier. Come and be a part of our family start up project.

 

Easy access and quick drying

Ragdry Cone can be turned sideways, which makes it very easy for you to hang the dish cloth to dry and grab it when you need it again. Quick drying reduces bacteria growth and that's good for the kitchen hygiene.

 

Can be mounted on different surfaces

Ragdry Cone can be mounted on the horizontal part of the left side of the sink.

 

Timeless and classic design

Eco friendly and long lasting

Ragdry Cone is made to fit in any modern kitchen. It is made of stainless steel which is a sustainable material and it will stay good looking for a lifetime. 

 

Smart and functional

Ragdry Cone consists of few parts. The Cone on your sink and the rod that holds the dish cloth. The rod can be turned sideways which gives you the possibility to either hang the dish cloth underneath the faucet or by the side of the sink. It is also possible to remove the rod easily if you need more space and access to the sink. 

 

 

You will receive the product in a box made of recyclable cardboard in a bio compostable mailer bag.

 

VAT and Customs

US and EU: If you are living in USA or in a country with membership to EU, don't worry about VAT and customs. These taxes and duties will be prepaid by us.

Outside US and EU: You may be responsible for paying for customs, duties, taxes or other applicable fees before you can receive your package. These policies are set locally, so please check with the relevant sources where you live, for the most accurate information. If the customs/duties are not paid and the shipment is returned to us, you will be refunded, minus the shipping cost.

 

 

Shipments to USA:

United States residents will not be charged for shipping. 

Shipments to EU:

EU residents must pay for the shipping of the package. 

Shipments to other countries: 

Shipments to other countries than US must be payed.

 

 

Our story

We are a small family business starting up with our first product, Ragdry Cone, the dish cloth hanger.

Our mission is to create innovative solutions and products that are characterized by user friendly design, because we believe that everyday life in the kitchen should be a little bit easier.

Long-lasting products that combine classic design and sustainability has priority with us. 

We have tested Ragdry Cone with success and the first batch is already on the way.

We are determined to introduce you to more products in the future.

story:
Handcrafted Kitchen Scissors Built on 700 years of Samurai Sword Tradition


ZANMAI Fine Kitchen Scissors effortlessly slice all types of food including meat, fish, and veggies for fun and efficient cooking! 

ZANMAI Fine Kitchen Scissors slice just as well as quality knives. It’s designed with superior blades handcrafted in Seki City, Japan (“The City of Samurai Swords”) with exceptional sharpness, durability, and rust-resistance in mind. It’s a pair that made to last and be treasured. 


Here are our 7 sold features: 
 

1. Made for Heavy Duty Chopping!


 

Made with the finest quality Damascus stainless steel, ZANMAI Fine Kitchen Scissors will be the most durable tool in your kitchen! 

These scissors can effortlessly “chop” hard-to-cut ingredients such as shellfish, large meat, bones, ribs, chicken wings, vegetable roots and anything else you like.  Its knife-life sharpness combined with the convenience of the scissors allow you to cut effortlessly without making too much mess. The blades are made with the same technology and materials as fine kitchen knives, allowing them to cut through lobsters like a piece of cake! 
 

2. Faster and Easier Food-Prep!


 

Do you love to cook? But feels like there isn’t enough time in the day? We’re on the same page.
ZANMAI is here to make your cooking easier and less time consuming. Just take your veggies out of the fridge, rinse, and start chopping right above your pan or pots. Since ZANMAI scissors This saves you not only the time for cooking, but also your kitchen space and cleaning time. You can now spend less time prepping, and more time enjoying your precious, cooked meals! 
 

3. Feel the Smoothness


 

With exceptional sharpness of the blades combined with an ergonomic handle, you can smoothly cut into anything hard or soft from a whole turkey to mini tomatoes. 

We made sure that the overall weight of the scissors is light, yet highly functional. Our handles are not only comfortable to hold, but it is extremely lightweight and designed for an easy precision control. It allows you to maneuver the scissors safely and effortlessly without tiring your hands or struggling to “get the right angle.” 
 

4. Going camping? No problem. 


 

ZANMAI Fine Kitchen Scissors is your new camping buddy for grilling and cooking outdoors! 
Even with a small grill space, you can chop your meat and veggies directly on top of the grill without making too much mess. There is no need to spread out a cutting board and knives on the limited surface of the folding tables. Your outdoor experiences should be as convenient and easy as possible without sacrificing a delicious feast! 
 


 

5. Break it down in 2 pieces for deep cleaning!


 

Keeping the kitchen scissors sanitary can be a challenging task. It tends to grow bacteria and unwanted build-up if you don’t clean the crevices between the blades. The blades can get rusty if you don’t dry them completely after every wash. Since ZANMAI Fine Kitchen Scissors can be easily disassembled into two individual parts, you can separate the blades, and thoroughly wash and dry all surfaces of the scissors. 

We made sure the scissors lock securely when they’re assembled back together, so there is absolutely no risk of them coming apart when in use. 
 

6. Rust-Resistant & High in Durability 


 

Our handles are designed to fit the curvature of your hands with subtle curves where you place your fingers. It’s easy-to-hold, ergonomic, and creates less pressure for your hands and forearms even when you’re utilizing it for a long period.

To bring out the true beauty of Damascus steel, we worked with our swordsmiths to design aesthetically pleasing patterns and elegant textures that are hard to achieve. 
 

7. Uncompromising Design & Functionality


Our handles are designed to fit the curvature of your hands with subtle curves where you place your fingers. It’s easy-to-hold, ergonomic, and creates less pressure for your hands and forearms even when you’re utilizing it for a long period.

To bring out the true beauty of Damascus steel, we worked with our swordsmiths to design aesthetically pleasing patterns and elegant textures that are hard to achieve. 
 


About the Manufacturer


THREE GENERATION OF SAMURAI SWORD MAKING CRAFTSMANSHIP


”Seki Cutlery,” made in Seki City, Gifu Prefecture, is a superior standard of blades recognized by knife users all over Japan and beyond. The town has a long history of swordsmithing since Kamakura period (1192-1333) and has prospered as an origin for the famous swords. 

Marusho Kogyo Company has been manufacturing cutlery in Seki City since 1966. Over three generations, they have developed swords, knives, and scissors with their Samurai sword making techniques as a foundation. Their traditional craftsmanship have been passed down through generations to the modern sword craftsmen, making them one of the world’s leading cutlery production makers in the “The City of Swords.”

 

Story of The “ZANMAI” Collection


“ZANMAI'' in Buddhism means “to be immersed.” Our intention in creating this collection is for the users to be fully immersed into their culinary experience. We believe our cutleries could offer more fun and easy cooking experience for anyone, even for those who aren’t usually the “chefs” in the kitchen! 

ZANMAI Collection is the product of superior craftsmanship developed over three generations of cutlery crafting and consistent innovation, combined with the highest quality Damask stainless steel. We’re able to achieve the highest level of sharpness and durability by incorporating the process called “Shikumi,” where veteran swordsmiths adjust the degree of friction between blades with exquisite force.

We’re now excited to introduce our newest creation - ZANMAI Fine Kitchen Scissors!
 

 

 

Timeline


We're In Production!


Thank you so much for your continuous support! We'd like to let you know that we're in production! And on schedule!

 

Product Specs


◆ZANMAI Fine Kitchen Scissors


Weight: 0.22lb (102g)
Blade Material: Damascus Steel(core:VG-10)
Handle Material: Resin (black)
 

◆ZANMAI Carrying Case

We have designed a special scissor case. Carry it around your belt for extra handiness - it’s right there when you need it. 

Weight：0.09lb (39g)
Length：7.48inch (190mm)
Material：Vegan leather(black)
 

Add-on

◆Ceramic sharpener for maintenance

In response to the requests from our supporters, we have designed a ceramic sharpener as an Add-on! Now offering a special Indiegogo price if purchased with ZANMAI.

Please refer to this video for how-to-sharpen instructions.

 


Risks & Challenge

  • The designs, colors and specifications are subject to change.
  • The shipping time may be delayed depending on the order status, the supply status of the materials, and the manufacturing process. 
  • Due to COVID-19, the production ZANMAI may take longer than our manufacturing schedule.
  • We ask for your understanding in this matter. COVID-1 is affecting delivery and transportation speed, so please keep in mind that the delivery of the ZANMAI may be delayed.
  • If we are successful and the project is funded, we will not be able to offer refunds.
  • Any import taxes and fees will be paid for by the backer.

     

About the Campaign Owner

Our vision: Make Japan Brand No. 1

Neworld inc. is a start-up company that aims to make Japanese brands flourish in the world. Starting with the operation of the EC site "CRAFT STORE" dedicated to those who love Japanese products, we will continue working together with Japanese manufacturing companies in sharing their unique traditions and innovative technologies with the rest of the world. 
 

Actus is one of the only Japanese fluent, all-inclusive crowdfunding agencies in the U.S. who have helped Japanese brands re-established in the U.S. market. Based in Manhattan, NY for over 15 years, Actus offers a solid foundation in e-commerce branding, marketing, sales, customer service, and logistics to ensure the successful launch and long-term growth of the brands.

story:
Risks & Challenges

No project is entirely risk-free, particularly during a global pandemic. Like many other projects our biggest risk is shifting timelines. We can't change what's going on in the world right now but the good news is that our prototypes are ready for production, we just need your support to kick things off. We've been working with the same manufacturing partners since 2008, and our designs are tried, tested and true. The products in this Kickstarter project use the same fundamental design principles as our existing Milo Dutch oven and skillet. These best-sellers are firm fan-favorites and we're excited to unveil this new range of colors you won't find anywhere else.

 

Sustainability Initiatives

1% for the Planet

Through our commitment to 1% for the Planet, Kana has chosen to partner with One Tree Planted, a non-profit organization that focuses on global reforestation. As an environmental charity, they're dedicated to making it easier for individuals and businesses to give back to the environment, create a healthier climate, protect biodiversity and help reforestation efforts around the world. As an ode to our range of cast-iron cookware that has been thoughtfully designed in California, we've decided to focus our reforestation efforts in the Golden State. When you purchase a Milo product from Kana, we will donate a portion of our profits to planting trees in the same place where Milo was designed and imagined.

Thoughtfully Selected Materials

We're committed to working with sustainable and recycled materials that don't compromise on quality.

Recycled Cast Iron: Incorporating 40% reclaimed cast iron reduces our environmental impact and prevents waste from discarded recyclable materials.

Non-Toxic: We use non-toxic materials and we are proud that our cookware is compliant with Proposition 65.

Ethical Manufacturing

We settle for nothing but the highest standards of integrity and quality. Our manufacturing partners are BSCI and ISO certified and have been hand selected based on their commitment to upholding Kana's core values.

BSCI Certified: After two years of research, we carefully selected our BSCI compliant manufacturing partners for their high quality of workmanship and safe working conditions. This ensures that our products are made by employees who are guaranteed fair pay in a safe environment.

ISO Certified: Our manufacturing team is committed to continually improve product quality, the health and safety of employees, and our environmental impact in line with international certifications ISO 9001, ISO 14001 and ISO 45001.

story:
Orthopedic Elevated Air Pillow - No more neck and upper back pain

Minimizes the pressure on pinched nerves, herniated cervical disc, and blood vessels
 

 

 

Watch the air cloud elevate your pillow live

They best way to relieve neck pain and fix poor posture

 

 

 

AirCush™ Tek Air Pump Helps:

  • Adjusts cervix to give you the support you need with just a squeeze of the pump. 
  • Restores the curvature of the neck and eliminates the symptoms associated with tension headaches, pain from neck injuries and arthritis.
  • Reduce snoring by correcting blocked airways. 
  • Sustains the proper curve of your neck and spine to ensure continued good health.

It Stretches and relaxes the neck and shoulder muscles

 

 


Protects Against Bacteria, Dust Mites, Germs & Allergens!

CARBON BAMBOO CHARCOAL - Bamboo charcoal’s activated carbon can absorb toxins, helps prevent mold growth and purifies air by absorbing bad odors and moisture to prevent bacterial growth. Carbon Bamboo charcoal helps eliminates odors, absorbs excess moisture, and regulates temperature. It is also great for people with allergies, asthma, or sensitive skin. 

 

Our Proprietary Activ-Air Technology utilizes 3 different air flow cells in the pillow.  This allows you maximum comfort as well as continued air flow that keeps you cool while you sleep.  The breathable memory foam is enhanced by this increased Ventilated Air Flow while still giving you optimal comfort and support.

Small Air Cells - Keeps pillows structure for years to come.

Medium Air Cells - Positioned around head to reduce sweating during the night. These holes keep you cool and comfortable all night.

Large Air Cells - Positioned under head to help with breathing.      

 


AHH...Thats nice and cold!

Comfortable Ice Gel - Cooling gel foam aims to extend that "cold pillow" feeling throughout the night. The top layer of gel foam contours to your shape and resists body heat to regulate your temperature all through the night.   

 

Cold all night long

Sleep better and wake up feeling more refreshed with your CarbonIce™ Pillow. The incredible cooling properties (Activ-Air) disperse the heat through the large, medium and small air flow channels, releasing it from the pillow helping to lower your body temperature and keeping you cool all night long.  

 

 

 

 


Antimicrobial & Antibacterial

Infused Copper - In Ancient Egyptian times, Copper’s antimicrobial properties were used for healing and maintaining optimal health.  The microscopic copper particles are known to be beneficial for your skin while you sleep.

For skin that means two things: Helping to treat acne and prevent breakouts and aiding the production of collagen, which can help improve elasticity, smooth and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

Copper technology has been tested by NASA for its skin-healing and microbial properties.

Copper has been infused in hospital linens, scrubs, and other medical fabrics to prevent the growth and spread of bacteria. 

 

CarbonIce Air Copper Shield Technology

Copper is known to eliminate 99% of bacteria. Its natural antibacterial and antimicrobial properties are permanently ingrained in our fabrics, which shields the Carbonice air Pillow and protects against, and eliminates, harmful bacteria and other harmful pathogens.
The copper particles also eliminate odor-causing bacteria found on skin, helping prevent acne breakouts and supporting the skin’s natural self-renewal process.

 

 

 

Graphene Cover - Recent studies show that Graphene is an antimicrobial agent in addition to its extraordinary mechanical strength, optical transmittance, electrical conductivity and high specific area properties. It is the world’s strongest known material.

Graphene materials are rapidly emerging as a new class of broad‐spectrum antimicrobial agents. The Graphene Materials are known for antimicrobial colloids, contact‐killing surfaces, release‐killing surfaces, light‐activated disinfectants (i.e., photothermal/photodynamic inactivation). 

All of these properties of the graphene restrict the growth of harmful bacteria, allergens, mold or dust mites that thrive in ordinary pillows.

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Disclaimers

In the process of the preparation of this page, we sought to make the content correct and complete. However, there is no guarantee that there are no errors or omissions in the page. We reserve the right to change specifications of the products mentioned in this page at any time without prior declaration. No part of this page shall be reproduced, transmitted, transcribed or stored in a searchable system or translated into any other languages without the written authorization of our company. The company is not responsible for the loss caused by non-standard or wrong operation.

These statements have not been evaluated by the food and drug administration. This product is not intended to treat, cure, or prevent any disease or snoring. Each customer experience and results may vary.

The information, including but not limited to texts, graphics, images and other material contained on this website is for educational purposes only. The content is not intended in any way as a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified healthcare provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition or treatment and before undertaking a new health care regime, and never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because something you have read on this website.

Z-Comfort, does not guarantee specific results for individuals who use the CarbonIce Air Pillow due to many factors that can influence health and or weight loss.

Please consult doctor before use for:

Using pacemaker or other medical devices which are susceptible to electrical interference;

Being pregnant or at puerperium;

Individual results may vary. No individual results should be considered typical or guaranteed.

*Product model, shape, design and color may vary

It is the customer's responsibility to release and pay any custom's or duties fees for products delivered internationally if applied. Backer is Responsible for ALL VAT & Customs charges that may occur.
story_txt:
Orthopedic Elevated Air Pillow - No more neck and upper back pain
Minimizes the pressure on pinched nerves, herniated cervical disc, and blood vessels   Watch the air cloud elevate your pillow liveThey best way to relieve neck pain and fix poor posture   
AirCush™ Tek Air Pump Helps:

Adjusts cervix to give you the support you need with just a squeeze of the pump. 
Restores the curvature of the neck and eliminates the symptoms associated with tension headaches, pain from neck injuries and arthritis.
Reduce snoring by correcting blocked airways. 
Sustains the proper curve of your neck and spine to ensure continued good health.
It Stretches and relaxes the neck and shoulder muscles  
Protects Against Bacteria, Dust Mites, Germs & Allergens!
CARBON BAMBOO CHARCOAL - Bamboo charcoal’s activated carbon can absorb toxins, helps prevent mold growth and purifies air by absorbing bad odors and moisture to prevent bacterial growth. Carbon Bamboo charcoal helps eliminates odors, absorbs excess moisture, and regulates temperature. It is also great for people with allergies, asthma, or sensitive skin.  Our Proprietary Activ-Air Technology utilizes 3 different air flow cells in the pillow.  This allows you maximum comfort as well as continued air flow that keeps you cool while you sleep.  The breathable memory foam is enhanced by this increased Ventilated Air Flow while still giving you optimal comfort and support.Small Air Cells - Keeps pillows structure for years to come.Medium Air Cells - Positioned around head to reduce sweating during the night. These holes keep you cool and comfortable all night.Large Air Cells - Positioned under head to help with breathing.       
AHH...Thats nice and cold!Comfortable Ice Gel - Cooling gel foam aims to extend that "cold pillow" feeling throughout the night. The top layer of gel foam contours to your shape and resists body heat to regulate your temperature all through the night.    Cold all night longSleep better and wake up feeling more refreshed with your CarbonIce™ Pillow. The incredible cooling properties (Activ-Air) disperse the heat through the large, medium and small air flow channels, releasing it from the pillow helping to lower your body temperature and keeping you cool all night long.      
Antimicrobial & AntibacterialInfused Copper - In Ancient Egyptian times, Copper’s antimicrobial properties were used for healing and maintaining optimal health.  The microscopic copper particles are known to be beneficial for your skin while you sleep.For skin that means two things: Helping to treat acne and prevent breakouts and aiding the production of collagen, which can help improve elasticity, smooth and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.Copper technology has been tested by NASA for its skin-healing and microbial properties.Copper has been infused in hospital linens, scrubs, and other medical fabrics to prevent the growth and spread of bacteria.  CarbonIce Air Copper Shield TechnologyCopper is known to eliminate 99% of bacteria. Its natural antibacterial and antimicrobial properties are permanently ingrained in our fabrics, which shields the Carbonice air Pillow and protects against, and eliminates, harmful bacteria and other harmful pathogens.The copper particles also eliminate odor-causing bacteria found on skin, helping prevent acne breakouts and supporting the skin’s natural self-renewal process.   Graphene Cover - Recent studies show that Graphene is an antimicrobial agent in addition to its extraordinary mechanical strength, optical transmittance, electrical conductivity and high specific area properties. It is the world’s strongest known material.Graphene materials are rapidly emerging as a new class of broad‐spectrum antimicrobial agents. The Graphene Materials are known for antimicrobial colloids, contact‐killing surfaces, release‐killing surfaces, light‐activated disinfectants (i.e., photothermal/photodynamic inactivation). All of these properties of the graphene restrict the growth of harmful bacteria, allergens, mold or dust mites that thrive in ordinary pillows.             DisclaimersIn the process of the preparation of this page, we sought to make the content correct and complete. However, there is no guarantee that there are no errors or omissions in the page. We reserve the right to change specifications of the products mentioned in this page at any time without prior declaration. No part of this page shall be reproduced, transmitted, transcribed or stored in a searchable system or translated into any other languages without the written authorization of our company. The company is not responsible for the loss caused by non-standard or wrong operation.These statements have not been evaluated by the food and drug administration. This product is not intended to treat, cure, or prevent any disease or snoring. Each customer experience and results may vary.The information, including but not limited to texts, graphics, images and other material contained on this website is for educational purposes only. The content is not intended in any way as a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified healthcare provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition or treatment and before undertaking a new health care regime, and never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because something you have read on this website.Z-Comfort, does not guarantee specific results for individuals who use the CarbonIce Air Pillow due to many factors that can influence health and or weight loss.Please consult doctor before use for:Using pacemaker or other medical devices which are susceptible to electrical interference;Being pregnant or at puerperium;Individual results may vary. No individual results should be considered typical or guaranteed.*Product model, shape, design and color may varyIt is the customer's responsibility to release and pay any custom's or duties fees for products delivered internationally if applied. Backer is Responsible for ALL VAT & Customs charges that may occur.

story: Final note. As we want to share our project with the whole world, certain destinations might involve customs fees and duties that are backer’s responsibility and might influence delivery time. While we plan to start shipping all rewards at the same time, some of you will receive them faster, while some later depending on your physical address.

story:
Join the Solid Shower Revolution 

ScrubsUp helps make your life more convenient and greener by helping you move from liquid to solid shower products. All the while eliminating single-use plastic.

Reuseable Case and Solid Shower Bars. No Waste. No Fuss.

About the Case:

  • Made of recyclable plastic
  • Reuseable
  • Durable
  • Dries your bar
  • Leakproof

Simple. 

 

 Pick the colours you want. You can mix and match if you get more than one case.

Full Ingredient list:

Shampoo Bars:

  • Simply Coconut: Coconut Oil, Sodium Coco-Sulfate, Water, Coconut Parfum
  • Fresh Mint: Coconut Oil, Sodium Coco-Sulfate, Water, Mint Parfum

Conditioner Bars:

  • Simply Coconut: Coconut Oil, Steareth-2, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Coco-Caprylate, Quaternium-91, Cetrimonium  Methosulfate,  Irisantheme, Limonene, Coconut Parfum
  • Fresh Mint: Coconut Oil, Limonene, Steareth-2, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Coco-Caprylate, Quaternium-91, Cetrimonium  Methosulfate, Mint Parfum

EVERYTHING Bars:

  • Citrus Burst: Sodium Coco-Sulfate, Coconut Oil, Aqua, Propylene Glycol, Parfum, Sea Salt, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Tartrazine, Limonene,  Linalool, Lemonal, Citronellol, Geraniol
  • Luxury Lavender:Sodium Coco-Sulfate, Cocamide DEA, Coconut Oil, Parfum, Water, Lavender Extract, Rosemary Extract, Nettle Extract, CI 42045, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Linalool

Some of those ingredients sound kind of funky. Are they? Not at all! They are all standard and safe to use, and this is what they do:

  • Sodium Coco-Sulfate: derived from coconut oil, this is a surfactant with excellent cleaning power and known to give shampoo its consistency
  • Limonene: extracted from the peels of oranges and other citrus fruits, this is a commonly used fragrance oil 
  • Citronellol: found in roses and geraniums, this is a citrus-like fragrance used in personal care products
  • Cetearyl Alcohol: a common component of cosmetic products which is used to create smooth creams and stable foams 
  • Behentrimonium Chloride: derived from colza oils, this is a plant-based conditioner which detangles, moisturizes and strengthens hair
  • Coco-caprylate: derived from coconut oils, this is a vegan emollient (which makes things creamy) for cosmetics
  • Steareth-2: a common ingredient in personal care products, which helps everything stick together in the bar
  • Sodium Lauryl-Sulfate: derived from coconut oil, this is a surfactant which helps create a nice lather
  • Cetrimonium Methosulfate: a hair conditioner which aids in detangling
  • Irisantheme: naturally found in brewers yeast, this is a common fragrance ingredient
  • Lemonal: derived from lemongrass and lemon tea-tree, this is a citrus scent with anti-microbial and anti-inflammatory properties
  • Quaternium-91: a hair conditioning agent
  • Tartrazine: a food-grade yellow colouring
  • Propylene Glycol: an effective humectant (attracts water to hair) which helps you nourish your hair
  • Geraniol: found in roses in geraniums, this is commonly used as a fragrance in cosmetics
  • Linalool: derived from lavender, this is a naturally-occurring scent 
  • Benzyl Salicylate: a plant based naturally occurring floral fragrance
  • Hexyl Cinnamal: found in chamomile, this is a commonly used fragrance in cosmetics

Staying clean is important, but it's not always easy to know the best way to do so. Whether it is the cheap stuff that makes your hair feel like hay or the stuff that is eye wateringly expensive the choices available are overwhelming and confusing. At ScrubsUp we keep things simple. We want to keep you clean and your hair healthy. We do that by making sure we keep the ingredients simple and high quality. When it comes to cost, we focus on keeping our bars affordable, so it is easy to make the best choice for you and the planet. 

Wherever life takes you and whatever it throws your way ScrubsUp has you covered. The leakproof seal and robust build makes sure you can throw the case in your bag and not have to worry about any spillage- letting you focus on the important things. 

If instead, you want to keep it in your shower, the lid makes sure your bars can stay dry in the shower, helping them last longer. 

Single-use plastic is bad and it needs to go. By helping you move to solid bars ScrubsUp helps you reduce your plastic footprint. No more single-use bottles, just rinse your case and replace your bar. Easy.

Not only do you cut down on the amount of single-use plastic you use but solid bars help you reduce your carbon footprint. Up to 95% of liquid shower products are made up of water. By not transporting all that water around the world solid bars help you significantly reduce your CO2 footprint.  

At ScrubsUp we believe that clean people should not mean a dirty planet. We created a unique bar case and offer a range of shampoo, conditioner and "everything" bars to help you make the transition to solid shower products! 

This is the clean, convenient and conscious alternative for your daily shower routine. Together, we can make a difference and reduce single-use plastic and CO2 emissions!

 We aren't planning on stopping here! There are so many things in our day to day life that are unnecessarily wasteful and inconvenient. As a result, we already have a pipeline of other ideas for helping you live a more convenient life whilst being more environmentally friendly. We are excited to take our backers along the journey along with us! 

Follow us on social media

Creative Content

Video Editing

Film

Content design

 

Promotional Campaigns:

 

 

Environmental Commitment

Long-lasting design

In order to make sure that the ScrubsUp case is something that you buy once and that lasts for a lifetime, we have made sure to use long-lasting and resistant materials so you don't have to worry about it breaking and leaving you without a way to ScrubUp!

Reusability and recyclability

By making the case out of recycled plastic we will be reducing global plastic waste on two fronts. First by helping people reduce the amount of plastic they are throwing away (by using a single shampoo bar you eliminate the waste of 3 plastic shampoo bottles). The second is by taking the plastic that people have already thrown out and giving it a new life and making the ScrubsUp case!

Risks & Challenges

Doing something new always involves some risks. That being said, we have spent a lot of time thinking about and mitigating the risks that could come our way. Be it from identifying various manufacturing partners to carrying out extensive testing and design reviews to make sure that our final design will work exactly as we want it to and, most importantly, for as long as we want it to!

Obviously, the current COVID-19 crisis continues to change and challenge the world in unexpected ways. We are aware that this could lead to some issues with getting the product in your hands-on time. Never the less we are reassured by the fact that even during the height of the COVID-19 crisis in the UK we still had clear and actionable paths to manufacture available. 

Overall, we want you, our backers, to rest assured that no matter what challenges get thrown our way we will resolve them and get you Scrubbing Up as soon as possible.

story:
With the perfect combinations of design and technologies Balaton Mug  will maintain the perfect temperature for your coffee or tea. Balaton mug maintains the drinks temperature for up to 2 hours so your hot beverage stays perfect.

 

 

Leaving your hot drink on the table has never been so easy and seamless. Do not bother when you come back for a comforting sip it will just remain the same.

 

 

Balaton mug is special as it uses the recent Qi technologies to heat up your favourite morning beverage Besides the temperature control feature,  Qi  can be used as your regular wireless charger for any device. It is cool, right?

 

 

Can you think of a better accessory for your home office or generally the office ? We doubt but still we will understand if you prefer to have some pens and pencils, you still need those right ?

 

 

You have that feeling that sometimes you leave your drink for long time and forget about it?  Well, micro bodies can have fun while you out. That is why the coating of Balaton is antibacterial to protect your drink and mug even when you are not around.

 

 

Besides thanks to its coating Balaton Mug will stay cleaner and have a longer odor-
free life in comparison to other regular mugs.

 

 

Balaton is waterproof, why? Because it is easier to clean! Balaton is safe to hand wash and dishwasher. It is submersible up to 1 meter in water.

 

 

Ohh and by the way the water resistance applies to our coaster as well so don’t worry if you spill some hot tea or coffee on it. Just clean it and then use it again.

 

 

In order to be safe Balaton mug coaster uses special mass sensor. As Safety comes first for Balaton the coaster turns on and off by itself. Just put a mug or your device on it and it will turn on as soon as it senses the presence of an object. Yes our Balaton Mug is very sensitive.

 

 

 

 

 

Shipping Survey (11 Days Post-Purchase)

 

Due to Indiegogo’s 10-day lock period policy, you will automatically receive a survey from us on the 11th day as you placed your order. In the survey besides your shipping address you will also choose your color(s),  and add an engraving to your order! The final shipping price will be calculated and provided to you later.

 

Shipping Process

 

Balaton ships worldwide. We provide customs-friendly shipping worldwide making sure you do not have any duties when your Balaton crosses the borders.

Shipping will be charged via Indiegogo. You will be able to confirm your rewards and shipping address as well.

Also we have some shipping estimates please find the table below:

 

 

* Prices do not include taxes and VAT. That will be subject to the laws and regulations of each individual country. We use customs friendly shipping and we ship worldwide.

** Please note that these are estimates and the actual costs of shipping may vary slightly depending on the circumstances globally at the time of shipping.

story:
MarsCat, a Purrfect Bionic Pet Cat for You

 
 

MarsCat is the world’s first bionic pet cat developed by Elephant Robotics, aiming to be a home robot, a robotic pet to comfort you and surprise you. Just like a real cat, MarsCat is fully autonomous. No extra instruction is needed to control its movements.

It is fully responsive and has sensitive interactions. It can feel your touch, hear your voice, see your face and play with toys. Every MarsCat is unique from its eyes, body to personality, its personality will change according to the way you pet it. With powerful quad-core Raspberry PI, you can also program it easily and give it endless possibilities. 

MarsCat can also be an ideal choice for education, research and commerce. 

 

A Bionic Cat, a Programmable Home Robot with Endless Possibilities

 

Bionic and Independent

MarsCat Surprises You 

You will never know what MarsCat will do next because it is like a real cat, fully autonomous. MarsCat acts independently without any instructions. MarsCat walks, runs, sleeps, sits, stretches, bites nails, kneads and even buries litter although she won’t produce any waste. 

 
 

16 servo motors to make MarsCat more bionic 

Highly Interactive

MarsCat Delights You 

MarsCat is a good companion, it is fully responsive and interactive. It can play with you or your toys because it can feel, hear and see. Touch its head, chin or back to find out what it will react! It can also interact with objects or people nearby, even play with real cats.    

Feel: You can touch its head, jaw and back or even hug it.

Hear: You can talk to MarsCat to order it to walk or come to you, but it will not always follow your command, it has its own feeling.        

See: MarsCat will see you or see its own toys. MarsCat can play Teasers (by moving object recognition), Toy-ball, Toy-fish or find its own bed.      

 
 

Unique and Personality Developing

MarsCat is Shaped by You 

MarsCat is unique from its eyes, body to personality. MarsCat has 6 characters which can be changed. She may be enthusiastic or aloof, energetic or lazy, social or shy. Her personality develops through the way you pet her. 

The factors that express MarsCat’s personality: 

  • Frequency of speaking
  • Enthusiastic or not when having interaction
  • Frequency of movement
  • Tone of sounds…

MarsCat will be more enthusiastic if you interact with her more, be more talkative if you talk to it more…     

 

Open Sourced and Programmable

MarsCat is Redefined by You  

 

MarsCat is open-sourced, we use 4 main threads to process: Vision (qr_code, object_recognition, face_recognition and moving object recognition), Voice (command and volume db), Sensors (gyro sensor, touch sensor and distance sensor) and AI (process all data and do the output actions) . The action will include movements of 16 motors and kinematics + eye-display + sound effect.   

 

You can customize your own MarsCat's eyeball with regular eye color / a blink / a heart / a lightning or anything you like. The API is quite easy to use. Just drop a 128x128 png/jpg file will work.

You can program MarsCat easily and make it with endless possibilities. With powerful quad-core Raspberry Pi, you can create your own applications. MarsCat is also an ideal choice for education, research and commerce.    

  • We are preparing a wireless charger for MarsCat now! MarsCat will have its own bed "charging station". (First version of the rendering for your reference)
  • For all MarsCat's designers, you can now find MarsCat's open source code  from here  → https://github.com/elephantrobotics/marsai
  • We have made an improvement of MarsCat's tail,  the tail will be changed to a rubber coverage, more flexible one.

With MarsCat SDK, you will have access to a huge amount of sensors and actuators at the same time to fulfill your own Cat applications. Also Protocol and library are open-source embedded in Raspberry PI. Everyone can build your own function of cat for education and commercial usages.

The sensors/ actuators you can access includes: 

  • Camera
  • Camera - face, QR code and object recognition
  • Voice Mic
  • Voice - Commands recognition
  • TOF distance laser sensor
  • Multiple Capacitance Touch sensor
  • All 16 servo motors: control angles, speed, torque, ID, and receive the data
  • Sounds - as you want
  • 2 x OLED display on the eye  

Secondary Development

MarsCat will be open sourced after this campaign. We choose to open source because we think every people could be the creator of this new creature, you can customize any functions or applications yourself. Helping everyone enjoy Robots World is what we dream to do.    

Artificial Intelligence

The brain of vertebrates consists of forebrain, midbrain and hindbrain. Animals receive different stimulations (endocrine system) and release different hormones into blood to influence body and behavior through its central nervous system.

As a bionic cat, in ethology, MarsCat should not only sense like a real cat but also behave like a real one. So the classical artificial intelligence is used into MarsCat. It enabled the sequence from sensor to action.     

How Personality Grows

Like a real cat. It has different characters and personalities. Some cats are vivacious, while some are lazy. Some cats are aloof while some are more close to human. Also, some cats are super curious and they meow frequently.

MarsCat is built to allow you to shape its personalities. More interactions with MarsCat will impel it to be more close to you. More conversations with MarsCat will impel it to meow to you often. Every time you touch it, talk to it or even let it see you, will change its personality.

 

Industrial Design

We wanted Mars to be an approachable and instantly likable companion, full of character. However, designing a robotic cat is no easy task. Under its skin, Mars is packed with electronics, motors, gears, batteries, sensors, displays and a structural skeleton with joints. 

All of this adds up to some very challenging space and movement constraints that had to be considered when trying to design a friendly feline exterior. 

 

Our starting point in the industrial design process was the initial form factor and technical envelope, coupled with studies of other toy and cartoon cats, as well as the anatomy of real cats. We went through many iterations of the industrial design, often doing multiple design studies for key parts to evaluate the technical performance as well as the visual proportions and expression.

 

Once we had honed in on a general shape we felt comfortable with, we started looking at the finer details and massaging the design. We also worked hard to reduce the number of visible parts and carefully manage any split lines and assembly features.

Since Mars is essentially one fixed shape, we have developed different colour and pattern schemes to offer users differentiation and customization opportunities.

 

Manufacturing

Since we are a robotic company and we supply automation solutions to customers in the past 4 years. So we decide to produce the MarsCat by our own, and plan to use our robotic arms to manufacture MarsCat in the future.         

Product Specifications

 

How to Pre-order

  • Select a perk in the right side of the page
  • Pick your perk and enter payment info. 
  • After you pledged, we will message you about which color of MarsCat you would like. The default color is WHITE. If you have any more questions, feel free to message us. 

 

Design Process

 

Previous Demo Tests

Test 1: rotation of each angle          

Test 2: walk and run
story_txt:
MarsCat, a Purrfect Bionic Pet Cat for You  

 MarsCat is the world’s first bionic pet cat developed by Elephant Robotics, aiming to be a home robot, a robotic pet to comfort you and surprise you. Just like a real cat, MarsCat is fully autonomous. No extra instruction is needed to control its movements.It is fully responsive and has sensitive interactions. It can feel your touch, hear your voice, see your face and play with toys. Every MarsCat is unique from its eyes, body to personality, its personality will change according to the way you pet it. With powerful quad-core Raspberry PI, you can also program it easily and give it endless possibilities. MarsCat can also be an ideal choice for education, research and commerce.  
A Bionic Cat, a Programmable Home Robot with Endless Possibilities 
 Bionic and IndependentMarsCat Surprises You You will never know what MarsCat will do next because it is like a real cat, fully autonomous. MarsCat acts independently without any instructions. MarsCat walks, runs, sleeps, sits, stretches, bites nails, kneads and even buries litter although she won’t produce any waste.   It may express different emotions by different meows or gestures. Sometimes it may do some amazing things that surprise you and make your day! 16 servo motors to make MarsCat more bionic 

 Highly InteractiveMarsCat Delights You MarsCat is a good companion, it is fully responsive and interactive. It can play with you or your toys because it can feel, hear and see. Touch its head, chin or back to find out what it will react! It can also interact with objects or people nearby, even play with real cats.    
 


 
Feel: You can touch its head, jaw and back or even hug it.Hear: You can talk to MarsCat to order it to walk or come to you, but it will not always follow your command, it has its own feeling.        See: MarsCat will see you or see its own toys. MarsCat can play Teasers (by moving object recognition), Toy-ball, Toy-fish or find its own bed.        Unique and Personality DevelopingMarsCat is Shaped by You MarsCat is unique from its eyes, body to personality. MarsCat has 6 characters which can be changed. She may be enthusiastic or aloof, energetic or lazy, social or shy. Her personality develops through the way you pet her. The factors that express MarsCat’s personality: 
Frequency of speaking
Enthusiastic or not when having interaction
Frequency of movement
Tone of sounds…
MarsCat will be more enthusiastic if you interact with her more, be more talkative if you talk to it more…      Open Sourced and ProgrammableMarsCat is Redefined by You   
 MarsCat is open-sourced, we use 4 main threads to process: Vision (qr_code, object_recognition, face_recognition and moving object recognition), Voice (command and volume db), Sensors (gyro sensor, touch sensor and distance sensor) and AI (process all data and do the output actions) . The action will include movements of 16 motors and kinematics + eye-display + sound effect.     You can customize your own MarsCat's eyeball with regular eye color / a blink / a heart / a lightning or anything you like. The API is quite easy to use. Just drop a 128x128 png/jpg file will work.You can program MarsCat easily and make it with endless possibilities. With powerful quad-core Raspberry Pi, you can create your own applications. MarsCat is also an ideal choice for education, research and commerce.    We are preparing a wireless charger for MarsCat now! MarsCat will have its own bed "charging station". (First version of the rendering for your reference)
 
For all MarsCat's designers, you can now find MarsCat's open source code  from here  → https://github.com/elephantrobotics/marsai

We have made an improvement of MarsCat's tail,  the tail will be changed to a rubber coverage, more flexible one.

Open SDKWith MarsCat SDK, you will have access to a huge amount of sensors and actuators at the same time to fulfill your own Cat applications. Also Protocol and library are open-source embedded in Raspberry PI. Everyone can build your own function of cat for education and commercial usages.The sensors/ actuators you can access includes: 
Camera
Camera - face, QR code and object recognition
Voice Mic
Voice - Commands recognition
TOF distance laser sensor
Multiple Capacitance Touch sensor
All 16 servo motors: control angles, speed, torque, ID, and receive the data
Sounds - as you want
2 x OLED display on the eye  
Secondary DevelopmentMarsCat will be open sourced after this campaign. We choose to open source because we think every people could be the creator of this new creature, you can customize any functions or applications yourself. Helping everyone enjoy Robots World is what we dream to do.    
 Artificial IntelligenceThe brain of vertebrates consists of forebrain, midbrain and hindbrain. Animals receive different stimulations (endocrine system) and release different hormones into blood to influence body and behavior through its central nervous system.As a bionic cat, in ethology, MarsCat should not only sense like a real cat but also behave like a real one. So the classical artificial intelligence is used into MarsCat. It enabled the sequence from sensor to action.     
 How Personality Grows
 Like a real cat. It has different characters and personalities. Some cats are vivacious, while some are lazy. Some cats are aloof while some are more close to human. Also, some cats are super curious and they meow frequently.MarsCat is built to allow you to shape its personalities. More interactions with MarsCat will impel it to be more close to you. More conversations with MarsCat will impel it to meow to you often. Every time you touch it, talk to it or even let it see you, will change its personality. Industrial DesignWe wanted Mars to be an approachable and instantly likable companion, full of character. However, designing a robotic cat is no easy task. Under its skin, Mars is packed with electronics, motors, gears, batteries, sensors, displays and a structural skeleton with joints. All of this adds up to some very challenging space and movement constraints that had to be considered when trying to design a friendly feline exterior.  
 Our starting point in the industrial design process was the initial form factor and technical envelope, coupled with studies of other toy and cartoon cats, as well as the anatomy of real cats. We went through many iterations of the industrial design, often doing multiple design studies for key parts to evaluate the technical performance as well as the visual proportions and expression. 
 Once we had honed in on a general shape we felt comfortable with, we started looking at the finer details and massaging the design. We also worked hard to reduce the number of visible parts and carefully manage any split lines and assembly features.Since Mars is essentially one fixed shape, we have developed different colour and pattern schemes to offer users differentiation and customization opportunities. ManufacturingSince we are a robotic company and we supply automation solutions to customers in the past 4 years. So we decide to produce the MarsCat by our own, and plan to use our robotic arms to manufacture MarsCat in the future.

Pick your perk and enter payment info.

About Us——Elephant Robotics
Elephant Robotics is a technology firm specializing in the design and production of robotics, development and applications of operating system and intelligent manufacturing services in industry, commerce, education, scientific research, home and etc.
On mission to “Enjoy Robots World”, Elephant Robotics has independently developed Collaborative Robots (Elephant Robotics®P/C/E Series) and Bionic Robots (MarsCat). 

The collaborative robots manufactured by Elephant Robotics have been sold to Korea, Japan, the United States, Germany, Italy, Greece and other countries. Under the harsh verification of real working conditions in the companies from the Fortune 500 Companies, the smart solutions and product quality of Elephant Robotics have been unanimously recognized and praised.       
 

 

 
Aiming to bring robots to everyone, we would like to introduce a new creature for you, a bionic pet, a home robot cat from the future.
In the future, Elephant Robotics hopes to open a new chapter of era in automation and intelligence with the joint efforts to our customers and partners.   
 
Why Indiegogo
We need help from you! Backers from Indiegogo are a group of people of innovative, adventurous and rules-breakers. Backers from Indiegogo also enjoy sharing, we are highly interested in your feedback in how you train MarsCat! So we hope to build relationships and communicate directly to these people to get inspirations rather than distributors.
To build a new creature need your help. And to accept a robotic cat from future is for dreamers, like you.

story:
Where do we begin

On average, a person like you and me showers 7 times a week. Meaning, daily.  

Most of the times when we are ready to shower, our towel isn't. 

And that got me thinking… We are few years away from sending humans to Mars, but our everyday essential is still underperforming. 

All it has to do is absorb excess water quickly, dry-out between uses, be durable and soft at the same time. Do we expect too much? 

I’ve tried a good stockpile of different brands, textures and fabrics on the market, but none of them was right. Being a perfectionist for life, I went on a mission to create a life-changer - K-25 - best towels ever, either for hair or body.

 

 

 

It works exactly as real waffles. We all know waffles carry more syrup than pancakes, right?  

  • waffle texture = enhanced surface area for maximum absorption
  • less surface of contact = less damage to hair cuticles and skin cells
  • less friction = less frizz, rush and skin irritations 
  • innovative airy honeycomb pockets let it dry faster than ever as they allow air to flow through
  • pockets are prone to getting flat or ropy

 

Less hair stress, damage, frizz and tangles - your hair is manageable and shiny as never before. All hair types and any hair length.  

Wraps around into a turban easily. Stays on place. Ready to style faster. Exceptionally great to tame naturally curly hair.

 Less tangles = more reasons for baby smiles :)

We offer you the best size options ever created

 

 

COLOR: BROWN

 

Our towels are so luxuriously soft and nicely textured that we found them surprisingly versatile. Use them every time and anywhere: after bath, shower, spa, pool-side or beach

 

Our towels are so luxuriously soft and nicely textured that we found them surprisingly versatile. Use them every time and anywhere: after bath, shower, spa, pool-side or beach

 

PROTOTYPES

It was a long creative process with three variables in hand: fabric weight, pattern and weaving technic. After developing many prototype samples we achieved a perfect balance. This will be the last towel you'll ever want to buy. Why compromise if you need just one towel - simply THE BEST!

 

 

PROJECT TIMELINE

Early September - production starts 

End of October - quality control 

November - final quality control, packing, shipping starts 

December - all backers receive their pledges

 

Easy care 

- Machine wash warm and tumble dry low

- Do not use fabric softeners or bleach 

- Do not iron

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT! 

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

Our highly professional partners are ready to turn their looms on, dye the best quality yarn, and weave the towels according to our requirements. 
We will check quality again and again to ensure all of our backers receive the best towels each time. All videos and photos are of prototypes and small details might be improved in actual production.
As we want to share our project with the whole world, certain destinations might involve customs fees and duties that are backer’s responsibility and might influence delivery time. While we plan to start shipping all rewards at the same time, some of you will receive them faster, while some later depending on your physical address.
As our project involves human factor manufacturing and shipping overseas, force majeure may happen. We will always keep all our backers updated at each stage and if any changes happen.

story:
In the times of IoT, everything seems to be connected and smart. Unfortunately, robot vacuum cleaners available in the market are just not quite there yet. They fall short to completely free up our hands from house cleaning because of their deficiency in obstacle avoidance, deep cleaning, house mapping etc. Neabot NoMo Q11 lifts the AI obstacle avoidance technology to a whole new level. It utilizes 3D scanning & mapping instead of 2D that's widely used by competing products. Together with the most advanced route planning algorithm, Neabot Q11 plans better cleaning routes than any other robot vacuums and achieves an industry-high cleaning rate of 91%. The compact  body, 3.4-inch in height, easily gets under beds and sofas. Its unbeatable suction power of 4000Pa is one of the strongest on the market. When getting on carpet, it automatically boost the suction to give the carpet a much more thorough cleaning. Q11 comes with an interactive APP of its own, on which you can easily set the cleaning areas or the no-go zones. We’ve had noise reduction in mind from day one, so that you and your family can have your life/work undisturbed while Neabot Q11 gets your house cleaned up. In addition to all above wonderful features, the uniqued design of Q11 stands out in a very visually pleasing way.

 

 

 

Thanks for the review from @Byte My Bits!
Neabot Q11 - Max suction, decent mop, auto-emptying!
 

 

 
Thanks for the review from @AdamsTechReviews!
FIRST TEST - Neabot Q11 Robot Vacuum w/ Front Facing LIDAR & Obstacle Avoidance
 
 
Neabot Q11 Robot Vacuum w/ Front Facing LIDAR & Obstacle Avoidance - SPOT Clean + OA Info
 
 
Thanks for the review from @Robot Masters!
 

 

Thanks for the review in German from @SmarthomeAssistent !
neabot NoMo Q11 im Test - Der extrem flache Saugroboter mit Laser in der Front!
 
 

 

 

Built upon the dToF detection technology and 3D imaging algorithm, Neabot Q11's AI obstacle avoidance system features 4 beam LiDARs. As a cutting edge technology widely used in autonomous driving by leading self-driving car makers around the world, Beam LiDAR is characterized by its long detecting range and high imaging fidelity. It helps self-driving cars to see the world more clearly, so that the cars can plan better routes, and detect and avoid obstacles faster and more accurately. With this technology integrated, Neabot Q11 can accurately recognize chair feet, magazines, cables and pet droppings etc. For every cleaning task, Q11 optimizes the cleaning route and avoids obstacles, completing the task in the most effective and efficient manner possible. Q11 can accurately identify all kinds of small objects and stains, and adjust its course of action accordingly. You never have to worry about Q11 smearing dog poop all over your house, or getting tangled up by wires or other small objects.

 

 

 

 

*Q11 may not recognize liquids, but can clean water stains on the floor. 
*Q11 does not have a camera to capture image so your privacy will never be breached. 
*Q11 does not recognize objects under 2cm in height.

 

 

 

 

 

Unlike most robot vacuums with their radar stacked on top, Neabot Q11 hides the Beam LiDARs inside the body, significantly reducing the thickness of the robot. Q11 is merely 3.4” in height and can easily roam under sofas, beds and cupboards etc.

 

 

Traditional robot vacuums go only where you can see, leaving much of your floor unattended. We reduced the height of Neabot Q11 to a mere 3.4" by hiding the LiDARs inside, so that it can go under beds and sofas and such to give your house a much more thorough cleaning it desperately needs.

 

 

 

 

If you ever had a robot vacuum before, it’s quite likely you’ve seen it tumbling down the stairs. That is never going to happen to Neabot Q11, thanks to those 4 most sensitive anti-drop sensors built in. This is a safety measure for the robot itself, your house, but most importantly you and your family.

 

 

 

*NEABOT Q11 can climb on and off carpet from hard floor effortlessly. It can climb over obstacles ≤2cm.

 

 

 

 

The base station also serves as a charging station. Whenever the robot is docked in, it is charging. When the batteries run low in the middle of a task, it automatically goes back to the base station for charging. In addition, the energy dense batteries built in could power the robot for 150-minute vacuuming or cleaning 2100sqft house. So you’ll never have to be concerned about its batteries running low.

 

 

Neabot Q11 not only has a 250ml dust box built in the robot but also has a 2.5L supersize self-emptying dustbin. When the robot finishes a task and goes back to the station, trash in the dust box is transferred into the 2.5L self-emptying dustbin so you don’t have to empty the dust box manually. The collector is big enough for trash of approximately 30 days, although it varies with the size of your house. When it's full, all you need to do is lifting your fingers to take it out.

 

 

 

 

What does it mean for a robot vacuum to have a suction power of 4000Pa? To put it in perspective, most competing products in the market are between 1,000pa and 2,000pa. Neabot Q11 boasts a suction power of 4000Pa. This may seems unreal considering its compact size. But that’s what NEABOT Q11 is.

 

 

 

No matter it’s flour, grains, beans or even marbles, the powerful Neabot Q11 can handle with ease. Wherever Neabot Q11 has scrolled by is spotless. Now you don't have to worry about your kids running around the house bare-footed. Manual vacuuming? Never again!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Semi-Enclosed Leak Proof Structure

The base station of Q11 is in a semi-enclosed structure that prevents water from leaking out of the mop. Water overruns and soaks up your beloved wooden floor? Never happens.

 

HEPA Filter

 

 

 

 

Smooth surfaces such as marble floor needs vacuuming plus wet mopping, while carpets and rugs are best cleaned with stronger suction power. Neabot Q11 has different cleaning plans for them all. On carpets and rugs, it automatically increases suction power to 2500Pa to get rid of dust deep down the plush. On hard floors, the robot automatically decreases the suction to save energy.
* Turn off mopping when vacuuming carpets and rugs.

 

What makes a great cleaning robot? Neabot Q11 sets the bar to a new high. 200 rmp for sweeping, 4000pa for vacuuming and 4-level precision water control for mopping, Q11 is literally an all-rounder. And that is what makes a good cleaning robot.

 

 

 

 

Remote App Control

We've designed an app specifically for Neabot Q11, on which you can monitor & control the robot, schedule cleanings, and set cleaning areas as well as virtual no-go zones even when you're away from home, saving you the trouble of placing physical obstacles to stop the robot for entering certain parts of your house. You can also manually control the robot on Neabot APP, which displays in over 20 languages and voices. We want you to be able to operate the machine in your most familiar language.

 

 

Multi-Floor Mapping

You have a big house of multi-story? That's no problem for Neabot Q11, as our Neabot APP can store up to 3 separate maps. No matter which floor it is on, Q11 will know which map to use and there's no need to do remapping. 

 

 

Bluetooth Assisted Network Configuration

 

While most cleaning robots can only be paired with your smart phone via wifi, which sometimes can be a rather disheartening experience because of failures and delays, Neabot Q11 provides you an alternative, Bluetooth. It’s much simpler, faster and more reliable.

 

 

 

Neabot Q11 has a suction power of 4000Pa, one rarely seen in robot vacuums of comparable size. That doesn't give us reason to settle for less noise cancellation. Instead, we have many smart designs and delicate mechanisms to reduce Q11's noise level, so it'll leave you and your family undisturbed for work, study, a nap, a movie, yoga exercise and even meditation.
*Noise level varies under different work conditions. Under Silent Mode, 650pa suction, Neabot Q11 is 65dB.

 

 

 

Unboxing Video
 
Neabot App Introduction

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Learn More

 

Who Are We?


Neabot Tech Co.,Limited was founded in 2018 with a mission of providing every household better home cleaning experience. We have one single minded purpose – empower people to spend more time on things they love and less time on chores. Neabot launched its first NoMo N1 on Kickstarter in May 2020. Neabot products can be found in 15+ countries in North America, Asia and Europe. We are developing new products and several of them will be launched in 2021. Neabot has offices in Shenzhen, China and Los Angeles, USA.

 

 

 

FAQ

1. Warranty

Neabot warrants that the robot & self-emptying dustbin shall be free from defects in material and workmanship for a period of one (1) year from the date of purchase when it is used under normal household conditions and maintained according to the requirements outlined in the User Guide.
Note: As far as applicable laws permit, the warranty period will not be extended or renewed or otherwise affected due to subsequent exchange, resale, repair or replacement of the Product.
If you wish to make a warranty claim, please contact us via support@neabot.com
Note: Please provide your order information in the email.

2. Return Policy

Please understand that we only accept returns for quality reason. Any returns due to no reason or without notification will be refused.
All products must be returned in good condition, in original boxes (whenever possible), and with all accessories.
If you receive a damaged or defective product, contact Neabot team within 30 days of delivery via email: support@neabot.com. Please have your order number available when you contact us.

3. Return Address

Neabot have warehouse located in Europe, Japan, United States. We will provide the address via email if needed. If you live outside of these places, please contact us via support@neabot.com.

4. Do you ship worldwide ?

Unfortunately, we currently only support shipment to the countries and areas as followed:
Asia: Japan
North America : United States, Canada
Europe: all EU countries. UK is not included.

5. Do I need to pay extra delivery fees ?

Yes, the delivery fee is not included in the product price. The standard freight is $29. (The size and weight of this product are relatively large, even bigger than Neabot N1. In fact, the shipping cost will be much more expensive than $29.)

6. What about the customs fees ？

Normally, you won't be charged with custom duties since Neabot Q11 will shipped to our overseas warehouses first in bulk. However, if you ever encounter this issue, please contact us via support@neabot.com and we will cover any potential custom duties.

7. What power-outlet will you ship to Denmark?

Yes, we will ship to Denmark. It's standard EU voltage and plug. 

8. Could you please list how this model is better/different than the previous Neabot?

Q11 is much better/different than N1 (the first Neabot) in many ways.

a. It uses hidden LiDAR and dToF technology, which raises its obstacle avoidance capability to a whole new level. For example, N1 might pushes your slippers, Q11 won't. It can detect any obstacle as long as it's taller than 2cm.

b. The suction power - Q11 is 4000Pa, the max on the market. N1 is 2700Pa.
c. Q11 features a 300ml water tank, meanwhile N1 doesn't have mopping feature, N1Plus as but it's not electric controlled water tank.

d. Q11 saves 3 maps. N1 saves 1 map.

e. Q11 is slimmer, quieter and a very different design.

f. The cleaning efficiency rate is higher than N1 too. It's 91%, which is top of the industry.

*Q11 may not recognize liquids, but can clean water stains on the floor. *Q11 does not have a camera to capture image so your privacy will never be breached. *Q11 does not recognize objects under 2cm in height.

 
    Unlike most robot vacuums with their radar stacked on top, Neabot Q11 hides the Beam LiDARs inside the body, significantly reducing the thickness of the robot. Q11 is merely 3.4” in height and can easily roam under sofas, beds and cupboards etc.  Traditional robot vacuums go only where you can see, leaving much of your floor unattended. We reduced the height of Neabot Q11 to a mere 3.4" by hiding the LiDARs inside, so that it can go under beds and sofas and such to give your house a much more thorough cleaning it desperately needs.    If you ever had a robot vacuum before, it’s quite likely you’ve seen it tumbling down the stairs. That is never going to happen to Neabot Q11, thanks to those 4 most sensitive anti-drop sensors built in. This is a safety measure for the robot itself, your house, but most importantly you and your family.   *NEABOT Q11 can climb on and off carpet from hard floor effortlessly. It can climb over obstacles ≤2cm.    The base station also serves as a charging station. Whenever the robot is docked in, it is charging. When the batteries run low in the middle of a task, it automatically goes back to the base station for charging. In addition, the energy dense batteries built in could power the robot for 150-minute vacuuming or cleaning 2100sqft house. So you’ll never have to be concerned about its batteries running low.  Neabot Q11 not only has a 250ml dust box built in the robot but also has a 2.5L supersize self-emptying dustbin. When the robot finishes a task and goes back to the station, trash in the dust box is transferred into the 2.5L self-emptying dustbin so you don’t have to empty the dust box manually. The collector is big enough for trash of approximately 30 days, although it varies with the size of your house. When it's full, all you need to do is lifting your fingers to take it out.    What does it mean for a robot vacuum to have a suction power of 4000Pa? To put it in perspective, most competing products in the market are between 1,000pa and 2,000pa. Neabot Q11 boasts a suction power of 4000Pa. This may seems unreal considering its compact size. But that’s what NEABOT Q11 is.   No matter it’s flour, grains, beans or even marbles, the powerful Neabot Q11 can handle with ease. Wherever Neabot Q11 has scrolled by is spotless. Now you don't have to worry about your kids running around the house bare-footed. Manual vacuuming? Never again!         Semi-Enclosed Leak Proof StructureThe base station of Q11 is in a semi-enclosed structure that prevents water from leaking out of the mop. Water overruns and soaks up your beloved wooden floor? Never happens. HEPA Filter    Smooth surfaces such as marble floor needs vacuuming plus wet mopping, while carpets and rugs are best cleaned with stronger suction power. Neabot Q11 has different cleaning plans for them all. On carpets and rugs, it automatically increases suction power to 2500Pa to get rid of dust deep down the plush. On hard floors, the robot automatically decreases the suction to save energy.* Turn off mopping when vacuuming carpets and rugs. What makes a great cleaning robot? Neabot Q11 sets the bar to a new high. 200 rmp for sweeping, 4000pa for vacuuming and 4-level precision water control for mopping, Q11 is literally an all-rounder. And that is what makes a good cleaning robot.    Remote App ControlWe've designed an app specifically for Neabot Q11, on which you can monitor & control the robot, schedule cleanings, and set cleaning areas as well as virtual no-go zones even when you're away from home, saving you the trouble of placing physical obstacles to stop the robot for entering certain parts of your house. You can also manually control the robot on Neabot APP, which displays in over 20 languages and voices. We want you to be able to operate the machine in your most familiar language.  Multi-Floor MappingYou have a big house of multi-story? That's no problem for Neabot Q11, as our Neabot APP can store up to 3 separate maps. No matter which floor it is on, Q11 will know which map to use and there's no need to do remapping.   Bluetooth Assisted Network Configuration While most cleaning robots can only be paired with your smart phone via wifi, which sometimes can be a rather disheartening experience because of failures and delays, Neabot Q11 provides you an alternative, Bluetooth. It’s much simpler, faster and more reliable.   Neabot Q11 has a suction power of 4000Pa, one rarely seen in robot vacuums of comparable size. That doesn't give us reason to settle for less noise cancellation. Instead, we have many smart designs and delicate mechanisms to reduce Q11's noise level, so it'll leave you and your family undisturbed for work, study, a nap, a movie, yoga exercise and even meditation.*Noise level varies under different work conditions. Under Silent Mode, 650pa suction, Neabot Q11 is 65dB.   Unboxing Video Neabot App Introduction

 
  

 

 

 

 

 




 



 

Learn More





 Who Are We?Neabot Tech Co.,Limited was founded in 2018 with a mission of providing every household better home cleaning experience. We have one single minded purpose – empower people to spend more time on things they love and less time on chores. Neabot launched its first NoMo N1 on Kickstarter in May 2020. Neabot products can be found in 15+ countries in North America, Asia and Europe. We are developing new products and several of them will be launched in 2021. Neabot has offices in Shenzhen, China and Los Angeles, USA.   FAQ1. WarrantyNeabot warrants that the robot & self-emptying dustbin shall be free from defects in material and workmanship for a period of one (1) year from the date of purchase when it is used under normal household conditions and maintained according to the requirements outlined in the User Guide.Note: As far as applicable laws permit, the warranty period will not be extended or renewed or otherwise affected due to subsequent exchange, resale, repair or replacement of the Product.If you wish to make a warranty claim, please contact us via support@neabot.comNote: Please provide your order information in the email.2. Return PolicyPlease understand that we only accept returns for quality reason. Any returns due to no reason or without notification will be refused.All products must be returned in good condition, in original boxes (whenever possible), and with all accessories.If you receive a damaged or defective product, contact Neabot team within 30 days of delivery via email: support@neabot.com. Please have your order number available when you contact us.3. Return AddressNeabot have warehouse located in Europe, Japan, United States. We will provide the address via email if needed. If you live outside of these places, please contact us via support@neabot.com.4. Do you ship worldwide ?Unfortunately, we currently only support shipment to the countries and areas as followed:Asia: JapanNorth America : United States, CanadaEurope: all EU countries. UK is not included.5. Do I need to pay extra delivery fees ?Yes, the delivery fee is not included in the product price. The standard freight is $29. (The size and weight of this product are relatively large, even bigger than Neabot N1. In fact, the shipping cost will be much more expensive than $29.)6. What about the customs fees ？Normally, you won't be charged with custom duties since Neabot Q11 will shipped to our overseas warehouses first in bulk. However, if you ever encounter this issue, please contact us via support@neabot.com and we will cover any potential custom duties.7. What power-outlet will you ship to Denmark?Yes, we will ship to Denmark. It's standard EU voltage and plug. 8. Could you please list how this model is better/different than the previous Neabot?Q11 is much better/different than N1 (the first Neabot) in many ways.a. It uses hidden LiDAR and dToF technology, which raises its obstacle avoidance capability to a whole new level. For example, N1 might pushes your slippers, Q11 won't. It can detect any obstacle as long as it's taller than 2cm.b. The suction power - Q11 is 4000Pa, the max on the market. N1 is 2700Pa.c. Q11 features a 300ml water tank, meanwhile N1 doesn't have mopping feature, N1Plus as but it's not electric controlled water tank.d. Q11 saves 3 maps. N1 saves 1 map.e. Q11 is slimmer, quieter and a very different design.f. The cleaning efficiency rate is higher than N1 too. It's 91%, which is top of the industry.

story:
Don't Tread on Me and Taxation is Theft PVC Coasters

Hey! It's The Pholosopher here. I have a new set of amazing products for this month's Pholosopher's Market offering.

Products

I have a Don't Tread on Me Eastern Dragon coaster and a Taxation is Theft coaster.

The coasters are made of heat-resistant PVC material, 100mm wide, 4mm thick, with a strong non-slip backing.

They are flexible and easy to clean with mild soap and water.

I also am offering a 3-inch PVC keychain of my avatar character holding an AR. Great for range bags and backpacks!

 

 

Production

I have already produced the products and they are ready to ship once the campaign closes fully, so you can back with confidence.

​Shipping

Due to increased shipping costs and difficulties, we are currently unable to ship product internationally or to Hawaii or Alaska. We can only ship to the continental US. We do hope to be able to provide service to those areas in the future. If you support from one of those areas, we will refund your contribution in full.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you don't have change to spare, you can share the campaign to let others know that there are some AWESOME patches and keychains available, the purchase of which helps me produce more content educating others on the right to bear arms and human freedom!

So thank you for your support!

~Pho ^^
