story:
We're excited to present our latest towel with zero-twist technology. Simply put, it's the finest towel we've had the pleasure of using to date.

Our Japanese manufacturer has decades of experience. Working together we have selected the finest cotton for purpose and zero twist softness.

Inspiring peace and tranquility to create the perfect balance of form and function - without compromise. Get ready to upgrade your bathroom to a spa-like oasis. Every. Single. Day.

 
 That's where Sento 2 comes in, introducing the towels fit for an emperor or empress.
 We have chosen only the finest natural materials and implemented specialized manufacturing techniques developed in Japan. Relentlessly pursuing the finest methods to create a product of the utmost quality.   
 

 
 The Japanese zero-twist design is luxuriously soft, super absorbent, quick drying and so effortlessly fluffy and light it feels like a cloud.
 We know you will love it too!
 

 
 The Japanese have been perfecting the art of towel making for hundreds of years. Used by the upper class of society in the 17th Century including the Samurai. 
 They still carry on this tradition focusing on superior craftsmanship and simplicity.
 

 
 Like all Sento products, our new towels are packed full of features and meticulously engineered. They are designed from the ground up to be both the best bath towels and the best everyday towels on the planet.
 

 

 
 Regular terry loop towels typically twist their cotton strands repeatedly, forming thick rope-like loops. These thick strands are much easier (and lower cost) to work with. 
 

 
 Sento's premium zero twist design allows the natural cotton fibers to remain loose and fluffy. The intricate and time consuming process of working with zero twist fibers is very rewarding, as it yields towels unbelievably gentle and soft. The effortless elegance is quickly apparent to anyone who experiences the towel.
 

 
 Inspired by our passion for the finer things in life, Japanese craftsmanship and attention to detail.

 
 Many towels are made of cotton, but the look and feel of towels largely depends on what type of cotton is used. Towels designed and priced for everyday use are made of sub-standard methods.
 

 
 Sento is made with true Zero Twist yarns designed to leave the cotton fibers free. The result is a fabric with an extra fluffy texture that maintains an airy softness, evoking the feel of a cloud.
 

 
 Sento fabric is ultra-soft, super-fluffy and designed for high-end spas and hotels with it's luxurious look and feel.  
 

 
 The zero twist process allows each cotton fiber to retain its natural texture – and its luxurious softness – allowing the fabric to remain ‘open’ to the air.
 

 
 The openness greatly increases absorbency allowing air to permeate the fabric, moisture simply disappears and the towel dries quickly after each use.
 While the towel is remarkably voluminous, full of high quality cotton, it remains incredibly light for its size. 
 

 
 Once we discovered its effect on our prototype towels we knew our next project had to be Zero Twist.
 

 
 Sento 2 achieves unprecedented softness. It really needs to be experienced to be believed.
 

 
 Every single Sento towel is made with painstaking dedication to achieve industry leading perfection.
 

 
 Harsh water containing undesirably minerals and heavy metals can damage towels during production. Sento uses only the softest water sourced from the mountains is used to create our towels.
 

 
 Sento was born and raised on Kickstarter. In 2016 we launched the Sento Towel. Thanks to our incredible backers and supporters, over 20,000 people worldwide now enjoy our products every day.  
 

 
 Where We Are
 Our second towel project has been heavily tested and refined with over a year of development. We have developed strong and stable partnerships with local craftspeople and supply chains. We are ready to go!
 We have a design that has been heavily tested and refined at every step along the way. We have partnered with craftspeople, factories and raw material suppliers in Japan and built a strong supply chain network. We are ready to go!  
 

 
  What We Need  

We need the help of the Crowd Funding community to raise $15,000 in order to fund the first production run of the Sento 2 towel sets. The funds will be used for initial Sento 2 towel production run including purchasing the materials, skilled labor, and The project has been budgeted to succeed at levels above this.
 

 
 By backing this project you are helping make it a reality. So as an added bonus, any backer who shares this project will receive a free 100% cotton Japanese Tea Towel!
 So please share this project via social media, email and word of mouth to tell your friends and family about our campaign. Thank you in advance!  
Click the share button at the top of the page! Then message us to let us know you have shared.
 

 
 We are a group of designers and entrepreneurs with a connection to Japan. We love making quality products and hope to bring minimalism and craftsmanship to all our designs.


 Join us on our journey to bring great products to the world.


 

 
  This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 600+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $300MM raised between them.

 
 Machine wash with cold water and mild detergent. No bleach or fabric softeners. Hang or tumble dry low. Strong threads means this won't wear down easily or come apart.     
 To dry, hang in a dry place. Their absorbency makes Japanese towels especially quick to dry. You can also tumble dry them on gentle or low cycle. 
  The great thing is the more you use them, the softer, fluffier, and gentler they become.
 Thank you!  We ♥︎ you.... Sento (話した )

story:
i-Flame Diffuser

"The 1st visualizing aroma diffuser in the world"

i-flame diffuser

The Story

This is our first project, and how it comes?

What sparkled and triggered me to invent this “i-Flame Diffuser”? The spark came from one incident that happened one morning.  It was an ordinary morning when I switched on my toaster for making breakfast, the toaster sparkled and flickered with flame out of the blue. Dangerous it was, I know, but it was awkwardly mesmerizing to watch the spark and flare flickering from the toaster. From there, I wondered how I could turn this actual enthralling and fascinating flame into a functional product that could mimic that beguilingly relaxing moment. 

After putting tremendous effort and carrying out countless experiments on R&D, I created this “i-Flame Diffuser” by integrating virtual flame into an essential oil diffuser.

This is the story of the “i-Flame Diffuser”, from turning a fancy thought into an authentic useful product.

 

We try the best to design...

 

Start as sketches and allows us to generate the ideas quickly, sharing and discussing with our teammates, focusing on the form, creativity and iteration. Trying to explore more than one precise depiction of single concept, end up as a 2D&3D drawings before going into next stage-prototyping.

 

 

 

Finally....we make several prototypes and find the most significant fire visualization, to get a good one done. Once our first prototype is built, we find some flaws and that to be corrected before we seek a patent. In the promotion film, we eventually make a prototype that replicates our actual fire effect.

Differences between aroma diffusers in the market

Our i-flame diffuser not only functions as an aromatherapy diffuser, but it also serves as a great device for visual sensation and relaxation. There are eight different flame colors for you to choose from.

When you wake up in the morning, you can still enjoy the fragrance that lingers in your bedroom.

While doing yoga or meditation, it will be your great companion as it helps you de-stress effectively and efficiently.

Apart from using it indoors, it can be used outdoors with a power bank.

You can simply put it in your bag and it’s ready to go! It goes well with the nature, too!

It is extremely easy to use. Simply take out the case, fill up the tank with water and add a few drops of essential oil in it.

We can play it in indoor or outdoor

various color of flames can conveys your mood

 

Home deco

Party time

This is the moment....

 

 

Beyond of your imagination... 

Family time

It is fun and safe for children to use, too. The artificial flame that the diffuser projects and the scented mist that the diffuser generates turn out to be a great way for sensory and imaginary play for children. It is also a great companion for children at bedtime.

Figure photography 

Using the diffuser by creating scenic images for play, to make plastic figurines seem like they’re very much alive. Whether they’re interacting with massive real world objects in funny ways , the shots convey a surprising realism given that you know, beyond a doubt, you’re staring at little plastic toys.

Pet lover

A person who likes domestic pets, cats are highly intelligent, naturally curious, and active creatures. We need to make sure to provide them with plenty of mental and physical stimulation. Provide them with appropriate resources so they can play, and have control over their social interactions.

i-flame is definitely another hot pick items for them

 

 

Function

COLOR ASSORTMENT

ＷＨＩＴＥ

ＢＬＡＣＫ

ＢＬＵＥ＆ＰＩＮＫ

ＰＵＲＰＬＥ＆ＹＥＬＬＯＷ

ＷＯＯＤＥＮ　ＰＲＩＮＴ

SUMMARY OF THE ASSORTMENTS

 

 

 

 

Our Schedule

 

OUR TEAM

We are working in different field & epoch will have the same believes –design an innovative idea and build a product to solve problems in the society.

3 of us are alumni of Hong Kong Polytechnic University (world university ranking 66), the place that allowing us to develop our design strengths with a uniquely international cultural awareness at both professional and social levels. Thus, we believe we can work closely together to steer positive change in all aspect.

When the fund crowding success, we will focus on developing newer product line and maintain the exiting brand synchronous. So we start at a team –ND team for never-ending story

ENJOY!

story:
SMATE 360 is a state-of-the-art, four-blade, waterproof electric razor with a high-power, long-lasting motor from Japan and a USB-C rechargeable battery. 

SMATE 360 uses an 8-direction foil head, 8,000 RPM cutting motor and Voronoi geometry to give you the closest, cleanest shave in as little time as possible. Plus, it’s easy to clean and only requires one charge per month.

 

SMATE 360’s premium Steel Cutter is made from Anlai Stainless Steel, the same steel used for making surgical scalpels and special knives. It has a hardness rating of 60HRC, meaning it’s REALLY tough and durable.

This supreme shaving machine combines 4 blades with an 8-direction foil head and 8,000 rpm motor to give you the fastest, gentlest shave ever. 8000rpm x 4 blades = 32,000 cutting actions per minute and 100% satisfaction. Get the smoothest shave in under 2 minutes!

Leading electric shavers max out at a 30º angle. SMATE gives you a 27º angle for the smoothest shave ever. We designed SMATE 360 using Voronoi geometry to create the perfect shaving angle for ultimate efficiency and closeness.

Okay, Wait a Second. Voronoi Geometry?

Yeah, we said it. We achieved the closest shave possible by applying Voronoi Geometry principles to SMATE 360’s blade angle. To get the blade as close as possible without being too close for comfort, we used insight from the Voronoi diagram, named after Russian mathematician Georgy Voronoy.

Voronoi diagrams separate points into sections so that each point is closest to just 1 other point and no others. Point A (the blade) gets as close as possible to Point B (hairs), without coming too close to point C (skin).

It’s not the “most efficient shave ever” if you have to lather up with shaving cream—which is why you don’t. The SMATE 360 works the same whether you’re wet, dry or using shaving cream. It’s rated IPX7 waterproof so you can shave in the shower and clean it under running water.

No more dreading your daily shave or nicking yourself in a rush.

The 4 cutter system and 8 active directional foil head gives you a smooth shave without sharp edges.

The average man spends over $100 per year on disposable razor blades and more than 2 billion are thrown away annually. Switching to SMATE 360 means no more changing your razor blade every week.

SMATE 360’s motor lasts 10 years. All you have to do is replace the outer head 1 year and the inner head every 2 years. With that kind of reliability, it’s no wonder the affordable price tag stirs competition in the shaving industry!

Hate shaving when you're in a rush or late to work? Not to worry. Looking good doesn’t have to take a huge chunk of your morning, just 180 seconds.

SMATE 360’s durable Anlai steel blades move at 32,000 clips per minute to give you a spotless shave in 3 minutes, every time. And you don’t have to worry about missing a patch when you’re a little distracted—the 27º angle shaves all the spots other razors miss.

SMATE 360 does more than cut down your shaving time.

And when you forget to charge it? SMATE 360’s lithium-ion battery lasts 30 days without charge and uses a Type C USB port for the most convenient charging. It’s also equipped with a LED light indicator to notify you when the battery is low.


The SMATE 360 was created to fit into your busy life. You get a gentle shave, free of bumps, cuts and pain without any water. Shave dry, wet, with or without shaving cream, or even in the shower.

  

Let your skin adjust to a shave this good.

Your beard and skin will need time to adjust to a shave so close. This is normal. As a result, your face may feel a bit sensitive after a shave in the first few weeks of use.


Don't worry though! Give it time and you'll experience the full joy of the closest, fastest shave you'll ever get. 

No need to purchase disposable razors *just* for your upcoming trip. Packing your “shaving tools” has never been easier.

SMATE 360 is both TSA and carry-on friendly, and there’s no need for shaving cream, extra razors or batteries. Packing it is as easy as clicking your razor into “Travel Lock” mode to prevent it from going off accidentally—so you don’t have a dead battery or an awkward encounter at security.

The Four-head razor body uses a metal-brushed aluminum alloy shell that won’t leave fingerprints or fade, so it always looks top of the line. And the anti-scratch rubber hand-grip prevents the shaver from slipping out of your hand during use.

Backing SMATE 360 isn’t just a pledge, it’s a step towards a life with less time-consuming “necessary evils” like shaving with a single-use razor, and more personal time and freedom. We don’t just want you to have a better shave. We want shaving to be the best part of your personal care routine.

We have a 1-year warranty period. If there are any issues with the product, you can send a service request to support@smateofficial.com with the receipt, serial number, detailed description on the problem and a photo or video attached. We will repair or replace the unit if the manufacture or workmanship are found to be defective or malfunction. This limited warranty does not cover damage resulting from abuse, accident, misuse, and improper storage.


SMATE is a personal care company with a mission to provide highly-efficient, easy to use products that make their customers feel beautiful inside and out.
story_txt: SMATE 360 is a state-of-the-art, four-blade, waterproof electric razor with a high-power, long-lasting motor from Japan and a USB-C rechargeable battery. SMATE 360 uses an 8-direction foil head, 8,000 RPM cutting motor and Voronoi geometry to give you the closest, cleanest shave in as little time as possible. Plus, it’s easy to clean and only requires one charge per month. SMATE 360’s premium Steel Cutter is made from Anlai Stainless Steel, the same steel used for making surgical scalpels and special knives. It has a hardness rating of 60HRC, meaning it’s REALLY tough and durable.This supreme shaving machine combines 4 blades with an 8-direction foil head and 8,000 rpm motor to give you the fastest, gentlest shave ever. 8000rpm x 4 blades = 32,000 cutting actions per minute and 100% satisfaction. story:
TidyBoard streamlines your food prep by placing strainers, catches and containers on the end of the cutting board. Easily chop fruits or veggies without mixing scraps. Strain hands-free and effortlessly clean up with a swipe of your hand.

The hanging design and collapsible containers maximize countertop space and make food prep fast and fun!

Do you cook in a tiny kitchen?

By hanging off the edge of the countertop or over the sink, TidyBoard utilizes previously unused space. 

In addition, the collapsible containers save over 50% of drawer and cabinet space, making it compact in use and in storage. 

The cutting board acts as a lever to help hold the weight of the catch. TidyBoard’s bamboo is antibacterial and maintains durability for years on end. TidyBoard is lightweight and made from the finest eco-friendly materials.

The large catch and containers have volumetric and measuring marks. Put food waste or chopped up food directly into containers for quick cutting and prep. The containers are also collapsible for efficient storage.

The strainers nest into the end of the board for cleaning or straining directly into the sink or catch — hands-free. The Strainers are all collapsible making them compact for storage.

Lids come included to make food storage easy in the containers. The lids snap-on directly to the containers and have a vent which allows them to be microwavable. Clean it. Cut it. Store it.

The lids also have a vent release for steaming veggies in the microwave.

The TidyBoard was mindfully influenced by math and physics. Our board is engineered as a lever to stay steady even with a heavy load in the containers.

TidyBoard can hold up to 9 lbs of food in its container while hanging off your counter.

Cook and prep with ease. TidyBoard scientifically brings perfect balance to your prep. 

We’ve all experienced the cluttered counter and prepped foods mixed with food waste.

TidyBoard keeps you organized and your kitchen clean. Never worry about where to put scraps or discarded produce — keep your space clean and orderly with TidyBoard.

See the difference TidyBoard makes. Say goodbye to chaotic cooking and welcome spick and span prep.

Not only is TidyBoard cleverly designed, the quality of materials is nothing but the best.

TidyBoard uses eco-friendly Bamboo. The lightweight 4 lbs of the bamboo wood won't dull knives, harbor bacteria, or absorb unwanted flavors and odors.

The containers are constructed out of BPA-free Food Grade Silicone and are microwave friendly, convenient for storage and organization.

You can choose your color once the campaign is over. We will send you a survey to pick your color of choice! 

TidyBoard cares about healthy eating, and we want to encourage everyone to cook fresh ingredients! We see TidyBoard making it easier to cook at home and helping prepare meals to-go, saving money and eating better when away from home.

We want to help connect people to their food and Mother Earth! Buying food locally at Farmers Market’s helps reduce the carbon emissions during long transportation journeys as well as the added packaging materials you typically see at markets.

With TidyBoard, cooking and eating locally grown foods can be easier and faster. Plus, the catch makes it super easy to compost all your food waste. Cut it, clean it, store it, compost it, and make our world more sustainable!

The TidyBoard Team are friends from college who lived together in a small apartment with a small kitchen counter to work on. It was constantly a mess with ingredients and no space, so we came up with TidyBoard! Next came testing different prototypes and many hours of us doing 3-D drawings on Auto-CAD and patent research. We bought a 3-D printer and started testing. We then met our main man Eddie, a master of manufacturing. He helped us turn our original solid plastic design into a collapsible silicone design and here we are now!

We are happy to bring this vision to reality!

Matthew is a goofy engineer who loves all things outdoors and creating new inventions!

Mark is a master of making businesses successful and loves spending time with family making delicious dinners!

William is the beloved brother who helped prototype and came up with the name TidyBoard!

 

A global team of Certified Kickstarter & Indiegogo Experts. LaunchBoom is the top crowdfunding marketing agency with the proven formula for crowdfunding success.

 This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.

story:
After learning that a 2010 study by the journal Experimental Physiology found that men generally sweat more than their female counterparts, we knew that Jax Sheets needed to be highly absorbent and breathable. The breath-ability prevents excess sweating, and the absorbency helps keep you dry, allowing your body to stay at the perfect temperature all night long.

When it came to smoothness, we made sure you will have a silk-level experience while sleeping on Jax Sheets. Smoothness and softness are essential for every sex, but more so for men, because they tend to have more body hair and sleep with fewer clothes on. So by having a smooth and soft surface, their overall sleep experience would be improved.

Would you sleep on your toilet? Did you know that after one week of sleeping on your sheets, your bed has 17,442 times more bacteria than your toilet seat and 24,631 times more bacteria than your bathroom door handle? Yeah, your sheets are gross. On top of that, a survey found that men ages 18-25 wash their sheets four times in a year, and the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics found that on average, men do 1/4th the amount of laundry as women. This fact means that these sheets are only being washed once per month. When we discovered these numbers, we realized that it meant we had to make sure our sheets have powerful anti-bacterial features, and we did just that. Our sheets will stay cleaner for longer and require less washing. The anti-bacterial fabric keeps the bed sheets clean while helping your skin stay bacteria and acne-free.

When it comes to washing sheets, most people don't know how to do so correctly, and that leads to pilling. While developing Jax Sheets, we had to make sure our sheets were pill-resistant, making it possible to throw them in with your regular laundry load without risking the destruction of the material. 

Have you ever gone to sleep and had your sheets slip off the edge in the middle of the night? Well, we have and so have many others. When there is more weight on a bed, it expands and contracts more, which makes it easier for the sheets to slide off the mattress and disturb your sleep. Don't worry; we fixed this issue by doubling our elastic and making it adjustable, so no one has to be attacked by their sheets in the middle of the night.  

Dermatologists recommend that, unless you like acne, you should wash your pillowcase every 2-3 days. This message has been ignored by guys who only wash their sheets once per month. As mentioned above, what's even worse than once per month is that many guys between the ages of 18-25 reported only washing their sheets four times a year. Thanks to its anti-bacterial properties, Jax Sheets  pillowcases can help keep your face breakout free when you wake up in the morning. 

Jax Sheets, unlike other cotton-based sheets, do not have to be changed with the seasons. Jax Sheets are naturally thermo-regulating, which means that they can keep you cozy when it's cold outside and keep you from overheating when it's warm. 

We developed Jax Sheets to fix the senseless problems that we see in other pillowcases and sheets. Our pillowcase has the opening at the top rather than the side, that way putting in a pillow doesn't require a lot of effort and force. Originally, when we tried out a duvet cover, we couldn't imagine how annoying it could be to use. Putting in our comforter took forever, and to make things worse, when we slept our comforters kept moving around and became increasingly discomforting. So we made Jax Sheets' duvet cover have small openings at the top for your hands to go in and pull in your comforter, then strings to keep it in place, and finally, a zipper at the bottom to make sure it doesn't slide out while you're sleeping. These small changes made a big difference to our love/hate relationship with our pillowcase and duvet cover, so we hope it does for you too. 

Regardless of your gender, there is nothing like getting into a clean, soft, and comfortable bed after a long day of activities. One of the most significant issues is that if your guest happens to be a female, they're able to smell much better than you can. While you might not notice your sheets having a disturbing smell, they can. Thankfully, Jax sheets is not only anti-bacterial, but also smell resistant and very comfortable. So, while our sheets focus on features that are geared towards men, we know that whoever sleeps on them will love Jax Sheets and appreciate the assurance that they are cleaner, fresher, and will not give anyone pink eye after a sleepover. 

Have you ever gotten into a set of sheets that look and feel as soft as a cloud? That's what it's like getting into Jax Sheets. You'll feel like you're sleeping in heaven, and your ancestors are there every night to tuck you in. These sheets will rock your world straight to sleep. 

We tested over six materials, and bamboo was the clear winner based on every attribute listed above needed to create the best sleep experience possible. Silk was our favorite, but the price for genuinely high-quality silk is north of $400/set. Beechwood was the softest option, but sadly this material is easily rip-able. Eucalyptus was the second best to silk, but due to the inconvenient washing instructions that we doubted would be followed, we decided it wasn't feasible. Cotton was an option, but because of the number of chemicals used in its production, the mediocre quality, and concerns about its sourcing being potentially from slave labor, we decided it was best to avoid cotton altogether. Finally, microfiber was our least favorite. The material is super soft, but being that it is made of coal and oil, there was an odd smell to it, and when we slept at night and got sweaty, it would stick to the skin. Plus, god help you if you have body hair and sleep on microfiber. 

Copper is naturally oligodynamic, which means that it can neutralize bacteria and stop its growth. This material is so incredible that it's one of the few known to be effective against super-bacteria that is resistant to medication. We chose to blend our material with copper because we knew that it would help keep the bed sheets cleaner and fresher longer, as well as improve the user's overall skin health and reduce their chances of getting sick from bacteria in their bed. 

Using copper fiber to enhance the hygienic properties of materials is nothing new. Adding copper fiber to materials is such an effective method of reducing bacteria and infections that hospitals use it in wound wraps to minimize the chance of infection. The usage isn't limited to hospitals, even NASA and the U.S. military use it in their clothing to reduce bacteria growth, smell, and viruses.

All of this started as a result of us getting ripped off by the mediocre quality sheets with thousands of positive reviews online. We hope you back our Kickstarter, and when you receive your new bed sheets, you enjoy them and get a great night's sleep. Until then, please feel free to let us know about any questions you may have.

Our package options are designed around affordability and utility. 

The first option is the Starter Set, and this set has the essentials for someone that wants to upgrade the pieces of their sheets that their body lays on, but doesn't need to upgrade their covers.

The second option is the Classic Set; this set has the added benefit of a flat sheet so that you can cover yourself in the same material as your fitted sheets and pillowcase. This set is excellent for someone that doesn't use a comforter and lays under their sheets.

The third option is the Smart Set; this set switches out the flat sheet for the duvet cover. This set is the best option in our view because it can be used with a comforter/duvet and allows you to enjoy your comforter without having to worry about washing it.

The final option is the Deluxe Set; this set includes all the pieces for Jax sheets. The set is perfect for people that switch between sleeping with a comforter and without one. It includes everything, so you'll never have to worry about not having what you need.

 

 You will get to pick your size after the campaign is over. There will be a small fee for large size sheets like King/Cali-King due to the higher material requirement/costs. 

Our goal in starting Rheabelle was to create a company that actually put the customers first. To do that, we decided that once you buy our sheets, you should never have to buy another set of sheets again. 

To achieve this goal, we decided that we'll offer an accident and size warranty, each offering replacements for a small fee. So if you buy a new size bed, you pay us a small fee, send us back the old set, and we'll mail you the new set. Now, if something goes wrong and you rip your sheets, you can pay a small fee, send us the old one, and we'll send you a new one. Our goal is to help you save money, provide you the best service, and make sure you're getting the best possible deal. 

So when you buy Jax Sheets, you'll never have to worry about re-buying sheets.

We hope you back our Kickstarter, and when you receive your new bed sheets, you enjoy them and get a great night's sleep. Until then, please feel free to let us know about any questions you may have.Our package options are designed around affordability and utility. The first option is the Starter Set, and this set has the essentials for someone that wants to upgrade the pieces of their sheets that their body lays on, but doesn't need to upgrade their covers.The second option is the Classic Set; this set has the added benefit of a flat sheet so that you can cover yourself in the same material as your fitted sheets and pillowcase. This set is excellent for someone that doesn't use a comforter and lays under their sheets.The third option is the Smart Set; this set switches out the flat sheet for the duvet cover. This set is the best option in our view because it can be used with a comforter/duvet and allows you to enjoy your comforter without having to worry about washing it.The final option is the Deluxe Set; this set includes all the pieces for Jax sheets. The set is perfect for people that switch between sleeping with a comforter and without one. It includes everything, so you'll never have to worry about not having what you need.  You will get to pick your size after the campaign is over. There will be a small fee for large size sheets like King/Cali-King due to the higher material requirement/costs. Our goal in starting Rheabelle was to create a company that actually put the customers first. To do that, we decided that once you buy our sheets, you should never have to buy another set of sheets again. To achieve this goal, we decided that we'll offer an accident and size warranty, each offering replacements for a small fee. So if you buy a new size bed, you pay us a small fee, send us back the old set, and we'll mail you the new set. Now, if something goes wrong and you rip your sheets, you can pay a small fee, send us the old one, and we'll send you a new one. Our goal is to help you save money, provide you the best service, and make sure you're getting the best possible deal. So when you buy Jax Sheets, you'll never have to worry about re-buying sheets.

story:
Scrub. Scrub. Scrub. 

Strong enough to tackle the grimiest of dishes, yet gentle enough to keep your pots and pans scratch-free. The heavy-duty brush head & bristles are 100% plant-based, made from wood & sisal fibers.

 

Turn over the brush for a durable built-in scrubber.

  • Get that stuck on grime without scratching pots and pans 
  • Reusable scrubber that is washable
  • Easy to use & very effective
  • Watch that stuck on gunk come off without damaging your pots and pans
     

 

Strong enough to tackle the dirtiest dishes.

  • The natural sisal bristles are known for their strength, durability, and anti-microbial properties. 
  • The ergonomic handle ensures comfort.  
  • The replaceable brush head is compostable, you replace the part that gets old. Keep the part that still works. It's a win-win. 

 

Sustainable Design Meets Functional Cleaning

Meet our newest creation, Do the Dishes Brush. It’s the eco-friendly brush you didn’t know you were waiting for!

 

Our Do the Dishes brush checks all boxes!

We analyzed leading dish brush brands, Amazon bestsellers, and did A LOT of dishes. We saw a big opportunity to keep plastic out of landfills (and oceans) and leverage the superpowers of our planet's natural materials.

Our Do The Dishes Brush: Make Better Choices Every Day

✓Uses plastic wisely with its durable and re-usable recycled plastic handle (that's ergonomic)! ✓Has a replaceable and compostable brush head.
✓Naturally effective thanks to the sisal bristle fibers.
✓MamaP gives back! Each color represents a different social or environmental cause we support.

 

 

What Makes This Dish Brush Different? 

Replaceable brush heads made out of natural materials (wood and sisal fibers). Plastic handle made of post-consumer recycled plastic. Diverting waste from landfills. Ergonomically designed handle for a better more comfortable grip. 

 

How It Works: Replace, Compost, That's It!

We recommend replacing your brush head every 1 – 2 months. 

  1. Remove head

  2. Drop-in your backyard compost bin

  3. Feel good about helping our planet while keeping your dishes sparkly clean

MamaP's Press Coverage

Press loves us, and so do our customers! We're proud to have been featured in great publications like Wall Street Journal, Rachael Ray, and Forbes.

We Started With One Question - Why Don’t Compostable Dish Brushes Work As Well as Plastic Ones?

We spent countless months talking to people to understand what they’re looking for in their cleaning brushes. We also tested dish brushes ourselves for over three years.

The Solution: Do The Dishes Brush

Reduce. Reuse. Compost the part that needs replacing and re-use the part that lasts forever!! WIN. WIN.

Traditional Dish Brushes Are Made With 100% Virgin Plastic. 

After a couple of months of use they get grimey and need to be replaced.  You throw it in your trash, and it ends up in a landfill or the ocean. Keep our oceans clean. Keep Microplastics out of our water (and our bodies).

 

Using a Sponge is Not Much Better 

"362 different kinds of bacteria are on sponges." -Time Magazine

Sponges have been scientifically proven to harbor more bacteria than your toilet (no, thanks)! 

And, they’re also made of plastics that aren’t biodegradable. Keep your dishes and the planet clean. Don't use a sponge!

The Problem We Want To Solve

We really want clean dishes, but we ultimately care about having a clean EARTH.

Our Objective: to minimize plastic waste. In the US we currently throw out over 400 MILLION plastic dish brushes and sponges. EVERY. SINGLE. YEAR. This plastic isn't going anywhere good. It's all ending up in our oceans. Let's clean more than our dishes.

Current Eco Brushes Don't Cut It

Most eco brushes are stiff, have handles that are prone to rot, and are uncomfortable to hold.

MamaP's Do The Dishes Brush is ergonomic, comfortable to hold, and its handle is made from recycled plastic. There's no need to throw the whole thing out! Simply replace the brush head as necessary (or every couple months). The brush heads are compostable too!

Recycled Plastic, Reusable Handle and a Compostable, Replaceable Brush Head.

 

 

MamaP is a Purpose-Led, Health and Wellness Company.

We believe in the collective power to make a difference. That's why we sell eco-friendly alternatives to everyday products. Pick a color, choose a cause - our products are color-coded to tie back to each cause - ranging from environmental to social impact.

5% of sales are donated. Take your pick!

 

 

PERKS: How Clean Can You Get?

We've got some interesting perks in the works - check back here soon to see which of our exciting new colors we're launching! Choose the package that fits your needs. Let’s get cleaning!

 

 

Sharing Is Caring - Other Ways You Can Help

Commitment To Sustainability In Our Supply Chain

Since day one back in 2017, we have embedded a carbon offset program into our company. 

 

Carbon Offset Through SeaGrass Grow & The Ocean Foundation

We selected SeaGrass Grow through The Ocean Foundation to help us reach our goals.

Plastic-free Shipping

Using recyclable and compostable materials made from unbleached kraft paper. 

 

MamaP Indiegogo Green Team

MamaP Is A Womxn- And Minority-Owned And Run Business

MamaP is a womxn & minority-owned & run business that believes that giving back to the community is as important as creating eco-friendly alternatives to everyday products.

More About the Causes We Support

  • Ocean Conservation is important for our planet and life force.
  • We support The Ocean Foundation in its protection of healthy oceans.
  • Protect our oceans with the Blue Collection
  • Saving The Bees is important to the world’s ecosystem
  • We support The Xerces Society in their protection if pollinators.
  • Save the bees with the Yellow Collection
  • We believe that mental health is as important as physical health.
  • We support the National Alliance on Mental Illness.
  • Support Mental Health Awareness with the Green Collection.
  • We believe in equality for the LGBTQ+ community.
  • We support The Trevor Project.
  • Support the LBGTQ+ community with the Purple Collection.
  • Womxn’s Rights are human rights.
  • We support Planned Parenthood.
  • Support Womxn’s Rights with the Red Collection.
  • We believe in reforming the criminal justice system.
  • We support The Innocence Project.
  • Support Criminal Justice Reform with the Melanin Collection.

 

Huge thanks to Sean and Alexa who helped create the Do The Dishes video.

Sean: Director, Editor, Videographer
bauerbrandmedia.com
Social: @bauerbrandmedia


Alexa: Videographer
alexahoyer.com
Social: @alexa_hoyer

 

If you have a question contact

email: hello@mamap.life OR message us on facebook @mamap.life

Risks & Challenges

We have worked very hard to eliminate all the risk we can. Over the past 3.5 years, we have brought products to market and skilled in navigating production to logistics. Our team is well rounded with diverse backgrounds from product development to operations and go-to-market. We are leveraging an existing manufacturing relationship whom we've worked with in the past. For fulfillment we will be using the most energy efficient and lowest carbon emissions possible. Please note that you will be responsible for duties, fees, and taxes applicable in your region.

story:
We're back, baby!

The 3 time Crowdfunding success is back. Verified by thousands of families - More than 30.000 animals shipped worldwide and over 150.000 trees planted???

Yes. The next generation of magnetic animals are stampeding their way into the FableWood-family, and we couldn't be happier.

Meet the new crew

We have created four new animals who will be joining the FableWood family. Like the rest of the animals, these new ones are made from North American walnut and ash and consists of 2-6 magnetic pieces.

So without further ado, let us introduce...

 

The Bull. At first sight, you might think that The Bull is quite aggressive… but that is not the case for this one. He loves to just strut around and take in his surroundings, and he is always protective of those he cares about.

The Bull | 6 pcs | Noble - Strong - Protective

The Little Bull. The young bull is very imaginative and he always comes up with the funniest games, which makes him very popular among the other animal cubs. But once in a while, his boldness will get him in trouble. 

The Little Bull | 2 pcs | Wild - Determined - Bold 

 

The Mother Elephant. Mother Elephant might not be as big as Father Elephant. But don’t be fooled by her size and gentle nature… she is just as powerful. If her family is in trouble, you better watch out!

The Mother Elephant | 6 pcs | Gentle - Mighty - Loving 

 

The Father Elephant. Father Elephant is a big and strong guy. He has excellent leader skills, a powerful appearance and a calming nature, which makes him very respected by the other elephants.

The Father Elephant | 6 pcs | Gigantic - Calm - Powerful

Complete the Elephant Family. Many of you have asked for a parent for our popular Little Elephant and we have granted your wish... x2. We have not only created one but two parents for the Little Elephant – a big Mother Elephant and an even bigger Father Elephant to complete the Elephant family. You can add the Little elephant as add-on at checkout.

The Elephant Family: Small - Large - Extra Large


 

Verified by thousands of families

Since we began our journey in 2018 we have shipped +30.000 of our magnetic wooden animals to thousands of families worldwide. 

Perks

Yes - approved for children...

 Like the rest of the FableWood family, the animals meet the safety requirements for toys put forward by the Danish Safety Technology Authority and the European Union. Thereby, FableWood is CE approved from 1 year and up.

 ... and approved for grown ups. 

The dual function of the animals means that they can both be used as high-end toys for children and as beautiful and fun interior design for your home. The only limit is your imagination. ?

COMBINE and CREATE

These new ones are a great addition to the collection because they offer so many new fabulous constellations of creatures. Just look at these new fun fables! Just imagine all the fun creatures you can make by combining these new ones with your FableWood collection.

The Mighty Bull-strich | Combined by the bull and the ostrich

The Bulling and Duck-ephant | Combined by the Duckling, the Little Bull, The Duck and the Father Elephant

 

We are still planting trees

As always, we are planting 5 trees for every animal we sell in collaboration with Eden Reforestation Projects. This is a project that we are very proud to be a part of because we are contributing to reforestation and at the same time help alleviate poverty and empower local communities.

Eden Reforestations Projects does a wonderful job at replanting deforested areas, while empowering sustainable local communities

Since we started the FableWood project, we have planted more than 150.000 trees. We're making a difference. Environmentally and socially. Thank you for supporting this journey!

 

Team 

Katrine | Kristian | Rasmus | Lars

That's right! The awesome crew!

 

Timeline

✅ Nov-dec: Ideation + sketching

✅ Jan: Prototyping

✅ Feb: Samples received

✅ March: CE-Certification

✅ March: Put in order

✅ April: Prepare packaging

✅ April: Confirm samples

☑️ May: ? Kickstarter Campaign  ?

☑️ June: Prepare distribution / IndieGoGo inDemand

☑️ July / August : ?? Ship Animals to backers  ??

Safety

We take safety very seriously and we use independent consumer labs to make sure that everything is safe and certified before we ship it out to you.

The final product will be CE-marked and compliant with the European Standard for Toys covered by EN-71 and REACH. 

Responsible Manufacturing

Our manufacturer is a responsible Danish-Vietnamese toy manufacturer. Their facilities and working environment live up to Danish standards and they are continuously taking initiatives to reduce their environmental footprint.

Guide - Sådan forudbestiller du (Dansk)

Du kan forudbestille igennem 4 nemme trin (Scroll for English guide):

 Trin 1: Se de forskellige produkter og produkt-pakker igennem her i højre side på siden.

 Trin 2: Klik på den store knap hvor der står "BACK THIS PROJECT" til højre for videoen øverst på denne side.

 Trin 3: Vælg en pakke, indtast det beløb, som du ønsker at støtte med, og gennemgå de næste trin ift. betaling. Dette tager kun et øjeblik. Så let er det. Tusind tak for din støtte.

 Trin 4: Kort efter kampagnen udløber d. 31. juni, sender vi dig et spørgeskema, hvor du skal indtaste forsendelsesadresse.

How to Pledge

Kickstarter is the world's largest funding platform for creative projects. Every month, tens of thousands of people pledge millions of dollars to creative projects in dozens of categories.

A person who supports a project is called a "backer." The process of giving money to this project is called a "pledge."

In return for your pledge, we (the creators of the campaign) are able to offer "perks" depending on the amount you pledge. 

You can become a backer in just four easy steps:

 Step 1: Read through the pledge levels and rewards we're offering in the right sidebar of this page.

 Step 2: Click the large, green "BACK THIS PROJECT" button to the right of the trailer video at the top of this page.

 Step 3: Pick a reward, enter your pledge amount, and complete the steps for filling in your information. This process takes just a few seconds! That's it! It's really that simple! Thank you for backing!

 Step 4: Shortly after the projects ends on Jun 31st , we will send you survey asking for your shipment details.

Once you've backed this project, we encourage you to share this page on social media platforms, such as Facebook and Instagram, and share with your friends and family. Also be sure to like FableWood on Facebook and follow us on Instagram to get real-time updates about this project and more!

Shipping & Quality Assurance.

We are thrilled to offer a great discount on shipping to all of our backers. Some of you may even have free shipping! To see the shipping rate for your location simply click the reward you like and select your country.

A disclaimer: Some packages may be sent in multiple deliveries. We apologise in advance for any inconvenience but that is how we will be able to offer so favorable rates on the shipping. Thank you for your support and understanding.

Please note: If the shipping address is outside EU, customs and VAT may apply!

We want to make sure that every single animal we ship out is in perfect condition. That means we will make a thorough inspection and quality assurance ourselves before shipping out from Denmark.

Retailers

For larger orders or other enquiries, please email us at: contact@fablewood.net

Risks and challenges

When you are working with magnets you want to make sure that things are done properly. That is why we have teamed up with a toy manufacturer experienced in delivering quality products that are compliant with the strict European standards. We have also received guidance from the governmental agency for toy safety in Denmark (Sikkerhedsstyrelsen) as well as an independent consumer lab specializing in toy safety.

Environmental commitments

Long-lasting design

FableWood is made to last. Wood ages beautifully and the magnets have lifelong durability.

Environmentally friendly factories

The factory in Vietnam is continously decreasing their environmental footprint, for instance, they have recently been nstalling solar panels in order to become self-sufficient on electricity.

Planting trees

Our partners at Eden Reforestation are planting 5 trees for every animal sold.

Also be sure to like FableWood on Facebook and follow us on Instagram to get real-time updates about this project and more!Shipping & Quality Assurance.We are thrilled to offer a great discount on shipping to all of our backers. Some of you may even have free shipping! To see the shipping rate for your location simply click the reward you like and select your country.A disclaimer: Some packages may be sent in multiple deliveries. We apologise in advance for any inconvenience but that is how we will be able to offer so favorable rates on the shipping. Thank you for your support and understanding.Please note: If the shipping address is outside EU, customs and VAT may apply!We want to make sure that every single animal we ship out is in perfect condition. That means we will make a thorough inspection and quality assurance ourselves before shipping out from Denmark.RetailersFor larger orders or other enquiries, please email us at: contact@fablewood.netRisks and challengesWhen you are working with magnets you want to make sure that things are done properly. That is why we have teamed up with a toy manufacturer experienced in delivering quality products that are compliant with the strict European standards. We have also received guidance from the governmental agency for toy safety in Denmark (Sikkerhedsstyrelsen) as well as an independent consumer lab specializing in toy safety.Environmental commitmentsLong-lasting designFableWood is made to last. Wood ages beautifully and the magnets have lifelong durability.Environmentally friendly factoriesThe factory in Vietnam is continously decreasing their environmental footprint, for instance, they have recently been nstalling solar panels in order to become self-sufficient on electricity.Planting treesOur partners at Eden Reforestation are planting 5 trees for every animal sold.

story:
Live a more inspired life with Mateo. A high quality, beautifully designed workspace that enables a more productive, creative, and curated life.

 

 

The Mateo Sit-Stand Desk. It’s a story of a small business that believes in beauty and functionality. It’s a story of thoughtful design and quality equipment coming together to create something you can enjoy and be proud of while minimizing clutter and waste. It’s a story of love — we love to create things that you love to use.


Mateo has set out to redefine the work environment, and we’re starting that conversation with the Sit-Stand. It’s simple. Beautiful. Smart. Functional. Ergonomic. It’s the first in what will become a series of innovations that will make the office environment a more enjoyable place, whether you’re at home, in an office, coworking, at school, or even outdoors.

Think about it — how much time do you spend at work? Why can’t your work environment be as inspiring as it is functional? Who wants a bunch of clutter and cords showing all the time, especially when your office is also your home? Why build something flimsy out of materials that are wasteful? Why not have a work environment that inspires you and creates a sense of comfort?
 

 

There are some key features in our desks that we want to point out:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The new desk has been created by Mateo, a highly regarded manufacturer of exceptionally designed home and office furniture with extensive experience in creating beautiful and functional work environments.

The founders of Mateo come from a long line of farmers. We like to grow things and have a background as artists and sculptors. When you combine those interests and direct them into something like furniture, you get a combination of form and function. And we believe the measure of a company is how you treat people, including both employees and customers. 

 

 

Mateo creates custom furniture and millwork, designed and fabricated with quality craftsmanship, and utilizing the newest technologies available in fabrication today. We are a collective of diverse problem solvers. We understand all aspects of our trade, from how a tree becomes a table to how to take a dream design to reality and everything in-between. We have the knowledge, the tools, and the know-how to turn even the wildest design ideas into tangible realities. Our fabrication studio uses the latest technologies, coupled with our team's deep knowledge of traditional woodworking. And our products are focused on how we can use design to eliminate waste. 

 

 

 

In a word, scale. We want to bring our incredible desk design to the masses, transform the home office environment, and employ as many people as possible. Great design and a comfortable workspace can give people a sense of peace in difficult times, and the objects that surround us become part of our lives. You’re probably sick of hearing the words “Now more than ever,” but seriously — has there ever been a more important time to enjoy things in your life that improve your productivity and happiness? 
 


 

At Mateo, we’ve shown the ability to be creative and implement exceptional design in many different settings. We have learned a lot from our experiences in corporate settings about creating workspaces that are beautiful and efficient. And, we can read the tea leaves too. We don’t know what the “new normal” will look like, but we do know that telecommuting and working from home will be a big part of it, at least for the foreseeable future. With that change, our business model needs to change and adapt as well.

This IndieGoGo project will provide us with the runway we need to meet the goals of helping those with home offices across the country and having a positive impact as possible in creating new jobs. It’s the Holy Grail of the design and manufacture world to make something that is functional and beautiful. We want to bring it to as many people as possible. 
 

 

There’s a need for those who will be working from home to create enjoyable, comfortable, and beautiful office environments for themselves. And there’s a need to create jobs in a challenging economy. We have the design and fabrication experience to ensure the product is of exceptional and consistent quality. We’ve executed significant projects on both the residential and commercial side that have helped to create some of the most remarkable office environments in our region. We have all the tools needed to ramp up manufacturing.

And, we’re committed to being transparent and communicative with those who support us so that they know the kind of impact they are helping to create. Thank you for your support, and we hope you enjoy our Sit Stand Desk!

story:
Why did Clair make a wireless foldable fan, Clair F?

To help people Sleep Better - Conventional fans need manual adjustment during the night to airflow and direction. With the Clair F, you get a mild summer breeze that helps you sleep better than the conventional fan. Plus, our speed level 1 is lower than a conventional fan's level 1 power, leaving you cool but not cold.

Hassle-free storage - Many fans are bulky and hard to store outside of the warm seasons. Clair F can be folded and stored in small spaces.

Universal use - Be free of cords that limit your reach and ability to move outside with the Clair F. Take Clair F anywhere you want to go!

 

 

Clair is built with the purpose of lessening your energy output; with the ability to work wirelessly, fold easily, and be fully managed at a distance, this fan takes the hassle out of cooling off.

Weighing in at just 9 pounds, Clair can be comfortably picked up and placed. As it is wireless, the only effort you need to put in is where to place it.

Once situated, you can sit wherever you’d like and take the fan’s remote control with you, allowing you to calibrate and occasionally adjust the settings for the fan. These settings include air speed, rotation, and hours active. You also have the option to turn the fan off or select the night mode, which reduces the LED brightness and reduces the air speed to the lowest setting.

The fan can run up to 7 hours on battery life, and the air speed increases incrementally from level 1 up to level 4. 

 

 

 

No More Crosswires

There’s no need to decide what gets unplugged for Clair; you can leave everything as is and undisturbed. Save the extension plugs and crowded outlets for something else, because this fan can operate without those pesky wires. On the lowest speed, Clair can actually run up to 20 hours of battery life, letting you worry about one less thing to monitor.

 

 

 

Take Clair Outside

Finding outlets inside can be a hassle, sure, but what about outside? You won’t need to worry about finding a place to plug in outside either because Clair takes away the restriction of a wire. Enjoy Clair on your patio, during a picnic, or even while camping. The blades are easily washable, helping you keep the outdoors outside of your house.

 

 

 

Hassle-Free Storability

Clair folds into a flat shape, making it rather easy to slide into places to be stored, such as under the bed, between furniture, or propped up in the closet. Simply fold Clair by tilting it down 90 degrees into its flat position and tuck away anywhere. Its sleek design and light material provide easy access to any family member.

 

 

 

Keeps You Cool in Ways You Didn’t Know You Could Be

Clair’s head can rotate 180 degrees, allowing you to determine the best angle to cool you off. The main body itself can automatically rotate 120 degrees, although you have the ability to turn this rotation on and off as you need it with the remote control. Unlike other fans, Clair provides a myriad of options for you to consider in order to create a cool environment that is to your liking. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Fully Charge for 20 hours of Battery Life

Clair can deliver a cool breeze for nearly a day on low speed mode.

 

 

Remotely Control from Nearby

Keep cool and relaxed while operating your Clair fan from across the room or living space.

 

 

4-Speed Fan with Time Settings

Touch control with ease for your time settings, fan speed, and night mode.  

 

 

 

 

Removable, washable blades

The blades on the Clair Fan are easily removable to allow for easy maintenance and cleaning. You can take off the front piece and slide the blades out to wash in the sink or wipe with a cleaning solution.

 

 

Multipurpose Use

You can also utilize Clair to help you with other things around your home. For example, Clair can be set up in your bathroom to remove moisture after a shower, or you can even have it dry your clothes. The fan can even help ventilate any room in the house, letting you move further down on your to-do list.

 

 

Quiet Performance

Clair will help you sleep at night with its quiet sounds at minimum 22.2dB to a maximum of 44.6dB.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Clair K2 Air Purifier (special add-on)

Upgrade your Clair fan with the K2 Air Purifier, available in white or gray, to help clear pollutants, odors, and allergens in the air.

The head’s angle enables to adjust up and down by 180 degrees, which helps the K2 purifier deliver the cleaner air to every corner of your space.

Our innovative Air Filtration System (3-step filtration—Microfiber pre-filter, CEPA filter, and Carbon filter) removes harmful gases, odors and ultra-fine dusts sized up to 0.1microns by 99.9% of removal efficiency. 

*K-bird (Diffuser) package included.

 

 

 

The Clair F Pouch

Use the Clair F Pouch to protect your fan from scratches and collecting dust while in in storage.

The storage bag also acts as a carrying bag to easily throw over your shoulder to bring it where ever you want.

 

 

 

Add-Ons

The storage bag also acts as a carrying bag to easily throw over your shoulder to bring it where ever you want.

story:
Do you love plants but lack a green thumb?

Well, friend, then greensens is the right solution for YOU!

greensens are high tech houseplant sensors that help monitor the condition of both plants and flowers. They check light conditions, temperature and soil moisture.

It happens to even the best of us. An unlucky plant was neglected and did not survive. We’ve all killed plants our fair share of plants. This can be prevented with the help of houseplant sensors. greenses App will notify you when some of your plats feel uncomfortable.

MEET greensens SMART home plant SENSORS!

The starter kit contains three houseplant sensors and a WLAN USB hub.

 

The hub helps to connect sensors to the Internet and the greensens App worldwide. greensens sensors are easy to install and they fit in every pot with a handy and fresh design.

With the greensens sensors you can easily measure the health status of your houseplants by accessing information at any time, from any place.

You can connect up to 10 houseplant sensors to a single hub and monitor the condition of your plants via our app.

From our app, you can see exactly how much water, light and temperature your plants need to thrive.

The greensens system includes flower sensors, a USB gateway and free mobile app. You just need to plug in your gateway to a permanent power source in the USB port, such as a WLAN router, your smart phone wall socket, etc. Next you can register you system and enjoy a variety of features.

All this functionality is spread between our plant sensor and data analysis, with all the calibration and information stored in a database. The sensor itself measures 3 parameters:  soil moisture, ambient temperature and light conditions. Also, these data are sent to our DB, analysed and sent further on to your mobile app, scaling precisely to your unique plant.

Inside the greensens devices you won't see many parts as design is very optimised for the maximum functionality and best efficiency.

 

Interaction with the system is very simple, just three easy steps and you ready to go!

First you need to register your gateway and then you can connect the sensors. After your smart greensens sensor has fully changed, it will notify you over the App, and you can see the new sensor on the screen. Every sensor has its own unique serial number and during the sensor registration process you can select from our database your plant type. Sensor registration is very simple, once app notified you that  sensor is charged, you can open the and tilt the sensor down and back. This motion let you sign-up sensor with the system and let you select the houseplant you want to use with.

After you have finished your registration, place your sensor into your flower pot, and you will always be notified if your beloved plants feel thirsty, wither in poor light conditions, or the ambient temperature is not ideal.

The highly intuitive greensens app lets you access your data in an easy and comfortable manner. The main screen shows you all your plants with their corresponding statuses, such that you have a quick overview of all of your cherished plants.  Every plant has it own best of range conditions. With that in mind, in each of the detailed plant statuses, you'll see scaled ranges based on our data bank for your plant type.

The app is compatible with Android and iPhone.

Our data bank includes over 5000 plants from all over the world!

In order to create it, we work closely with our official partner, Geisenheimer University in Germany. This is an agriculture university, entailing also a department of cultivated plants. They have great experience and fascinating research programs in this field.

A major advantage of greensens houseplant sensors is that we use RF communication based on smart-home standards. Therefore, we can provide you with an affordable price, good coverage and flexibility. For the sensor connection, greensens sensors use a gateway which you can plug into any USB-Port with a constant power supply. This could be a WiFi router, phone charger or something else.

Compare to Bluetooth-based solution our sensors have greater range and can cover full regular apartment or one floor in the house. This gives you flexibility with sensors location.

 

greensens sensors are quite unique on the market, and here you can really see the difference with the other solutions, where greensens has the clear advantage.

 

You can control the statuses of your plants from all over the world. There is no limit, so long you have Internet access, you’re good to go.

The sensors are powered by solar energy, meaning there's no need to ever change the battery.

Fully environmental friendly and work just like you plant with a sun light =)

 

We always love plants, and having some flowers in a house always makes it feel really cozy. However, there may be some stress involved. Confession time: I  killed 20 houseplants by just forgetting to water them. Then I bought the next plant and watered it everyday, just to be sure it had plenty of moisture. But then it was way too much, and it died in 4 weeks from over watering. So I decided to find a smart solution online, and all of them are very expensive and data wasn’t available from outside my home. So in July 2018, our journey began.

Since the very beginning, we have worked in tight cooperation with our production partners to optimise expenses for each part and the overall manufacturing process. It’s crucial to know each part of the production cycle in great detail, in order to create a superior product that matches the pricing requirements, and offers a full range of functionality with the very best quality.

We managed to get the best developers on board to optimise our technology and HW prices, so that every household can enjoy the advantages of the IoT world and have nice green healthy plants. We worked on this product for over a year, and now we’re penny pinching to get the product costs down. At times, it took us weeks on end to devise creative methods to save just 1-2 cents, while not compromising any functionality. For example, to find the best solar cell, we spent over a year and a diligently half testing and researching, getting  all sorts of different models from best suppliers. As most of the time home plats receive only artificial light, we fond the best option to work in most challenging conditions even under 1000Lux.

Here you can see our development story from the very basic model, to the finished smart-home product with a great range of features. A massive amount of work  has been done on SW and FW. The backend is where we create an optimised, secured and fast structure, to provide you with the very best service.

Our sensors will be certified for the US and EU markets.

All certification procedures we run with our experienced partner, to ensure you receive the best quality, based on each region’s unique regulations. Today, we are here looking for your support to start mass production. Only in this way can we provide affordable prices.

greensens put together the best team of engineers, with terrific experience and creative ideas, who pushed smart houseplant sensors to a whole new level.

All our engineers have several years of experience in the different areas required to develop such a system. Each of us has already successfully launched different products in the B2C and B2B areas. From a simple GPS recorder, to automotive electronics for the German industry, drones, big greenhouses, smart houses and many many others our team has had their green thumbs in a lot of pies.

We have worked in large companies and startups alike. We can follow different strategies of product creation, from a bare bones idea on the whiteboard to the fully launched HW and SW products.  We developed an optimised model for greensens  such that we can provide you with a product with valuable functionality and the very best German quality.

Almost from the beginning, we found our reliable manufacturing partner, and adjusted our design to the manufacturing processes to optimise the technology and costs. It was  great support for our development to create a product that has the best functionality and quality. Here are some images from our supplier sites.

The most expensive parts in the production process are to create an injection Mold for plastic parts and setup the electronics production line.

 

We need your support to bring greensens smart sensors in life.

Flowers and plants  live so much longer with a flower sensor from greensens - and that's why you'll love them!

 

Order now greensens Houseplant Sensor and enjoy the beauty of your plants.

Your plants will love it - and so will you!

 

Back this project NOW!

 

 

We worked hard on product development and spent a lot of time researching the best partner for reliable and quality manufacturing. greensens sensors were developed based on feedback from our partners, to achieve the highest level of production efficiency, thereby making all processes easy and fast-moving. One of the key aspects is a quality check, and we have quality assurance people at the production site to bring you the very best possible product.

Plastic injection Mold: We work with leading product designers who help us prepare the body for easy and efficient production. Our surface finish has strict requirements, so we may expect some delays here to reach the best quality.

Certification: The process of certification depends on many factors and may influence our timeline.
Our strong relationship with the manufacturer will ensure the manufacturing process goes smoothly to provide the Kickstarter community the quality they deserve and expect.

All in all, we can’t control and predict everything. With that said, we promise to be transparent and communicate every change in our production process to ensure we meet your expectations.
