Mr. Murdock wants to use cyberspace to free players from the constraints of distance to enjoy not simply a multiplayer virtual game-like zapping digital zombies or racing on 3-D racetracksï¿½but a game that is "totally real."

  • Daily News

    Who would have thought something this super advanced could be created in the Bronx.

  • EETimes

    Blending Java and biofeedback technologies, Internet Golf Multimedia, Inc. (Bronx NY) has created what it calls the worlds first smart golf club, which a user can link to the Internet to compete in a global golf competition. The club is a genuine putter with the aforementioned circuitry and an off-the-shelf RF transceiver located in its head.

  • Triangle Business Journal

    A New York entrepreneur whose firm has developed a "smart" golf club is scouting North Carolina for a plant site to manufacture the clubs.

  • New York Post

    Inventor Wilbert Murdock swears his computerized golf club reduces the amount of trial and error it takes to learn the game.

  • EETimes

    After a ball is struck, a voice (speaking either English or Japanese) tells the golfer whether he hit the ball on the clubs Sweet spot or right or left of it.

  • Daily News

    Murdock, a bioengineer and chairman of Motiontronics for Science, Inc. is about to launch the world's first Smart Golf Club, which uses computerized sensors to measure how the club's surface strikes the ball.

  • Electronic Engineering Times

    "The club is said to have the look and heft of our average driver but when a golfer hits a golf ball with it, several sensors in the club's head detect where and how contact with the ball is made. An embedded computer analyzes the input from the sensor array and determines whether contact with sensor array and determines whether contact was made on the club's heel, toe, or "sweet-spot."

  • Wireless Week

    Up for a round of wireless golf? Players can watch the ball's trajectory communicate in real-time with distant opponents. It wirelessly synchronizes your motion and movement with the way your brain functions.

  • Golf Digest

    Feedback comes in the form of an actual voice and a digital display that indicates how close contact comes in the sweet spot.

  • Visual Media Profiles:

    ABC World News Tonight, Beyond 2000, Bloomberg News, CNN, HBO Sports, Joe Franklyn Show, NY1 News, WPIX News.

Where we're at?

We've been working on Real Smart Sports Devices technologies for a few years now, three generations deep. The Real Smart Game Technologies that you see in the video's are real, working prototypes.

With your support, we can bring Real Smart Sports Devices to gamers and athletes worldwide. While we're close to entering production, your contribution will help fund:

-Production tooling from a variety of US based companies who makes our custom sensors, accelerometers and custom smart golf clubs

-Reducing the size of the electronics (miniaturize)

-Software development of other Apps besides Golf and Interactive Smart Website

-Software development for tablets and smart phones

- Large component order

- Global Bluetooth certification

Giving Back By Creating Hi-Tech Jobs

With your support, our Real Smart Game Technologies will be made in completely in the United States and create many jobs in this tough economy nationwide.

Later we want to license the technologies globally!

Our central goal is to create many manufacturing and support jobs.


Real Smart Golf Putter

 
 
 

Questions and Answers

Q. Why are we ready to manufacture our Real Smart Devices now? 

A. With the huge proliferation of Tablets and Smart Phones, our Real Smart
Devices can now be priced to make it affordable to all consumers worldwide. 
 

Q. Why do Golf Clubs, Tennis Racquets, Baseball Bats, Basketballs, Soccer Balls, Pool Sticks, Hockey Sticks, etc have to be DUMB? 

A. They had to be until we created our Real Smart Technologies which made all of these sports devices Real Smart with Computerized Internet Intelligence for Single and Multiplayer Game Play. 


Q. Does the Real Smart Golf Device require batteries? 

A. Yes two double AA batteries. 


Q. Does the Real Smart Golf Device require a Personal Computer? 

A. Yes. It works with all Personal Computers via a wireless USB connection.

 
Q. Does the Real Smart Golf Device works with Tablets and Smart Phones. 

A.Yes Currently under development are versions for Android, IPhones and Windows Smart Phones and Tablets. 


Q. Is the Real Smart Golf Device easy to use? 

A. Yes it is. You simply turn it on and swing the club for putting and driving a real golf ball. 


Q. Are there any other Apps for the Real Smart Sports Devices beside Golf?

 A. Yes, Currently under development are Apps for Basketball, Baseball, Tennis, Chess, Boxing, Soccer, Football, Hockey, etc. 


Q. What type of Game Graphics should I expect? 

A. The Real Smart Sports Device uses a Force Sensing Resistance and a 3 Axis Accelerometer to provide Real Smart Graphics that gives a gamer and or athlete a complete picture of their strengths and weaknesses of his or her game. 


Q. Can I store my daily information of game practice or play on my digital device and or database? 

A. Yes you can so that your individual playing trends can be highlighted and stored for future comparisons day to day, week to week, month to month, and year to year. 


Q. What makes Real Smart Technologies different than other game technologies? 

A. Other game technologies require a controller and are also hands free which means they are Virtual Systems. Our Real Smart Technologies uses a Real Smart Engine which is Beyond Virtual. For gaming you use a real custom golf club or your own golf club with our attachable Real Smart Dual Sensor Electronics. 


Q. Does the Real Smart Devices work on Facebook? 

A. Our engineers are currently working on a special app for Facebook users. 


Q. What other operating systems does the Real Smart Devices work on? 

A. Our Real Smart Devices work on Andriod, Apple and Microsoft platforms. 


Q Will the Real Smart Golf Clubs be available for the masses in large

quantities? 

A No. The Real Smart Golf Clubs will be available in very limited quantities. 


Q. Do I add the shipping fees to the PERK amount or is it charged later? 

A. Please do not add the shipping fee to your PERK.

REAL SMART SPORTS DEVICE: MULTIPLE SENSOR BASED ELECTRONICS FOR PERSONAL COMPUTERS, IPADS, TABLETS, IPHONES AND ANDROID PLATFORMS FOR INTERNET SINGLE AND MULTIPLAYER INTELLIGENT GAME PLAY

 
REAL SMART MULTIPLAYER GAME SOFTWARE

Real Smart Multiplayer Game Software (for outdoor use):
1) Measures and shows position of Drive (left, sweet-spot, right)
2) Measures and shows type of Drive (soft, medium, hard)
3) Measures and shows driving distance
4) Measures Club Face Position or Angle of Driver
5) Measures Club Rotation while driver is in motion
6) Predicts and graphically shows your driving pattern
7) Creates a personalized database of your daily, weekly and monthly driving pattern
8) Play and practice by yourself on your Personal Computer, Tablet, or Cell phone outdoors with your Real Smart Driver
9) Play and practice by yourself on your Personal Computer, Tablet, or Cell Phone with a Real Smart Animated Golf Pro or Real Golf Pro live on the Internet
10) Choose a playing and or practice partner anywhere in the world on the Internet 24 hours a day 7 days a week to compete with.

Real Smart Single Player Game Software (for indoor and outdoor use)
1) Measures and shows position of Putt (left, sweet-spot, right)
2) Measures and shows type of Putt (soft, medium, hard)
3) Measures and shows putting distance
4) Measures Club Face Position or Angle
5) Measures Club Rotation while putter is in motion
6) Predicts and graphically shows your putting pattern
7) Creates a personalized database of your daily, weekly and monthly putting pattern
8) Play and practice by yourself on your Personal Computer, Tablet, or Cell phone
9) Play and practice by yourself on your Personal Computer, Tablet, or Cell Phone with a Real Smart Animated Golf Pro or Real Golf Pro live on the Internet
Real Smart Sports Device: Sensors Based Electronics For Personal Computers, iPads, Tablets, iPhone and Android Developed by Real Smart Game Technologies
A Product Design project in Bronx New York by Real Smart Game Technologies
VIDEOS
LINKS
VIDEO 1:
Watch First-Prof Murdock requests your Donation 3rd Generation-Pre-Production Prototype
VIDEO 2: Watch Second-CNN Report - 2nd Generation Prototype VIDEO 3: Watch Third-UPN 9 News - 1st Generation Prototype
Watch Videos Above
Christmas AvailabilityThe Real Smart Golf Clubs will be available for the Christmas Season in very limited quantities for the Indiegogo family See Perks
REAL SMART GAME TECHNOLOGIES
Introducing the Real Smart Golf Club (RSGC), the world's first Computerized Internet Enabled Golf/Sports System which is patented (7789742).
It is the WORLD'S FIRST and ONLY "Real" non-virtual (Patented and Patent-pending) technology that use "Real-Smart" gaming technologies.
What is the Real Smart Golf Club?
It is a Patented and Patent-Pending Electronic Computerized Sensors based Real Smart Gaming System Platform that:
a) You can hold in your hand and swing
b) Has the balance of a Dumb Putter and Driver
c) Provides real world interactivity
d) Provides beyond virtual reality gaming
e) The opportunity to learn how to improve his or her specific sport via software
f) In the case of Golf, you hit a real golf ball, and or play against a real opponent anywhere in the world using our Real Smart Sports Device App for Golf.
g) In the case of Tennis, you hit a real tennis ball, and or play against a real opponent anywhere in the world using our Real Smart Sports Device App.
h) In the case of Baseball, you hit a real baseball, and or play against an opponent anywhere in the world using our Real Smart Sports Device App for Baseball.
i) In the case of Basketball, you shoot a real Basketball, and or play against a real opponent anywhere in the world using our Real Smart Sports Device App for Basketball.
j) In the case of Boxing, you box against a real opponent, anywhere in the world using our Real Smart Sports device App for Boxing.
k) Our Real Smart Sports Device technologies can be applied to any sport.
How does it work?
You simply turn it on and swing the golf club to putt or drive the golf ball.
The Real Smart Sports Device System wirelessly integrates actual golf equipment with a computer, tablet and smart phone and the internet to allow players remotely located from one another to play a competitive simulated game of golf or any other sport. An individual player may opt to play solo or practice to improve basic golfing techniques. The system includes smart golf clubs, a golf ball receptacle and a golf club motion sensing device, all containing circuits and contact or motion sensors coupled with signal processing and radio frequency transmitter circuitry via wireless USB, Bluetooth and Wi-Fi , thereby wirelessly communicate game performance information to a remote receiver-computer. The computer displays player information and visually simulates and controls a golf game between two players, via the internet, having similar equipment and remotely located from each other. Standard golf clubs, tennis rackets, basketballs, baseball bats, chess pieces, boxing gloves, soccer balls, etc may be retrofitted with the sensors and associated circuitry to convert such clubs into "smart clubs" and "smart sports devices" for use with the system. The system employs specially developed computer software to process player performance data, control game play, communicate game information between players, generate and control visual simulations and display player performance information. The Real Smart Sports Device System shows you via easy to understand games graphics and your Personal Database how to improve your specific sport whether it's played indoors or outdoors, at home, in the office, and in the park, etc.

Future Features will include multiple patent pending protocols (20080076580) Such as Zigbee, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, Wi-Max, UWB, and Cellular. With the Real Smart Golf Club Game System you swing our Internet Enabled Computerized golf club to talk to (Interact) with the game graphics. Our Real Smart Golf Club represents the highest level of interactivity which is pure entertainment. You play and learn how to improve your golf swing or stroke. In the case of golf, you putt a real golf ball.
Use your IPhone, Blackberry, Android tablet or Cellphone to play a game of interactive Golf with your friends on the Internet with the G3 Real Smart Putter. (Click on picture to see video)


G3-GENERATION 3-REAL SMART PUTTER READY FOR PRODUCTION 

 

Customize the Interactive Golf Game Maps and play with the G3 Real Smart Putter. (Click on picture to see video)



G2-GENERATION 2-REAL SMART PUTTER 

 

Play against your friends on Facebook with the G3 Real Smart Golf Club (tell your friends to purchase one so that you can play them).(Click on picture to see video)



G1-GENERATION 1-REAL SMART PUTTER

 
Who we are?
Real Smart Sports Devices- We are a social media company, specializing in intelligent games for sports learning utilizing state of the art hardware and software, using the Internet's Interactive gaming platform features.
We are the perfect combination of social media and sports edutainment and real smart gaming.
Real-Smart Sports Devices- represents the next major leap forward worldwide for gaming and sports play and learning to master a specific sport.
Now you can play and learn how to better master your favorite sport indoors and out 24 hours a day 7 days a week on and off of the Internet. No longer are you restricted to playing against an animation which is now outdated and old technology.
With our technology using the Internet you can play against a real human being anywhere in the world no matter the sport.
Our Real Smart Technologies AKA Genius Interactive Technologies produced one notable Technology as the patented Internet Centric Genius Golf System (the world's first real smart intelligent Golf system) which was granted a patent last year (US patent number 7789742).
Real Smart Sports Device is completely wireless and connects to your Personal Computer, Tablet (see graphics below) and Cell phone (see graphics below) via wireless USB, Bluetooth , Wi-Fi and other wireless protocols for indoor and outdoor game play.


Current Game Technologies
All former state of the art game technologies use controllers, remote control devices, wands and/or Hands free motion capture systems. Both interact with three (3) dimensional game graphics as the user is immersed in the Virtual world. The above games uses 100 % virtual technologies. Still the gamer or sports participants is lacking:
a. Complete real world interactivity
b. Beyond virtual reality gaming
c. The opportunity to learn how to improve his or her specific sport
With Virtual Game Systems you swing the controller, wand or body to talk to (Interact) to the Game Graphics. All represent the lowest level of Basic interactivity.
This is pure entertainment!
In the case of Golf, you do not hit a real golf ball only a virtual one. You can only play against a virtual opponent and not a real opponent anywhere in the world.
In the case of Tennis, you do not hit a real tennis ball only a virtual one. You can only play against a virtual opponent and not a real opponent anywhere in the world.
In the case of Baseball, you do not hit a real baseball only a virtual one. You can only play against a virtual opponent and not a real opponent anywhere in the world.
In the case of Boxing, you do not box against a real opponent only a virtual one. You can only box against a virtual opponent and not a real opponent anywhere in the world.
In the case of Soccer, you do not kick a real soccer ball only a virtual one. You can only play against a virtual opponent and not a real opponent anywhere in the world.
In the case of Chess, you do not move a real chess piece only a virtual one. You can only play against a virtual opponent and not a real opponent anywhere in the world.
In the case of Hockey, you do not hit a real hockey puck only a virtual one. You can only play against a virtual opponent and not a real opponent anywhere in the world.
In the case of Basketball, you do not shoot a real Basketball only a virtual one. You can only play against a virtual opponent and not a real opponent anywhere in the world.
Introducing Real Smart Game Technologies

Indiegogo
Thank you, Indiegogo! For those who were unable to back us, you can sign up here and be the first to know when we offer more.
June 7- Real Smart Sports Devices will soon support Bluetooth 4.0 and Wi-Fi! If you're an game developer, big or small, please keep Real Smart Game Technologies in mind! Sign up for our Developer's mailing list here.
June 10 - To All Indiegogo donators who support us, you may be the only ones to be able to get the Real Smart Golf Clubs, Putter and Drivers for the Christmas season in the entire world.
For press inquiries, please contact media@realsmartsportsdevices.com. Follow Real Smart Game Technologies on Facebook. Sign up for our free newsletter!
June 14, 2012 - Real Smart Sports Device is lining up celebrity endorsements

story:
Traditional cooktops have settings of low to high, but just like baking, precise and consistent temperature is a must to craft the best dishes. Temperature directly affects the flavor of ingredients and is the secret to cooking like a pro.

In order to bring precision to the cooktop, the engineers at FirstBuild have designed the ultimate cooking system. The Paragon gives you flexibility to precisely control pan temperature with the mat, or liquid temperature with the probe.  Whether experimenting with sous vide or cooking the perfect pancake, Paragon gives you the tools to do it right the first time - and every time.


Have you ever started cooking and the first pancake is undercooked but the second one burns? Unlike traditional cooktops, when you set the Paragon Induction Cooktop, it reaches the desired temperature quickly and hardly fluctuates. By communicating via bluetooth with the mat or the probe, the smart induction cooktop automatically adjusts to keep your ingredients at the perfect temperature.

We’re excited by the science behind cooking and have experimented with the effects of temperature on basic ingredients such as butter and eggs. Through these trials we’ve found that each temperature delivers a specific result. In fact, you can clearly see (and taste) the difference temperature has on the browning of butter.

Paragon’s versatility is thanks to a bluetooth connection between the induction cooktop and its accessories, the mat and the probe. The cooktop continuously communicates with the accessories to monitor and maintain temperature wirelessly.

To start cooking simply select any induction-ready cookware. If you are using a pan, place the mat on the cooktop.  For pots containing a liquid, place the probe on the edge of the pot. Temperature can then be set directly on the cooktop or through the FirstBuild App.

 

No matter your cooking expertise, Paragon eases the stress of cooking and can help you create a wide variety of dishes using many techniques.

 

Sous vide and sear with confidence on Paragon. This simple, two-step procedure will produce edge-to-edge medium rare with a deep brown, caramelized crust. We recommend searing in butter at 375°F, keeping the butter at a flavorful golden brown. Pairs well with Sous Vide and Sear Bundle.

 
Butter is an essential element to making great food. We used brown butter as a substitute for unsalted butter in the crepe recipe, then added a bit more to the pan when cooking (recommend 350°F). Pairs well with Culinary Basics Bundle.
 
We created this delightful brown butter pasta dish trouble-free with Paragon. Set to 300°F, we were able to brown the butter and mix in the pasta with no concern about burning either one. Pairs well with Everyday Classics Bundle.
 
Fish is a very delicate food that is tricky to master. If the temperature is too low, it doesn't brown. If the temperature is too high, the fish will be dry and unappetizing. 325°F was just right. After using the Paragon mat, you'll never want to go back. Use a fry pan, or try it sous vide-style with the Sous Vide and Sear Bundle.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

Ideal for the modern family, Chantal's new Induction 21 Steel™ stainless cookware is made with superior 21/0 Japanese stainless steel.  This steel is stronger and, thanks to the removal of nickel, healthier than steels that are used in other cookware.   Induction 21 Steel™ performs on all cooktops but, as its name suggests, is supremely proficient on magnetic-induction stoves.  Ergonomic handles, dripless pouring rims and glass lids create a visually stunning line that delivers premium cooking performance.

GE Appliances’ FirstBuild is a global co-creation community that harnesses the brainpower of the maker movement to change the way major home appliances are conceived, designed and manufactured. A physical state-of-the-art microfactory in Louisville, Kentucky and online forum, FirstBuild speeds products from mind to market and enables customization through small batch production, without the costs and risks of traditional mass manufacturing. For more information about how to get involved, visit FirstBuild.com.

What makes Paragon different?

The Paragon induction cooktop directly monitors cooking temperature, offering precise control for a wide variety of cooking styles. Precision cooking with Paragon is easy and produces repeatable, restaurant-quality results.

The Paragon induction cooktop uses Bluetooth™ technology to maintain cookware and food at a precise temperature. Feedback from wireless temperature sensors controls the heat to maintain the desired temperature with minimal fluctuation during the entire cooking process.

What is the Paragon mat for?

The Paragon mat is our newest addition to the family of Paragon smart sensing accessories. The Paragon mat is about 11.75" in diameter and contains an embedded temperature sensor which communicates cookware temperature to the cooktop. This cutting-edge technology enables stunning, repeatable results for sautéing, simmering, searing, sauces, and a variety of challenging-yet-essential cooking methods.

What is the Paragon probe for?

The Paragon probe is primarily designed for sous vide cooking and liquid temperature control applications. The sous vide technique is becoming popular among consumers who want to replicate the results achieved in high-end restaurants, right at home. In sous vide cooking, the chef places food in a zipper bag and submerges under water for an hour or more at the desired temperature. Food cooked in this way will emerge edge-to-edge at the desired temperature.

Great chefs nearly always follow sous vide cooking with a searing step, and this is where Paragon really stands out. Using the Paragon mat, cooks can sear at a precise temperature, keeping the pan from overheating while rapidly responding to any drop in temperature (as commonly occurs when food is added to a hot pan). No more burned butter or overcooked, tough steak!

Are the new mat and probe compatible with the original Paragon?

Yes, the new mat and probe accessories were designed to be fully backward compatible with the original Paragon induction cooktop. 

What can I cook on Paragon?

The biggest benefits of Paragon can be stated in three broad categories: meats, everyday foods, and culinary basics.

Meats like steak, pork roasts, fish, and scallops require delicate handling, and Paragon excels at every step. Using the Paragon probe, cooks can prepare the meat to their desired final cooking temperature through sous vide cooking. Cooks will then follow up with a precision searing step, a simple and effective way to produce a step-by-step culinary masterpiece.

Everyday foods like grilled cheese, pancakes, and hamburgers are staples of our cooking repertoire, but cooking them perfectly every time can elude even experienced chefs. Using the Paragon mat, moms, dads, kids and college students can recreate their personal-best cooking results time after time. Whether you like your eggs over-medium or sunny-side-up, the Paragon mat will bring a whole new level of precision and repeatability to your cooking game.

Culinary basics are the essential building blocks of perfectly executed food. From gumbo to gravy, food is better when cooked the way it was originally intended. Essentials like caramelized onions, brown butter, and roux have traditionally required patience, skill, and vast amounts of attention. The Paragon mat enables stress-free preparations of even the most vexing dishes, with stunning results on the first try.

What cooking methods does Paragon support?

The Paragon induction cooktop is a single device capable of cooking using several precision cooking methods. Sous vide, searing, sautéing, simmering, and holding at precise serving temperature are all assisted by the probe and the mat.

Can the mat and the probe be used at the same time?

Paragon only supports the use of one Bluetooth™ accessory at a time. For the types of cooking recommended for Paragon, a single source of precise temperature input is sufficient to produce stunning, repeatable results.

How do you switch between the mat and the probe?

The mat and the probe both accept an easily swappable Bluetooth™ module, which is included with every Paragon induction cooktop. This speedy swapping enables a quick change from sous vide cooking to precision searing.

How does it work?

The wireless temperature sensor continuously monitors temperature and wirelessly send this information to the cooktop, which automatically adjusts the burner’s heat output to maintain the desired temperature. The temperature can be controlled either directly on the cooktop or via the Paragon app.

What is included when I buy Paragon?

Paragon induction cooktop: A 1200-Watt cooktop that supports BlueTooth™-enabled smart cooking

Paragon mat: A Bluetooth™-enabled silicone mat for controlling cookware temperature

Paragon probe: A Bluetooth™-enabled temperature probe for sous vide and more

Paragon Bluetooth™ module: Swappable between the mat and probe for precision temperature monitoring and control

Paragon app: Free download from the App Store

Micro-USB charging cable: For convenient charging of the Bluetooth™ module

How do the mat and the probe work?

The mat and the probe each include a wireless temperature sensor that constantly monitors temperature. The temperature is transmitted via Bluetooth™ to the cooktop, which adjusts burner heat to ensure your food is cooked to perfection.

How do I recharge the Bluetooth™ module?

The wireless temperature sensor has a battery life of about 30 hours. The battery life indicator will blink when the battery is low. To recharge, connect to a computer or wall outlet via the micro-USB port and included cable.

What type of cookware do I need?

Paragon works with any induction-compatible cookware. To test whether your pot or pan works with induction, just verify that a magnet clings when held against the bottom of the cookware. Many, if not most, pots and pans work with induction cooktops. Induction-ready pots are widely available, and start at a very reasonable price.

If you don't yet have induction pots or pans, we recommend Chantal induction cookware because their line of Japanese-steel cookware provides a chemical-free, energy-efficient way to cook on any stovetop, including magnetic-induction stoves. Additionally, all Chantal cookware is specifically designed to go from freezer to stove to table and then directly into the dishwasher.

How big is Paragon?

The glass cooktop surface is about 11.75 inches in diameter. It stores comfortably under the counter.

What is so special about induction cooking?

Traditional electric cooktops can provide only one power level: HOT! They create a range of temperatures by cycling the heater on and off at varying frequencies.

Paragon monitors the food temperature and applies heat only when needed, allowing for accurate and consistent control of the cooking process. That’s why induction cooking is renowned for delicate cooking needs like melting chocolate.

Paragon uses magnetic induction to heat the pan, not the glass cooktop. This provides for quick, efficient and safe heating of your food and faster cooling of the glass cooktop.

How much does it cost?

The Paragon Induction Cooking System will be sold at an estimated retail price of $349. We are offering a significant discount for our Indiegogo backers who support Paragon now.

Do you have more detailed feature information?

Cooktop Features

  • Bluetooth™ connected: Allows the cooktop to adjust temperature based on feedback from the Paragon probe and Paragon mat
  • Precise: Probe maintains liquid temperature within about 1°F. Mat maintains cookware temperature within about 5°F.
  • Responsive: The Paragon Induction Cooktop heats your pan directly (instead of heating the glass cooktop) for superior heat transfer efficiency.
  • Convenient: The 12" diameter cooktop stacks easily in standard cabinets and can operate manually or with the mobile app.

Paragon Mat Features

  • Innovative: New technology enables precision sautéing, simmering, and searing on the Paragon induction cooktop
  • Capable: Designed for use on the Paragon induction cooktop at temperatures less than 500°F
  • Compact: Foldable for easy storage
  • Easy to clean: Bluetooth module can be removed for easy hand washing

Paragon Probe Features 

  • Perfect for Sous Vide: First-ever accessory for sous vide temperature control on a cooktop
  • Smart Design: The magnetic sensor band attaches easily to induction-ready cookware

Mobile App

  • The iOS/Android-compatible app connects to the cooktop via Bluetooth™
  • Includes a guide to sous vide cooking for quick selection of cooking temperatures and times
  • Provides mobile status updates and notification when target temperature/time has been reached
  • Open-source and supported by the FirstBuild online maker community

Do you have detailed product specs on the Paragon?

Temperature Control Specifications

  • Temperature set point resolution: 1°F/C
  • Temperature stability (probe): +/-1°F
  • Temperature stability (mat): +/- 5°F under typical conditions
  • Probe/Mat operating temp range: 80°F to 375°F
  • Cooktop maximum temperature: 500°F (375°F for precision cooking)

Bluetooth™ Module Specifications

  • Connectivity to burner: Bluetooth
  • Power: Rechargeable Battery
  • Battery Life: 30 hours
  • Battery Charge Port: Micro USB
  • Max operating temperature: 375°F
  • Max operating relative humidity: 100%

Burner Specifications

  • Voltage Input: 120V AC
  • Max Current draw: 12A
  • Max Power output (nominal): 1200W
  • Max pot size: 12 inch / 22 quart
  • Capacitive-touch User Interface (UI) functions:
  • On/off button with power-on indicator
  • 1.5-inch temperature display shows the set temp and toggles to show the measured temp
  • Up/Down buttons allow temperature setting to 1°F / 1°C
  • Allows toggle between standard mode (settings 1-10) and precision modes (80°F to 375°F)

Is there an international version of Paragon?

Paragon requires 120V and has a standard US plug. There is no international version of Paragon at this time.

Do you ship internationally?

Paragon will ship to the US only.
story_txt:
Traditional cooktops have settings of low to high, but just like baking, precise and consistent temperature is a must to craft the best dishes. Temperature directly affects the flavor of ingredients and is the secret to cooking like a pro.In order to bring precision to the cooktop, the engineers at FirstBuild have designed the ultimate cooking system. The Paragon gives you flexibility to precisely control pan temperature with the mat, or liquid temperature with the probe.  Whether experimenting with sous vide or cooking the perfect pancake, Paragon gives you the tools to do it right the first time - and every time.Have you ever started cooking and the first pancake is undercooked but the second one burns? Unlike traditional cooktops, when you set the Paragon Induction Cooktop, it reaches the desired temperature quickly and hardly fluctuates. By communicating via bluetooth with the mat or the probe, the smart induction cooktop automatically adjusts to keep your ingredients at the perfect temperature.We’re excited by the science behind cooking and have experimented with the effects of temperature on basic ingredients such as butter and eggs. Through these trials we’ve found that each temperature delivers a specific result. In fact, you can clearly see (and taste) the difference temperature has on the browning of butter.Paragon’s versatility is thanks to a bluetooth connection between the induction cooktop and its accessories, the mat and the probe. The cooktop continuously communicates with the accessories to monitor and maintain temperature wirelessly.To start cooking simply select any induction-ready cookware. If you are using a pan, place the mat on the cooktop.  For pots containing a liquid, place the probe on the edge of the pot. Temperature can then be set directly on the cooktop or through the FirstBuild App. No matter your cooking expertise, Paragon eases the stress of cooking and can help you create a wide variety of dishes using many techniques. Sous vide and sear with confidence on Paragon. This simple, two-step procedure will produce edge-to-edge medium rare with a deep brown, caramelized crust. We recommend searing in butter at 375°F, keeping the butter at a flavorful golden brown. Pairs well with Sous Vide and Sear Bundle. Butter is an essential element to making great food. We used brown butter as a substitute for unsalted butter in the crepe recipe, then added a bit more to the pan when cooking (recommend 350°F). Pairs well with Culinary Basics Bundle.


 

We created this delightful brown butter pasta dish trouble-free with Paragon. Set to 300°F, we were able to brown the butter and mix in the pasta with no concern about burning either one. Pairs well with Everyday Classics Bundle.



 

Fish is a very delicate food that is tricky to master. If the temperature is too low, it doesn't brown. If the temperature is too high, the fish will be dry and unappetizing. 325°F was just right. After using the Paragon mat, you'll never want to go back. Use a fry pan, or try it sous vide-style with the Sous Vide and Sear Bundle.


 

 

 

 

 
 

 

 
 


Ideal for the modern family, Chantal's new Induction 21 Steel™ stainless cookware is made with superior 21/0 Japanese stainless steel.  This steel is stronger and, thanks to the removal of nickel, healthier than steels that are used in other cookware.   Induction 21 Steel™ performs on all cooktops but, as its name suggests, is supremely proficient on magnetic-induction stoves.  Ergonomic handles, dripless pouring rims and glass lids create a visually stunning line that delivers premium cooking performance.GE Appliances’ FirstBuild is a global co-creation community that harnesses the brainpower of the maker movement to change the way major home appliances are conceived, designed and manufactured. A physical state-of-the-art microfactory in Louisville, Kentucky and online forum, FirstBuild speeds products from mind to market and enables customization through small batch production, without the costs and risks of traditional mass manufacturing. For more information about how to get involved, visit FirstBuild.com.

What makes Paragon different?
The Paragon induction cooktop directly monitors cooking temperature, offering precise control for a wide variety of cooking styles. Precision cooking with Paragon is easy and produces repeatable, restaurant-quality results.
The Paragon induction cooktop uses Bluetooth™ technology to maintain cookware and food at a precise temperature. Feedback from wireless temperature sensors controls the heat to maintain the desired temperature with minimal fluctuation during the entire cooking process.
What is the Paragon mat for?
The Paragon mat is our newest addition to the family of Paragon smart sensing accessories. The Paragon mat is about 11.75" in diameter and contains an embedded temperature sensor which communicates cookware temperature to the cooktop. This cutting-edge technology enables stunning, repeatable results for sautéing, simmering, searing, sauces, and a variety of challenging-yet-essential cooking methods.
What is the Paragon probe for?
The Paragon probe is primarily designed for sous vide cooking and liquid temperature control applications. The sous vide technique is becoming popular among consumers who want to replicate the results achieved in high-end restaurants, right at home. In sous vide cooking, the chef places food in a zipper bag and submerges under water for an hour or more at the desired temperature. Food cooked in this way will emerge edge-to-edge at the desired temperature.
Great chefs nearly always follow sous vide cooking with a searing step, and this is where Paragon really stands out. Using the Paragon mat, cooks can sear at a precise temperature, keeping the pan from overheating while rapidly responding to any drop in temperature (as commonly occurs when food is added to a hot pan). No more burned butter or overcooked, tough steak!
Are the new mat and probe compatible with the original Paragon?
Yes, the new mat and probe accessories were designed to be fully backward compatible with the original Paragon induction cooktop. 
What can I cook on Paragon?
The biggest benefits of Paragon can be stated in three broad categories: meats, everyday foods, and culinary basics.
Meats like steak, pork roasts, fish, and scallops require delicate handling, and Paragon excels at every step. Using the Paragon probe, cooks can prepare the meat to their desired final cooking temperature through sous vide cooking. Cooks will then follow up with a precision searing step, a simple and effective way to produce a step-by-step culinary masterpiece.
Everyday foods like grilled cheese, pancakes, and hamburgers are staples of our cooking repertoire, but cooking them perfectly every time can elude even experienced chefs. Using the Paragon mat, moms, dads, kids and college students can recreate their personal-best cooking results time after time. Whether you like your eggs over-medium or sunny-side-up, the Paragon mat will bring a whole new level of precision and repeatability to your cooking game.
Culinary basics are the essential building blocks of perfectly executed food. From gumbo to gravy, food is better when cooked the way it was originally intended. Essentials like caramelized onions, brown butter, and roux have traditionally required patience, skill, and vast amounts of attention. The Paragon mat enables stress-free preparations of even the most vexing dishes, with stunning results on the first try.
What cooking methods does Paragon support?
The Paragon induction cooktop is a single device capable of cooking using several precision cooking methods. Sous vide, searing, sautéing, simmering, and holding at precise serving temperature are all assisted by the probe and the mat.
Can the mat and the probe be used at the same time?
Paragon only supports the use of one Bluetooth™ accessory at a time. For the types of cooking recommended for Paragon, a single source of precise temperature input is sufficient to produce stunning, repeatable results.
How do you switch between the mat and the probe?
The mat and the probe both accept an easily swappable Bluetooth™ module, which is included with every Paragon induction cooktop. This speedy swapping enables a quick change from sous vide cooking to precision searing.
How does it work?
The wireless temperature sensor continuously monitors temperature and wirelessly send this information to the cooktop, which automatically adjusts the burner’s heat output to maintain the desired temperature. The temperature can be controlled either directly on the cooktop or via the Paragon app.
What is included when I buy Paragon?
Paragon induction cooktop: A 1200-Watt cooktop that supports BlueTooth™-enabled smart cooking
Paragon mat: A Bluetooth™-enabled silicone mat for controlling cookware temperature
Paragon probe: A Bluetooth™-enabled temperature probe for sous vide and more
Paragon Bluetooth™ module: Swappable between the mat and probe for precision temperature monitoring and control
Paragon app: Free download from the App Store
Micro-USB charging cable: For convenient charging of the Bluetooth™ module
How do the mat and the probe work?
The mat and the probe each include a wireless temperature sensor that constantly monitors temperature. The temperature is transmitted via Bluetooth™ to the cooktop, which adjusts burner heat to ensure your food is cooked to perfection.
How do I recharge the Bluetooth™ module?
The wireless temperature sensor has a battery life of about 30 hours. The battery life indicator will blink when the battery is low. To recharge, connect to a computer or wall outlet via the micro-USB port and included cable.
What type of cookware do I need?
Paragon works with any induction-compatible cookware. To test whether your pot or pan works with induction, just verify that a magnet clings when held against the bottom of the cookware. Many, if not most, pots and pans work with induction cooktops. Induction-ready pots are widely available, and start at a very reasonable price.
If you don't yet have induction pots or pans, we recommend Chantal induction cookware because their line of Japanese-steel cookware provides a chemical-free, energy-efficient way to cook on any stovetop, including magnetic-induction stoves. Additionally, all Chantal cookware is specifically designed to go from freezer to stove to table and then directly into the dishwasher.
How big is Paragon?
The glass cooktop surface is about 11.75 inches in diameter. It stores comfortably under the counter.
What is so special about induction cooking?
Traditional electric cooktops can provide only one power level: HOT! They create a range of temperatures by cycling the heater on and off at varying frequencies.
Paragon monitors the food temperature and applies heat only when needed, allowing for accurate and consistent control of the cooking process. That’s why induction cooking is renowned for delicate cooking needs like melting chocolate.
Paragon uses magnetic induction to heat the pan, not the glass cooktop. This provides for quick, efficient and safe heating of your food and faster cooling of the glass cooktop.
How much does it cost?
The Paragon Induction Cooking System will be sold at an estimated retail price of $349. We are offering a significant discount for our Indiegogo backers who support Paragon now.
Do you have more detailed feature information?
Cooktop Features


Bluetooth™ connected: Allows the cooktop to adjust temperature based on feedback from the Paragon probe and Paragon mat

Precise: Probe maintains liquid temperature within about 1°F. Mat maintains cookware temperature within about 5°F.

Responsive: The Paragon Induction Cooktop heats your pan directly (instead of heating the glass cooktop) for superior heat transfer efficiency.

Convenient: The 12" diameter cooktop stacks easily in standard cabinets and can operate manually or with the mobile app.

Paragon Mat Features


Innovative: New technology enables precision sautéing, simmering, and searing on the Paragon induction cooktop

Capable: Designed for use on the Paragon induction cooktop at temperatures less than 500°F

Compact: Foldable for easy storage

Easy to clean: Bluetooth module can be removed for easy hand washing

Paragon Probe Features 


Perfect for Sous Vide: First-ever accessory for sous vide temperature control on a cooktop

Smart Design: The magnetic sensor band attaches easily to induction-ready cookware

Mobile App

The iOS/Android-compatible app connects to the cooktop via Bluetooth™
Includes a guide to sous vide cooking for quick selection of cooking temperatures and times
Provides mobile status updates and notification when target temperature/time has been reached
Open-source and supported by the FirstBuild online maker community

Do you have detailed product specs on the Paragon?
Temperature Control Specifications

Temperature set point resolution: 1°F/C
Temperature stability (probe): +/-1°F
Temperature stability (mat): +/- 5°F under typical conditions
Probe/Mat operating temp range: 80°F to 375°F
Cooktop maximum temperature: 500°F (375°F for precision cooking)

Bluetooth™ Module Specifications

Connectivity to burner: Bluetooth
Power: Rechargeable Battery
Battery Life: 30 hours
Battery Charge Port: Micro USB
Max operating temperature: 375°F
Max operating relative humidity: 100%

Burner Specifications

Voltage Input: 120V AC
Max Current draw: 12A
Max Power output (nominal): 1200W
Max pot size: 12 inch / 22 quart
Capacitive-touch User Interface (UI) functions:
On/off button with power-on indicator
1.5-inch temperature display shows the set temp and toggles to show the measured temp
Up/Down buttons allow temperature setting to 1°F / 1°C
Allows toggle between standard mode (settings 1-10) and precision modes (80°F to 375°F)

Is there an international version of Paragon?
Paragon requires 120V and has a standard US plug. There is no international version of Paragon at this time.
Do you ship internationally?
Paragon will ship to the US only.

story:
We are all exposed to many different types of stress in our lives. Each of us have different ways to soothe our minds, hearts and bodies.

 

Here, we have one simple way to release your stress.

 

    that can be used as a huge squishy, plush cushion and hug & Lean pillow.

Good quality relaxation has become a luxury that many cannot seem to afford. It's a FACT that we need to release our stress to be healthy and function properly.

 

 

People want to touch the soft like squishies and slimes because it solves the lack of sensual desires in society. It relieves anxiety throughout the daily life and feels satisfies with the touch of them. Although the culture has becoming diversified, the most basic sense is not satisfied to many people. Playing with objects such as slime gives people a relaxing sensation that relieves stress. 

 

 

 

Feel the Cloud!

 

Cloud nine is safe & functional in its healthy & comfy way!

Memory foam or EPS Styrofoam has an unpleasant smell and is unhealthy. If the beads leak out, they can be inhaled and  Memory foam releases dangerous VOC gas. Squishies and Slime also have a dangerous amount of chemicals that are hazardous to your health. 

 

 

CL9 Removed The Chemical Harm but keeps the TOUCH. 

 

 

Special 100% polyester gel fiber

The result of using a Siliconized Micro Denier 100% Polyester Gel Fiber is the most smart and high quality down-alternative cushion.  

 

 

Siliconized polyester filler is a type of filler created from synthetic fiber, polyester, which is treated with a silicate material. This silicone coating adds a feather-like touch to the fill, which makes it very slippery, soft and easy to work with. The siliconized process also makes the fiber resistant to bacteria, non-allergenic. 

 

 

Polyester Fiberfill 15 Denier is an extra-comfortable polyester stuffing with a slick finish to prevent bunching. This thin microfiber can fit more inside the cushion and provide maximum comfort. Silicon coating makes CL9 cushion water-repellent, so it's machine washable. It is not easily scattered and clumped. The filling may tangle up in laundering a little bit, but can be smoothed back out with your hand because the length of the fiber is short. 

 

 

 Small squishy is the perfect size to play with. You can use it as an indoor playing ball.   

 

 

Medium size cushion is just right to hug and hold onto. Use it when you take a nap or just to rest on.

 

 

The Jumbo ball is ideal for using as body pillow. It is huggable, leanable, and seatable. Just sink into it gives you the feeling that you are floating on the clouds.

 

 

 

 

CL9 Jumbo Cushion Outdoor Cover  

For your comfort, we added a weather-resistant outdoor cover. Cloud Nine outdoor cover protects from scratches, dusts, and water. You can bring it to the pool, backyard, and anywhere!

 

 

 

 

 STRETCH GOAL!!

 (not available for Face & Arm pillow)

 

CL9 has a very unique smooth, gummy & squishy feeling.You can hug it, lean on it, sink into it and use it as a cushion or pillow for any occasion.

 

 

 Care Instruction

 

Care: Machine wash on gentle cycle in cold water with mild detergent. Tumble dry set on low heat setting or air dry. Add dryer balls to keep it fluffy. Reshape the cushion with your hands after it is dried to return to its original shape. CL9 all fabrics and fillings are machine washable but depends on the size of your washing machine, we recommend washing the cover only for the jumbo cushion. 

Note: Items are compressed for shipping. We recommend opening as soon as possible. Compressed filling takes up to a day to regain its original size and shape. 

 

I  frequently sacrifice my sleep in order to balance my work and family. I was always so tired that I would take a nap anywhere and anytime I had the chance. I couldn’t find a cushion or pillow that allowed me to release the stress and get the most comfortable rest. One day, my daughter was playing with slime and said she wants to touch it all day long even when she goes to bed because she liked that gummy feeling. However, I couldn’t let her play with the slime since the ingredients of the slime-like boric-acid and sodium-borate include harmful chemicals.

 

my daughter loves to play with slime!

 

I decided to create a soft but stretchy, and safe feeling ‘slime-like stress ball’ so that everyone can use it. Well, it was NOT EASY. Choosing a perfect fabric for soft and gummy feeling, with hypo-allergenic (because my daughter has very sensitive skin), should be easy to wash but does not get stuffy. We had a hard time communicating with factories while we choose the perfect fabric, and the GIANT package shipping was a challenge. 

 

But ultimately, our final CL9 cushion is born! The final CL9 cushion is made with stretchy spandex + soft velvet fabric. Soft and stretchy cover helps you to stretch and shape cushion easier. The Short cut microfiber filling makes you more comfortable and relaxed. We are happy to introduce CL9 cushion set to many of you through Kickstarter, and looking forward to launch more awesome projects.

 

 

Risks and challenges

Shipping packages worldwide can be very challenging. So we have worked hard to ensure that our products are delivered properly. We will be transparent and communicate any issues or delays that arise. You can always reach out to us with any concerns or questions and we will do our best to resolve them.

story:
| Website | Instagram | Press kit |  

Say hello to the Lupe Pure Cordless.  

The world's best performing cordless vacuum.

Designed and built for long-term ownership.

The cordless, fully realised...finally. 

 As seen in:

Before anything else, our product must be an outstanding vacuum cleaner. 

The Pure Cordless excels at these three major factors where others are compromised. 

Our patented technology delivers enduring power that cannot be matched and our unique platform delivers the rest.

The Pure Cordless is a premium machine featuring the latest technology in brushless motors, batteries and dust collection. 

There is no better machine for gathering dust and dirt, and our HEPA filtration captures 99.97% of fine dust and allergens. 

Lupe's enduring suction comes from inner strength.

Our patented Suction Intensifier delivers the strongest and most efficient suction of any cordless out there, with no compromise in picking up any debris type.

See for yourself how we compare to the competition on an exceptional challenge of 20mm (0.8 inches) deep grooves filled with dust :

How does it work? Unassuming on the outside, you have to look within to find the source of Lupe’s enduring power:

Patented Suction Intensifier technology

Optimum pick up across different surfaces and debris types all the time, with no settings to change.

1 - Powerful motorised agitator for cleaning hair and deep-down dirt – great for carpet. 

2 - Air tight rotating seal conforms to all surfaces and debris, preventing unnecessary leaks and increasing suction - great for hard floors. 

3 - Velocity vane increases air velocity by reducing the opening on the floor surface.

Increased velocity and eliminated leaks results in up to x10 the useful suction at the cleaner head compared to some conventional designs.  

Doing more with less. That’s the power of pure. 

 

outstanding dust cleaning performance for a full 60 minutes

Power is nothing without endurance. Unlike other models, the pure cordless offers outstanding dust cleaning performance for a full 60 minutes. 

Put simply, the Pure Cordless cleans significantly more than the competition between charges.  

More cleaning, less charging. That’s the power of pure.  

 

The Lupe Pure Cordless is a true 3-in-1 vacuum that offers the best of all worlds wrapped into one convenient package, and has outstanding reach to high places (2m/6.5ft)

Conventional cordless stick vacuums put all the weight in your hand, Lupe’s unique format makes cleaning high easy with significantly less weight to lift:

Taking the cleaning head off to switch between configurations is really quick and easy.

Fully capable but smaller in size

We've aimed to bring the whole-house vacuum up to date with the 21st century. The Pure Cordless is slim and convenient but packed with power.

 

One cleaning head

Rather than multiple cleaning heads, we focused on one head capable of cleaning all surfaces, one that seamlessly moves from one surface to another.

There’s no longer any need to have multiple vacuums (or multiple heads) for different tasks. 

Because sometimes, one head really is better than two.  

 

Social and environmental impact 

Did you know 50% of small electrical appliances taken to waste processing in the European Union is from vacuum cleaners? It's pretty shocking.

Especially in cordless vacuums, many companies launch 'new' products year after year which drives perfectly usable, or easily repairable product to waste.

Lupe is different. And the Pure Cordless is different. It is fully serviceable and almost every part can be replaced. It has been designed to be as long-lasting as possible: using the best components and materials. 

It's been designed to be as easy to maintain as possible. We will support long-term ownership through open supply of spares and making upgrades available to battery packs and motors as technology moves on. 

You don't throw your whole bicycle away if you want to upgrade a wheel or fit a new tyre - we take that approach to vacuum cleaners.  

We all need great performing products but in an age of huge waste a more conscious effort is required to make essential products last just a little longer. 

Its our founding principle.

See how the Pure Cordless is different:

1- Battery pack removable without tools

2- Brushless motor housed in separate removable housing 

3- Washable lifetime filters

4- Single service panel reveals access to motor and control PCB

5- Detachable pickup head has removable components and no PCB electronics on board

6- Dust separation system is self-contained and made from polycarbonate for exceptional durability 

7- All control electronics centrally housed and re-programmable

 

The Pure Cordless will be built in a factory that pay workers fairly, have high standards of health and safety and is ISO14001 certified. It is committed to conducting business in a manner that delivers continuous improvement in environmental performance and protects the quality of communities where it operates.  

Our chosen factory:

  • harvests rainwater
  • collects solar energy
  • makes use of a ground source system for climate control

 

We wanted the Pure Cordless to be everything you'd expect of a modern vacuum cleaner, not just a cordless, and we have integrated every feature to the highest possible specification.

 

1- Pickup Head:

The most energy-efficient dust pick-up technology available intensifies the suction for deep-down cleaning across all surfaces - no settings to change. 

Two motorised agitators deal with any debris type - large, fine and pet hair. 

Easy to remove both brush rollers simply using a coin:

2- Motor:

Our Japanese brushless motor spins at 108,000rpm (twice as fast as a jet engine) and has exceptional energy efficiency. It's also exceptionally durable.

3- Cyclonic Bagless Separator:

With two stages of cyclonic separation and two stages of filtration the Pure Cordless is at the cutting edge of dust separation technology.

With a genuine 1000cc (1 liter) capacity the Lupe pure cordless has the one of the largest bin capacities of any cordless. Less bin emptying to get the job done quicker.  

It is also really easy to empty:

The Pure Cordless 32.4V 81Wh Li-Ion battery delivers 60 minutes of powerful cleaning from one single charge. The LEDs on the front communicate accurate charge capacity remaining.

The battery can be charged on the machine with no dock, or taken out and charged discretely while the machine is stowed away in a cupboard.

Easy to replace or upgrade in the future:

More cleaning, less charging. That’s the power of pure. 

The Pure Cordless has 9 Murata (formerly Sony) high drain, high capacity lithium-ion cells. The battery pack is fitted with a fully featured protection board to monitor health of the battery and communicate with the control system in the Pure Cordless to always ensure optimum performance.

5- HEPA Anti-Allergy Filter:

A genuine HEPA (H13) filter separating 99.97% of fine dust and allergens down to 0.3 millionths of a meter. Easy to remove and wash for optimum performance. 

Other brands use lower grade filters that allow 100's of times more fine dust through. 

Accept no substitutes. That's the power of pure.

Accessory Tools:

We've focused on giving you the multi-function accessory tools that are useful, not a drawer-full that clutters your home and never gets used. 

An upholstery tool and a crevice tool both with slide up/down bristles for dusting. 

The Pure Cordless is supplied with a holder to attach them to the product to save you losing them.

Simple Controls:

The Pure Cordless has very simple controls to access the three power modes and to turn-off/override the brush roller for delicate surfaces. 

The Pure Cordless has been designed and built with two principles at heart - purity of purpose, and longevity of design. 

We’ve designed and built the best possible product with the singular purpose of keeping your home clean, and we’ve designed it to last: no built-in obsolescence, no superseding product every year.  

It's not just us that likes the design- we've won an award!

We have spent the last 3.5 years developing the pure cordless to perfection and we are now ready to start production.

Technical Specs: 

 

How we compare to the competition: 

We have stock! Please go to our website to purchase.

We are offering the first batch of Lupe Cordless on Indiegogo InDemand at big discount off the retail price (Retail price will be ± £699 / USD 869).

What's in the box? 

1- pure cordless main body

2- universal pick-up head with suction intensifier technology

3- lithium ion battery pack

4- charger (will be territory specific)

5- detachable wand

6- multi-function crevice and upholstery accessory tools and on-board mount

 

We are offering a 3 year warranty as standard on the Pure Cordless.  

[2 years on the battery pack- this is limited usage habits and is out of our control.]

If anything comes up, don’t worry because we stand behind our product, just get in touch with us. We will assess the specific problem and decide the quickest way to get your machine back in working order

We designed the Pure Cordless with serviceability in mind. Most major parts can be individually removed and replaced. This not only makes it easier to keep your Pure Cordless in perfect functional condition, it also drastically reduces the amount of waste and unnecessary obsolescence.

 

How it all started 

Lupe Technology is a Tech startup based in Bristol, UK - a city with a rich engineering history.

Lucas Horne and Pablo Montero founded the company in 2015 with the vision to solve the frustrations they saw consumers were having with cordless vacuum cleaners that were becoming ever more popular but failing to deliver on expectations, both on performance and longevity.

Lucas and Pablo met while working together in the Research and Development department at Dyson. Together we were in charge of a major project to make a vacuum cleaner that was many times better than their other products at the time. We learnt a great deal about what a vacuum cleaner needs to do and what makes it last. 

Following our time at Dyson, we went our separate ways but saw that the problem with cordless vacuums’ poor suction and built in obsolescence continued unaddressed.

With a fresh outlook (and a clean sheet of paper) Lupe was founded and the start of a three and a half year journey began. Through many hundreds of prototypes and testing, our team developed the patented Suction Intensifier technology to pick up dust more efficiently, and the unique Lupe Pure Cordless platform to carry it. 

Developing products is time-consuming and costly and we’re very grateful to those who have supported us on this journey - our investors and also the UK Government agency (Innovate UK) that supports the development of innovative British technology. We've reached a critical time when the development is (almost) over and we are ready to launch the product and the brand. 

The Pure Cordless will be rolling off the production line later this year - the end of one part of our journey but an exciting start to the next phase. 

 

Lucas Horne (Co-Founder):   

Industrial Designer. Experience of consumer goods development from Bosch and Dyson. Successfully sold IP to Dyson, along with generating multiple Patents on vacuum cleaner technology. Leads day to day technical development of Lupe. A proven innovator with the right balance of pragmatism and creativity. 

Pablo Montero (Co-Founder):

Aeronautical Engineer. Leadership and Programme Management experience from Dyson, HiETA Technologies (successful startup) & National Composites Centre. Leads day to day operational and financial management of Lupe. The business head. Lateral thinker. 

Oliver Skittery (Design Engineer):

1st Class graduate mechanical engineer from the University of Bath. Experience from internationally renown agency DCA design.

Hamish Barclay (Commercial Director):

Former business owner, consultant and start-up expert. Extensive international experience across a range of industries and routes to market spanning two decades. 

Hans Falkenburg (Advisory Board Chairman):

Ex-CEO of Cotswold Outdoor/Snow and Rock Group. Provides strategic guidance and level-headed sounding board for business decisions

Tony Chen (NPD Engineer):

Formerly new production manager at GTECH (maker of AirRam product series). Located in Dongguan, China.

Gary Poolman (Design Engineer):

Former Senior Mechanical Designer at Dyson.

Ryder Industries (manufacturing partner):

Ryder industries is Swiss owned and has been in operation for over 40 years. Manufactures for brands such as Marshall (amplifiers) and Boa (lace up systems).

Why Indiegogo InDemand?

We are very much a true startup company founded by just two people three and a half years ago. As we progress now from our Research and Development stage into getting our product to market, its very important to us to build a following and get our product known about as much as possible.  

We have been very successful on another crowdfunding platform prior to Indiegogo InDemand and now we are in the pre-production stages with our product at our factory. 

Every sale we make before production helps us, and in return for your early backing we are offering you a big discount from the standard retail price of ± £699 / USD 869. 

This is our production timeline from now until you receive your Lupe Pure Cordless.

Thank you for supporting our campaign and a special thank you to everyone else who has helped us on our journey so far. It would not have been possible without the support of everyone involved - friends, family, investors, advisers and our manufacturing partner. We look forward to the next stage of our journey in delivering the ultimate cordless vacuum
story_txt:
| Website | Instagram | Press kit |  

Say hello to the Lupe Pure Cordless.  
The world's best performing cordless vacuum.
Designed and built for long-term ownership.
The cordless, fully realised...finally. 

 As seen in:


Before anything else, our product must be an outstanding vacuum cleaner. 
The Pure Cordless excels at these three major factors where others are compromised. 
Our patented technology delivers enduring power that cannot be matched and our unique platform delivers the rest.
The Pure Cordless is a premium machine featuring the latest technology in brushless motors, batteries and dust collection. 
There is no better machine for gathering dust and dirt, and our HEPA filtration captures 99.97% of fine dust and allergens. 

 
unrivalled suction power through patented technology

Lupe's enduring suction comes from inner strength.
Our patented Suction Intensifier delivers the strongest and most efficient suction of any cordless out there, with no compromise in picking up any debris type.
See for yourself how we compare to the competition on an exceptional challenge of 20mm (0.8 inches) deep grooves filled with dust :

How does it work? Unassuming on the outside, you have to look within to find the source of Lupe’s enduring power:

Patented Suction Intensifier technology
Optimum pick up across different surfaces and debris types all the time, with no settings to change.
1 - Powerful motorised agitator for cleaning hair and deep-down dirt – great for carpet. 
2 - Air tight rotating seal conforms to all surfaces and debris, preventing unnecessary leaks and increasing suction - great for hard floors. 
3 - Velocity vane increases air velocity by reducing the opening on the floor surface.
Increased velocity and eliminated leaks results in up to x10 the useful suction at the cleaner head compared to some conventional designs.  
Doing more with less. That’s the power of pure. 
 

outstanding dust cleaning performance for a full 60 minutes


Power is nothing without endurance. Unlike other models, the pure cordless offers outstanding dust cleaning performance for a full 60 minutes. 
Put simply, the Pure Cordless cleans significantly more than the competition between charges.  
More cleaning, less charging. That’s the power of pure.  
 

unique format adapts to every cleaning task


The Lupe Pure Cordless is a true 3-in-1 vacuum that offers the best of all worlds wrapped into one convenient package, and has outstanding reach to high places (2m/6.5ft)
the pure cordless has a 2m reach
Conventional cordless stick vacuums put all the weight in your hand, Lupe’s unique format makes cleaning high easy with significantly less weight to lift:
less weight in hand for high reach cleaning
Taking the cleaning head off to switch between configurations is really quick and easy.
Fully capable but smaller in size
We've aimed to bring the whole-house vacuum up to date with the 21st century. The Pure Cordless is slim and convenient but packed with power.

 
One cleaning head
Rather than multiple cleaning heads, we focused on one head capable of cleaning all surfaces, one that seamlessly moves from one surface to another.
There’s no longer any need to have multiple vacuums (or multiple heads) for different tasks. 
Because sometimes, one head really is better than two.  



 
Social and environmental impact 
Did you know 50% of small electrical appliances taken to waste processing in the European Union is from vacuum cleaners? It's pretty shocking.

Especially in cordless vacuums, many companies launch 'new' products year after year which drives perfectly usable, or easily repairable product to waste.
Lupe is different. And the Pure Cordless is different. It is fully serviceable and almost every part can be replaced. It has been designed to be as long-lasting as possible: using the best components and materials. 
It's been designed to be as easy to maintain as possible. We will support long-term ownership through open supply of spares and making upgrades available to battery packs and motors as technology moves on. 
You don't throw your whole bicycle away if you want to upgrade a wheel or fit a new tyre - we take that approach to vacuum cleaners.  
We all need great performing products but in an age of huge waste a more conscious effort is required to make essential products last just a little longer. 
Its our founding principle.
See how the Pure Cordless is different:

1- Battery pack removable without tools
2- Brushless motor housed in separate removable housing 
3- Washable lifetime filters
4- Single service panel reveals access to motor and control PCB
5- Detachable pickup head has removable components and no PCB electronics on board
6- Dust separation system is self-contained and made from polycarbonate for exceptional durability 
7- All control electronics centrally housed and re-programmable
 
the Pure Cordless has been expertly engineered in detail to ensure the design can stand the test of time
The Pure Cordless will be built in a factory that pay workers fairly, have high standards of health and safety and is ISO14001 certified. It is committed to conducting business in a manner that delivers continuous improvement in environmental performance and protects the quality of communities where it operates.  
Our chosen factory:

harvests rainwater
collects solar energy
makes use of a ground source system for climate control

 

We wanted the Pure Cordless to be everything you'd expect of a modern vacuum cleaner, not just a cordless, and we have integrated every feature to the highest possible specification.

 
1- Pickup Head:

The most energy-efficient dust pick-up technology available intensifies the suction for deep-down cleaning across all surfaces - no settings to change. 
Two motorised agitators deal with any debris type - large, fine and pet hair. 
Easy to remove both brush rollers simply using a coin:
2- Motor:

Our Japanese brushless motor spins at 108,000rpm (twice as fast as a jet engine) and has exceptional energy efficiency. It's also exceptionally durable.3- Cyclonic Bagless Separator:With two stages of cyclonic separation and two stages of filtration the Pure Cordless is at the cutting edge of dust separation technology.With a genuine 1000cc (1 liter) capacity the Lupe pure cordless has the one of the largest bin capacities of any cordless. Less bin emptying to get the job done quicker.  It is also really easy to empty:4- Battery:The Pure Cordless 32.4V 81Wh Li-Ion battery delivers 60 minutes of powerful cleaning from one single charge. The LEDs on the front communicate accurate charge capacity remaining.The battery can be charged on the machine with no dock, or taken out and charged discretely while the machine is stowed away in a cupboard.Easy to replace or upgrade in the future:More cleaning, less charging. That’s the power of pure. The Pure Cordless has 9 Murata (formerly Sony) high drain, high capacity lithium-ion cells. The battery pack is fitted with a fully featured protection board to monitor health of the battery and communicate with the control system in the Pure Cordless to always ensure optimum performance.5- HEPA Anti-Allergy Filter:A genuine HEPA (H13) filter separating 99.97% of fine dust and allergens down to 0.3 millionths of a meter. Easy to remove and wash for optimum performance. Other brands use lower grade filters that allow 100's of times more fine dust through. Accept no substitutes. That's the power of pure.Accessory Tools:We've focused on giving you the multi-function accessory tools that are useful, not a drawer-full that clutters your home and never gets used. An upholstery tool and a crevice tool both with slide up/down bristles for dusting. The Pure Cordless is supplied with a holder to attach them to the product to save you losing them.Simple Controls:The Pure Cordless has very simple controls to access the three power modes and to turn-off/override the brush roller for delicate surfaces. The Pure Cordless has been designed and built with two principles at heart - purity of purpose, and longevity of design. We’ve designed and built the best possible product with the singular purpose of keeping your home clean, and we’ve designed it to last: no built-in obsolescence, no superseding product every year.  It's not just us that likes the design- we've won an award!We have spent the last 3.5 years developing the pure cordless to perfection and we are now ready to start production.3.5 years of evolution of the Lupe pure cordless

story:
Check the unbox video here

 

 

Check out the review from hair specialist Guy Tang

 

Is your bathroom a tangle of cords that creates a mess around the sink? It’s definitely a hassle when trying to dry your hair and loose electrical cords are dangerous in wet environments. Being tied to the power outlet also makes it difficult when sharing a bathroom with others. The Lylux cordless hair dryer sets you free from the cord, dries hair quickly and simplifies your life. Say goodbye to cords and take your hair dryer anywhere.

 

  • Blow-drying Hair During Your Morning Routine

 

Mornings are busy. To get out the door on time, you need to be a multi-tasker. Lylux cordless hair dryer is here to help. Now you can dry your hair while moving freely around the house, waking up the kids, choosing your outfit for the day or grabbing a cup of coffee. Lylux speeds up your morning routine and gets you ready for the day.

 
  •  Take It To The Gym 

 

Lylux cordless hair dryer is super portable. After you finish your workout, you can wash your hair and get a professional blow-dry with Lylux immediately. You won’t be searching for a power outlet or leaving the gym with wet hair. Lylux helps you look your best at all times.

 
  •  Blow-drying Kid's Hair
     

 

Lylux cordless hair dryer is a perfect helper for active kids. No matter where your kids are, dry their hair easily while they are playing. Cable free, worry-free.

 
  •  Fast Drying For Pet’s Hair 

 

In order to keep your pet’s coat healthy, you should dry their hair after every bath. Lylux cordless hair dryer is pet-friendly. With stronger air velocity and perfect temperature control, dry their hair faster and safer. 

  •  Fast Drying

With a 100,000 rpm powerful motor, Lylux is 3 times faster than other hair dryers. Even airflow and a powerful motor shorten your hair drying process during busy daily routines.

 
  •  Temperature Control

 Most hair dryers get too hot and drying hair at extreme temperatures leaves hair brittle, causing breakage and split ends.

 

 

Lylux prevents this by using an intelligent sensor for temperature control that maintains a perfect 104° F that dries hair quickly without overheating it.

 

  •  Magnetic Accessories For Different Hair Types

 

A magnetic smoothing nozzle mounts to the dryer with one click. Concentrated airflow helps you to create a natural and sleek finish.

 

  •  A Fine Matte Space Grey Design 

 

The exquisite design perfectly matches all home decoration styles. Lylux cordless hair dryer is a compelling item to embellish your dresser and bathroom.

 
  • Portable Design

 

Lylux cordless hair dryer isn’t limited to household use. Its small size and light weight make it perfect for outdoor use. Go traveling or camping with Lylux cordless hair dryer, for great hair care on any journey.

 
  • Bladeless Design Never Catches Hair

 

 

You’ll never need to worry about your hair getting pulled into the dryer. Bladeless design keeps your hair safe during use. Lylux cordless hair dryer is user-friendly and safe for all ages.

 
  •  Four Settings For Maximum Versatility 

Multiple speed and heat settings meet the needs of any hairstyle. The high speed and heat is perfect for drying hair quickly, while a lower speed and heat provide more styling control and limit tangling and frizziness.

 
  •  Fully Recharge Battery In Just 1 Hour 

 

Lylux cordless hair dryer can be charged fully in a short time. 45 minutes results in recharge up to 85% and a full charge takes just 1 hour so it’s always ready to go when you are.
