story:
DeskSpace – Capture Humanities Greatest Step

 

On 20th July 1969 the first human took the first steps on the surface of the moon. This event captured the imagination of the entire world and catapulted us into the space-age. Now each of us can experience a small slice of this event through DeskSpace – the most detailed model of the lunar surface currently available at this scale.  

 

 

Created using data from NASA’s Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter, the beautiful topography of the far side of the moon has been recreated using jewellery-grade concrete. Hand-finished and presented on a precision machine space-grade aluminium base, this is a truly unique and fascinating item that will be a talking point in any home or office.   

 

NASA Data

From the dawn of time, the moon has captured our hearts and our imaginations. Now, you can bring the moon’s lunar surface into your home. Using NASA landscape data, we have faithfully recreated the moon’s stunningly cratered topography from beautiful jewellery grade concrete. When highlighted under a direct light source, it is striking and intricately detailed – almost as beautiful as the real thing.

 

Apollo 11 50th Anniversary

 

It was 50 years ago that the first Apollo landing took place. With such an important anniversary, we understand that space enthusiasts need special items for their collections.

 

 

We have produced the most iconic part of the lunar landscape and as a special gift for our crowdfunding supporters, we are including special additional items that pay homage to the lunar landing, just for our supporters to show our appreciation.

 

 

Lunar Surface Size Comparison

Available in two sizes, your lunar surface display item is beautifully presented in its own gift box. The larger version can be wall hung or displayed on a shelf, while the small version is ideal as part of a coffee table display or as a desk top item.  

 

 

Lunar Surface - Large

Measuring 180mm x 180mm, this display piece is perfect for a wall or shelf. Detailing the most stunning areas of the moon surface that is littered with craters due to the constant bombardment of meteorites across many millions of years. This gradual disintegration of the lunar surface gives it its distinctive look that we are all so familiar with.

 

 

Lunar Surface - Regular

As a 100mm x 100mm concrete piece, this intricate lunar surface model rests on its precision machined and anodized base with a perfectly polished mirror logo. This item matches all our other DeskSpace pieces and can form a part of a beautiful space-themed collection. You can be sure that there will be the same attention to detail and consistent beauty across the entire range.   

 

 

 

Apollo Pen and Rocket Stand + Notepad

Paying homage to the perilous Apollo 11 mission we've created a fully bespoke ballpoint pen and rocket stand. The Apollo Pen stands tall looking ready to take off next to the Lunar Surface. A striking reminder of the great strides humanity has taken to reach the stars every time you use it. We also include a custom made hardback notebook, with the DeskSpace logo debossed on the bottom left corner. 

 

Lunar Surface - Large + Pen/Stand + Hardback Notepad

 

Lunar Surface - Regular + Pen/Stand + Hardback Notepad​

 

Both the pen and base are precision CNC machined out of aerospace-grade aluminium using custom made cutting tools. The parts are then anodized in deep black and assembled with a near-perfect fit.

 

Apollo 11 50th Anniversary Commemorative Coin

Capture this historic moment with a limited edition Apollo 11 50th Anniversary Commemorative Coin coated in 99% silver.

 

A perfect gift for a friend or loved one

Every one of us has looked to the stars and wondered about other worlds and the expanse of time and space. Our moon is but a tiny part of the night sky and yet it holds such wonder as it is so easily seen with the naked eye. Having a tiny piece of the moon as a stylish display item makes a wonderful gift for anyone who holds a fascination with space. 

 

 

A stylish and sophisticated accessory for the home and office

 

Any home that is full of curious minds and a fascination of space deserves to have beautiful items that nurture that curiosity and provoke conversation – the DeskSpace lunar surface model does exactly that. Ideal for a family home as a coffee table centrepiece, this model will bring the family together and provides a piece of beauty for any environment.

 

Perfect for a Home Office

 

 

Proudly Display on a Shelf or Mantlepiece

 

 

Beautiful Hanging Display 

 

 

Inspire Young and Old Alike

 

 

Premium Materials Created With Precision

 

We worked tirelessly to source the exact mineral most suited to represent the complexities and character of the lunar surface. We carefully selected only craftsmen who create jewellery from concrete. Portland cement is used as the foundation for each moulded concrete part, with the level of bubbles carefully controlled with each piece coming out truly unique. This timeless process produces only the most beautiful results and creates a piece that is unique and robust.

 

 

Lighting Up The Surface

 

We wanted to stay true to the unique beauty of the portland cement material. In order to best show the unique beauty of every impact crater, we recommend lighting each piece parallel to the main surface to highlight the dips and shadows of intricate texture. This can easily be achieved with either a desktop lamp for ceiling light for when the large piece is hung on a wall.

Direct lighting across the Lunar Surface gives best results

 

Direct lighting across the Lunar Surface gives best results

 

Learn about the Moon and Apollo 11 lunar landing

 

Included with your DeskSpace Lunar Surface is a high quality, a heavyweight book designed to provide you with interesting, intriguing and fun facts about the Moon and lunar landing. The book offers detailed images and a clever design that allows it to nestle inside the box, then unfold to reveal a stunning full-bleed image of the moon. This is the perfect addition to the Lunar Surface and turns it from a curiosity into a practical gift for all space enthusiasts.

 

 

 

What’s in the box

 

We have paid close attention to every detail of the unboxing experience. We pride ourselves on quality and this comes down to every part including the packaging. Each Lunar Surface comes in a high-quality ridged gift box, with the concrete model and base protected with layers of EVA foam. The set also includes a bespoke information booklet, letter of authenticity with a unique serial number and a cleaning cloth.

 

 

Extension of DeskSpace Series

 

We are proud to present the Lunar Surface model as the next part on our space-themed journey. The base of the small Lunar Surface perfectly matches the Solar System Mood Lamp and the solar system planet set. Each item has been carefully crafted to the correct proportions to sit perfectly alongside each other and even comes with matching gift boxes and accessories packs. Once you buy one item from DeskSpace, you will never turn back.

 

 

The Perks - Indiegogo Special Save up to 15%

​All prices shown in USD

 

The Perks  - Bulk Buy Savings

All prices shown in USD

 

Indiegogo Exclusive Add-on Item

​All prices shown in USD

 

School For the Blind Donations

 

We are excited to announce that we will be donating a Lunar Surface Large concrete panel to a number of schools for the blind across the US and Hong Kong. We think STEM education is crucially important and feel this project would give a unique experience for blind students to get a tactile representation of the lunar surface that they might not have had access to before. For every US$2500 (HKD20K) we raise on this campaign we donate one set of the large lunar surface concrete panels to a school for the blind.

 

 

How we made the DeskSpace Lunar Surface

 

The process of creating the DeskSpace Lunar Surface involves a lengthy process of casting, curing, finishing and CNC machining. Our craftsmen then carefully clean up the intricate lunar surface and then assemble each piece. The process may be lengthy, but we know that perfection only comes with time.

 

 

 

The process is as follows:

 

  • We create a detailed 3D CAD model using NASA data from the Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter
  • We make 1:1 masters in tool grade steel for both the 100mm desktop and 180mm wall versions.
  • After the master has been precision machined, the top surface is then sandblasted to create the perfect texture for the concrete to capture in each impression.
  • Moulds are then made from the master which will be used to cast each piece.
  • The concrete is mixed in small batches from a combination of Portland cement and aggregates to carefully control the amount of bubbles produced during the curing process.
  • Each piece is then cast using the freshly mixed jewellery grade concrete and allowed to set.
  • Once fully hardened each piece is carefully removed from the mould and sent for further processing to ensure all the edges are smoothed and details come out perfectly.
  • Every cement piece is then inspected and carefully packaged as it awaits final assembly.
  • Each metal base is machined using hardened Tungsten tipped cutting tools, then sent for anodizing to give it a deep Space Grey finish.
  • The DeskSpace mirror finish logo is added using a special process where the whole face is polished, the logo then masked before the rest of the surfaces are sandblasted to a smooth matte finish.
  • The final step comes by assembling the concrete impression of the lunar surface with the anodized metal base, held securely with an epoxy-based adhesive.
  • The final parts are then handed over to be precisely packaged in the gift box with the other accessories.

 

Who's Talking About DeskSpace
story_txt:
DeskSpace – Capture Humanities Greatest Step On 20th July 1969 the first human took the first steps on the surface of the moon. This event captured the imagination of the entire world and catapulted us into the space-age. Now each of us can experience a small slice of this event through DeskSpace – the most detailed model of the lunar surface currently available at this scale.    Created using data from NASA’s Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter, the beautiful topography of the far side of the moon has been recreated using jewellery-grade concrete. Hand-finished and presented on a precision machine space-grade aluminium base, this is a truly unique and fascinating item that will be a talking point in any home or office.    NASA DataFrom the dawn of time, the moon has captured our hearts and our imaginations. Now, you can bring the moon’s lunar surface into your home. Using NASA landscape data, we have faithfully recreated the moon’s stunningly cratered topography from beautiful jewellery grade concrete. When highlighted under a direct light source, it is striking and intricately detailed – almost as beautiful as the real thing. Apollo 11 50th Anniversary It was 50 years ago that the first Apollo landing took place. With such an important anniversary, we understand that space enthusiasts need special items for their collections.  We have produced the most iconic part of the lunar landscape and as a special gift for our crowdfunding supporters, we are including special additional items that pay homage to the lunar landing, just for our supporters to show our appreciation.  Lunar Surface Size ComparisonAvailable in two sizes, your lunar surface display item is beautifully presented in its own gift box. The larger version can be wall hung or displayed on a shelf, while the small version is ideal as part of a coffee table display or as a desk top item.    Lunar Surface - LargeMeasuring 180mm x 180mm, this display piece is perfect for a wall or shelf. Detailing the most stunning areas of the moon surface that is littered with craters due to the constant bombardment of meteorites across many millions of years. This gradual disintegration of the lunar surface gives it its distinctive look that we are all so familiar with.  Lunar Surface - RegularAs a 100mm x 100mm concrete piece, this intricate lunar surface model rests on its precision machined and anodized base with a perfectly polished mirror logo. This item matches all our other DeskSpace pieces and can form a part of a beautiful space-themed collection. You can be sure that there will be the same attention to detail and consistent beauty across the entire range.      Apollo Pen and Rocket Stand + NotepadPaying homage to the perilous Apollo 11 mission we've created a fully bespoke ballpoint pen and rocket stand. The Apollo Pen stands tall looking ready to take off next to the Lunar Surface. A striking reminder of the great strides humanity has taken to reach the stars every time you use it. We also include a custom made hardback notebook, with the DeskSpace logo debossed on the bottom left corner.  Lunar Surface - Large + Pen/Stand + Hardback Notepad Lunar Surface - Regular + Pen/Stand + Hardback Notepad​ Both the pen and base are precision CNC machined out of aerospace-grade aluminium using custom made cutting tools. The parts are then anodized in deep black and assembled with a near-perfect fit. Apollo 11 50th Anniversary Commemorative CoinCapture this historic moment with a limited edition Apollo 11 50th Anniversary Commemorative Coin coated in 99% silver. A perfect gift for a friend or loved oneEvery one of us has looked to the stars and wondered about other worlds and the expanse of time and space. Our moon is but a tiny part of the night sky and yet it holds such wonder as it is so easily seen with the naked eye. Having a tiny piece of the moon as a stylish display item makes a wonderful gift for anyone who holds a fascination with space.   A stylish and sophisticated accessory for the home and office Any home that is full of curious minds and a fascination of space deserves to have beautiful items that nurture that curiosity and provoke conversation – the DeskSpace lunar surface model does exactly that. Ideal for a family home as a coffee table centrepiece, this model will bring the family together and provides a piece of beauty for any environment. Perfect for a Home Office  Proudly Display on a Shelf or Mantlepiece  Beautiful Hanging Display   Inspire Young and Old Alike  Premium Materials Created With Precision We worked tirelessly to source the exact mineral most suited to represent the complexities and character of the lunar surface. We carefully selected only craftsmen who create jewellery from concrete. Portland cement is used as the foundation for each moulded concrete part, with the level of bubbles carefully controlled with each piece coming out truly unique. This timeless process produces only the most beautiful results and creates a piece that is unique and robust.  Lighting Up The Surface We wanted to stay true to the unique beauty of the portland cement material. story:
Are you having a cold and chilly night? Winter is upon us, and the cold is creeping into households already. Sometimes blankets are not enough to provide warmth. You need a heater. This Space Heater is ideal for any room in the home, including drafty basements，office，or chilly powder rooms.

 

If you don't feel like covering a triple utility bill just to heat the room you're in, a personal heater is a great alternative. Unlike the large and bulky heaters that can require several people to move around, this mini heater is the perfect size for heating an average living or working area. It's lightweight and portable.

Warm up in 1 seconds

Electric heater equipped with PTC ceramics with a long service life，efficient heating and safe to use .PTC ceramics produce a large amount of heat quickly within 1s at a power of 1500 watt.

High Energy Efficiency

Use little power to maintain the warmth after the heat-up and help you save much more on your bills.
No oxygen consumption and no open flames.Reduce your seasonal energy bills. Stay warm and save money together.



The heater which will warm up a vast area evenly. Place the space heater under your desk to help keep your hand warm at work, especially ideal for office.


Built with flame-retardant case and premium circuitry, this space heater meets the rigorous safety standards of ETL.

enjoy your time with Space Heater everywhere
                 

Always keep your room temperature at the most optimal level.
The Space Heater designed with safe ceramic element interior and cool-touch exterior, overheating  protection, you can use it whole night without worrying.


 



Two Heating Modes

Choose the model to your desired temperature-high heat, low heat.

 

Two Wind Speed Indicator

Power light always indicate the working status of the heater.
Touch the function key, in order of low wind speed - high wind speed - shutdown.

After use, the Space Heater will continue to work for a minute for blowing out the residual heat; if you want the heater to stop working quickly, please press the power switch to "o", and then turn off the host.
 

Take up little space 

To start using Space Heater, just plug it into the nearest power outlet. It only needs a socket to pump out serious heat to the surrounding area.

Plus it won't take up a whole bunch of space like other models of heaters might do because of its compact size.

 

360 DEGREE PLACEABLE 

 

Most popular and awesome design,any side of the heater housing can be placed.




 

We Are Ready For Shipment
 

The shipment will start from October. 
All the packages will be sent out from the factory directly and individually to your address. And you will get the tracking number as soon as we send it.

story:
In most cases, you have to use both hands to change a bulb: one hand to  unscrew, and the other to steady the base of the holder. Pair that with  balancing on top of a three-meter high ladder, and safety levels drop  significantly.

According to the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, in  2016, more than 200,000 cases were reported citing incidents with people  on ladders (5% death, 30% serious injuries, 65% medical care).

Magbulb requires only one hand to change a bulb, making it safer, quicker and easier to complete a once daunting task.

 

Changing a bulb can be a tedious process. According to statistics, many  people postpone changing lightbulbs in their chandeliers until the last  one burns out. Our aim is to make sure you always have maximum light  with ease, convenience and a dash of fun.

Magbulbs minimize inconvenience and diminish the potential for injuries when it comes to replacing broken lamps.

No twist, just unplug. With Magbulb you don't need pliers or any other tools to remove your lightbulbs.

 

Incandescent bulbs are a very popular trend in interior design. They  are a unique light source with a warmer and more natural spectrum than  any other electric light. The light of an incandescent bulb creates a  full-color spectrum and those colors achieve high reproduction– much  like natural daylight. The disadvantage is that incandescent bulbs last,  on average, up to 1000 hours. This means they'll need to be changed  about three times per year according to average working time. Using  Magbulb will de-complicate the frequent changes these trendy lights  require.

Combination of the old and new technologies, as Incandescent bulbs  and magnetic socket "Magbulb" made your interior much more comfortable  and convenient.

Thanks to its quick installation, Magbulb is an excellent aide for  installing light garlands and lighting equipment. Changing bulbs in a  light garland containing 80 bulbs would require an hour on average. With  Magbulb, you can complete the same task in only 7 minutes (8.5 times  faster). This lends Magbulb to commercial use as well—perfect for  parties, weddings and festivals.

Creating the perfect ambience in a bar or restaurant is impossible  without lighting. Together, with Magbulb, maintaining a cozy vibe will  become simple and convenient.

 

Risks & Challenges

Our team believes that Magbulb is a real game changer for an old, monotonous, tedious task. We work on this idea for a 3 years and finally find an angel investor that helped with first step in production and now we have much more chances to win. Hope, you will support us and we'll do it together. The future of this product is in your hands. We are a highly experienced team in product launching and marketing, so we hope to make this campaign the next successful one in our portfolio. From our previous Kickstarter campaigns, we've learned to be ready for any kind of situation. We understand that timing is important, and we believe that our experience with previous campaigns will help us get your product shipped to you on time.

story:
About this project

Thank You for viewing our site. We appreciate your interest. We are asking for your help to make our new system one step closer to reality to help bring water conservation to the forefront of everyone's minds and get our new Water Watch System into every home and building in and outside of the USA. With your help we can start to save the USEPA's estimated "1 Trillion" gallons of water (yes,  with a "T") lost to "Water Leaks" inside US homes annually.  We hope you will help us reach our goal for this stage of our project of $100,000, so we will be one step closer to bringing our new system to the market, and if we surpass our goal, that would get us to the market that much quicker.  Our team is in place, and they are excited to get work !  

The Water Watch team thanks you in advance !!

** To see details about how we will use your generous pledges, see "Where we are going" below...

story:
Présentation du projet

Coucou les potes !

Comme vous pouvez le voir, j'ai décidé de m'acheter un chien. Plus précisément, un caniche miniature que je nommerai Poule. L'année 2020 a été éprouvante pour tous et je ne fais pas exception. J'ai perdu mon emploi pendant la pandémie, j'ai perdu le procès contre mon agresseur, j'ai commencé un nouveau travail en plein COVID, j'ai fini ma première année universitaire en ligne, j'ai changé de majeure, etc. Bref, ce n'était pas mon année. J'ai senti le besoin de commencer une nouvelle étape dans ma vie. Cela faisait déjà plusieurs années que je parlais d'avoir un chien. J'ai d'ailleurs rempli les formulaires de Mira pour élever un chien, mais j'ai finalement décidé que ce serait trop déchirant de m'en séparer après un an. Après avoir perdu le procès cet été, j'ai reparlé de mon idée d'avoir un chien à mes parents. J'ai toujours aimé l'approche de la zoothérapie, mais c'est assez compliqué d'y avoir accès. J'ai fait beaucoup de recherches sur les races de chien et les bons éleveurs éthiques au Québec. Le caniche est parfait pour une vie en famille avec d'autres animaux et est un excellent compagnon. J'ai trouvé une éleveuse formidable qui semble assurément adorer ses petites bêtes. Poule est le nom que je voulais absolument pour mon chien, mais je ne sais pas pourquoi. En bref, Poule est né le 5 septembre et je vais l'avoir début novembre.

Mon objectif avec cette campagne

Bien sûr, je connais les dépenses qui viennent avec l'achat d'un chien. Je ne me serais pas embarquée dans ce projet en n'ayant pas les fonds nécessaires de base. Le 2/3 des virements sont déjà payés et j'ai déjà acheté tout le nécessaire. Par contre, je demeure une étudiante à temps plein qui travaille à temps partiel.

En changeant de travail, j'ai suivi des formations sur la fabrication de produits comme des savons, des chandelles, des bombes de bain, etc. Je travaille chez Coop Coco depuis plusieurs mois déjà et je côtoie des professeurs, des chimistes et des experts en la matière. J'ai donc décidé de mettre mon savoir à l'ouvrage cet été et j'ai commencé à fabriquer de nombreux produits. Je suis rendue assez aisée dans la fabrication et je veux donc profiter de mes apprentissages pour vendre ces produits pour dorloter Poule plus aisément. J'en ai offert plusieurs à mes amis proches et à ma famille et plusieurs ont tellement aimé qu'ils m'ont donné l'idée de les vendre. Mon objectif est d'amasser au moins 900$ en 35 jours et de vous faire profiter de ces petits trésors faits main, d'ingrédients naturels (vous trouverez la liste ci-dessous) et de recettes longuement recherchées et améliorées. 

Impact de votre contribution et infos supplémentaires

Cette nouvelle étape de ma vie me rend déjà immensément heureuse et comblée, et mon toutou n'est même pas encore arrivé ! 

Votre contribution, peu importe le montant, vous gratifiera de ma gratitude éternelle. Aussi, c'est bientôt Noël ! Et puisqu’avec la COVID, il ne sera pas bien bien facile de magasiner, pourquoi ne pas gâter vos proches avec des produits faits maison par votre chère Zoé ??

Si vous ne pouvez pas contribuer, ce n'est vraiment pas grave. Je vous aime tous et toutes quand même !!!

P.S. Lorsque vous achetez plusieurs produits et que vous voulez des senteurs / couleurs / saveurs différentes pour chaque produit et que vous n'en avez pas l'option, veuillez m'écrire (ou à ma mère).  

P.P.S. Si vous voulez un paquet "personnalisé" veuillez communiquer avec moi, ça me fera plaisiiiiiiir de créer des "Perks" à votre nom. 

P.P.P.S. Tous les produits sont garantis "Satisfaction Zoé", je vais donc remplacer n'importe quel produit qui ne "fonctionne" pas. Les petits défauts sont normaux, mais s'ils empêchent la bonne utilisation du produit, écrivez-moi, je vous en prie. 

P.P.P.P.S. Rendez-vous à la section FAQ pour ce qui est de la livraison et de mes méthodes de confection...

Liste des produits et Ingrédients 

Sels de Bain luxueux (Sel d'Himalaya, Sel de la Mer Morte, Sel d'Epsom, Argile blanche / bentonite / rose, Pétales de Roses de Damas BIO, Vitamine E, Huile(s) essentielle(s) et Essence(s) aromatique(s))

Shampooing solide (Sodium cocote isethionate (SCI), Huile de Noix de Coco BIO, Acide Stéarique, Poudre de racine de Guimauve, Aqua, Vitamine E, Huile(s) essentielle(s) et Essence(s) aromatique(s))

P.S. Pour le shampooing solide, cela prend environ 3 semaines au cuir chevelu pour s'habituer !!

Baume à lèvres (Cire de candelilla / d'abeille / de carnauba, Beurre de Karité BIO, Macérât Huileux de Calendula BIO, Huile d'Amande douce, Vitamine E, Saveur(s), Colorant(s) végétaux (0xyde de Fer, Micas))

Parfum solide (Promenade printanière) (Violette, Pamplemousse Rose, Ylang-Ylang, Muguet, Lavande, Huile de coco fractionné / Caprylis, Cire d'abeille)

Parfum solide (Zeste de forêt) (Bois de Santal, Tangerine, Lavande, Bois de Hô, Huile de coco fractionné (Caprylis), Cire d'abeille)

Parfum liquide (Antidote à l'Hiver) (Lilas, Pamplemousse rose, Lavande, Ylang-Ylang, Bois de Hô, Bois de Santal, Huile de coco fractionné (Caprylis)) La note de tête est faite d'agrumes et d'aromatiques, la note de coeur est florale  et la note de fond est boisée.

Mélange d'Huiles Essentielles Deuil et Dépression (Bois de Hô, Ylang-Ylang, Lavande, Épinette Noire, Bois de Santal, Clou de Girofle, Huile de Noisette)

Exfoliant fondant pour le corps (Sel de la Mer Morte, Huile de Noix de Coco BIO, Glycérine végétale, Argile blanche, Huile(s) essentielle(s) et Essence(s) aromatique(s))

Bombes de Bain (Acide Citrique, Bicarbonate de soude, Argile blanche, Fécule de Marante et de Maïs, Huile de coco fractionné (Caprylis), Hydrolat de Lavande BIO, Colorant(s) Liquide(s), Paillettes BIO, Fleurs de Rose de Damas séchées, Huile(s) essentielles et Essence(s) aromatique(s))

Chandelle (Cire de Soya 464, Acide Stéarique, Colorant(s) pour chandelles)

P.S. L'acide stéarique sert pour que les chandelles brûlent plus longtemps.
story_txt:
Présentation du projet
Coucou les potes !
Comme vous pouvez le voir, j'ai décidé de m'acheter un chien. Plus précisément, un caniche miniature que je nommerai Poule. L'année 2020 a été éprouvante pour tous et je ne fais pas exception. J'ai perdu mon emploi pendant la pandémie, j'ai perdu le procès contre mon agresseur, j'ai commencé un nouveau travail en plein COVID, j'ai fini ma première année universitaire en ligne, j'ai changé de majeure, etc. Bref, ce n'était pas mon année. J'ai senti le besoin de commencer une nouvelle étape dans ma vie. Cela faisait déjà plusieurs années que je parlais d'avoir un chien. J'ai d'ailleurs rempli les formulaires de Mira pour élever un chien, mais j'ai finalement décidé que ce serait trop déchirant de m'en séparer après un an. Après avoir perdu le procès cet été, j'ai reparlé de mon idée d'avoir un chien à mes parents. J'ai toujours aimé l'approche de la zoothérapie, mais c'est assez compliqué d'y avoir accès. J'ai fait beaucoup de recherches sur les races de chien et les bons éleveurs éthiques au Québec. Le caniche est parfait pour une vie en famille avec d'autres animaux et est un excellent compagnon. J'ai trouvé une éleveuse formidable qui semble assurément adorer ses petites bêtes. Poule est le nom que je voulais absolument pour mon chien, mais je ne sais pas pourquoi. En bref, Poule est né le 5 septembre et je vais l'avoir début novembre.
Mon objectif avec cette campagne
Bien sûr, je connais les dépenses qui viennent avec l'achat d'un chien. Je ne me serais pas embarquée dans ce projet en n'ayant pas les fonds nécessaires de base. Le 2/3 des virements sont déjà payés et j'ai déjà acheté tout le nécessaire. Par contre, je demeure une étudiante à temps plein qui travaille à temps partiel.
En changeant de travail, j'ai suivi des formations sur la fabrication de produits comme des savons, des chandelles, des bombes de bain, etc. Je travaille chez Coop Coco depuis plusieurs mois déjà et je côtoie des professeurs, des chimistes et des experts en la matière. J'ai donc décidé de mettre mon savoir à l'ouvrage cet été et j'ai commencé à fabriquer de nombreux produits. Je suis rendue assez aisée dans la fabrication et je veux donc profiter de mes apprentissages pour vendre ces produits pour dorloter Poule plus aisément. J'en ai offert plusieurs à mes amis proches et à ma famille et plusieurs ont tellement aimé qu'ils m'ont donné l'idée de les vendre. Mon objectif est d'amasser au moins 900$ en 35 jours et de vous faire profiter de ces petits trésors faits main, d'ingrédients naturels (vous trouverez la liste ci-dessous) et de recettes longuement recherchées et améliorées. 
Impact de votre contribution et infos supplémentaires
Cette nouvelle étape de ma vie me rend déjà immensément heureuse et comblée, et mon toutou n'est même pas encore arrivé ! 
Votre contribution, peu importe le montant, vous gratifiera de ma gratitude éternelle. Aussi, c'est bientôt Noël ! Et puisqu’avec la COVID, il ne sera pas bien bien facile de magasiner, pourquoi ne pas gâter vos proches avec des produits faits maison par votre chère Zoé ??
Si vous ne pouvez pas contribuer, ce n'est vraiment pas grave. Je vous aime tous et toutes quand même !!!
P.S. Lorsque vous achetez plusieurs produits et que vous voulez des senteurs / couleurs / saveurs différentes pour chaque produit et que vous n'en avez pas l'option, veuillez m'écrire (ou à ma mère).  
P.P.S. Si vous voulez un paquet "personnalisé" veuillez communiquer avec moi, ça me fera plaisiiiiiiir de créer des "Perks" à votre nom. 
P.P.P.S. Tous les produits sont garantis "Satisfaction Zoé", je vais donc remplacer n'importe quel produit qui ne "fonctionne" pas. Les petits défauts sont normaux, mais s'ils empêchent la bonne utilisation du produit, écrivez-moi, je vous en prie. 
P.P.P.P.S. Rendez-vous à la section FAQ pour ce qui est de la livraison et de mes méthodes de confection...
Liste des produits et Ingrédients 
Sels de Bain luxueux (Sel d'Himalaya, Sel de la Mer Morte, Sel d'Epsom, Argile blanche / bentonite / rose, Pétales de Roses de Damas BIO, Vitamine E, Huile(s) essentielle(s) et Essence(s) aromatique(s))
Shampooing solide (Sodium cocote isethionate (SCI), Huile de Noix de Coco BIO, Acide Stéarique, Poudre de racine de Guimauve, Aqua, Vitamine E, Huile(s) essentielle(s) et Essence(s) aromatique(s))
P.S. Pour le shampooing solide, cela prend environ 3 semaines au cuir chevelu pour s'habituer !!
Baume à lèvres (Cire de candelilla / d'abeille / de carnauba, Beurre de Karité BIO, Macérât Huileux de Calendula BIO, Huile d'Amande douce, Vitamine E, Saveur(s), Colorant(s) végétaux (0xyde de Fer, Micas))
Parfum solide (Promenade printanière) (Violette, Pamplemousse Rose, Ylang-Ylang, Muguet, Lavande, Huile de coco fractionné / Caprylis, Cire d'abeille)
Parfum solide (Zeste de forêt) (Bois de Santal, Tangerine, Lavande, Bois de Hô, Huile de coco fractionné (Caprylis), Cire d'abeille)
Parfum liquide (Antidote à l'Hiver) (Lilas, Pamplemousse rose, Lavande, Ylang-Ylang, Bois de Hô, Bois de Santal, Huile de coco fractionné (Caprylis)) La note de tête est faite d'agrumes et d'aromatiques, la note de coeur est florale  et la note de fond est boisée.
Mélange d'Huiles Essentielles Deuil et Dépression (Bois de Hô, Ylang-Ylang, Lavande, Épinette Noire, Bois de Santal, Clou de Girofle, Huile de Noisette)
Exfoliant fondant pour le corps (Sel de la Mer Morte, Huile de Noix de Coco BIO, Glycérine végétale, Argile blanche, Huile(s) essentielle(s) et Essence(s) aromatique(s))
Bombes de Bain (Acide Citrique, Bicarbonate de soude, Argile blanche, Fécule de Marante et de Maïs, Huile de coco fractionné (Caprylis), Hydrolat de Lavande BIO, Colorant(s) Liquide(s), Paillettes BIO, Fleurs de Rose de Damas séchées, Huile(s) essentielles et Essence(s) aromatique(s))
Chandelle (Cire de Soya 464, Acide Stéarique, Colorant(s) pour chandelles)
P.S. L'acide stéarique sert pour que les chandelles brûlent plus longtemps.

story:
Japanese Artisan Tableware at a Reasonable Price

There has always been a strong demand for Japanese artisan pottery overseas. But, exporting large variety yet small quantity of products is difficult and the prices tend to shoot up. We have been looking into this issue, and have come up with the idea of using crowdfunding. 

​We guarantee that all the prices are exactly the same as in Japan, just with an international shipping fee. This is our first challenge, and we would like to continue to introduce more artisans if we could make this happen.

About Us

We are a Tokyo based tableware store, named “Hanada”. Since 1976, we have been working with 300 artisans from all over Japan. We are dedicated to producing all hand-crafted and unique products in which you can sense the artisans’ intention and expertise.

Perfect for Your Sake or Tea Party

In Japan, people gather under the cherry blossom to celebrate the spring with delicious drinks and food. Inspired by the culture, our sets will also make your party enjoyable and memorable.

We are collaborating with five contemporary potters, all of whom are highly skilled, and their professional careers span 15 to 40 years.

Cups and Decanters

Our cups and decanters are made by Kazuhiko Kudo. His work actually starts with digging clay by himself. The clay was originally yellow sand flown from Siberia 45 thousand years ago, and was a soil of 200 million years old.  

A katakuchi decanter is a bowl with a spout on one side. It works perfectly when serving sake or matcha tea with several people. It can be used to serve both food and drink.

There are not many drinks in the world that can be enjoyed in such a diverse range of cups as Japanese sake or matcha green tea. These tableware are the fruits of our ancestors’ wisdom of enjoying the taste as deliciously as possible.

  • The dimensions of the cup:  2.3" L x 2.3" W x 3.2" H  (5.7cm L x 5.7cm W x 8cm H)
  • The dimensions of the decanter:   7.2" L x 5.3" W x 3.5" H (18.5cm L × 13.5cm W × 9cm H)  

Here is a film we have made in order to demonstrate the care in which each piece is created.

Platters

Platters are made by Yuichi Yukinoura. He uses local apple trees for his original ash glaze. He applies four layers of glaze, and they turn into the beautiful glassy colors during the firing process.

He intentionally fires to make small cracks in the glaze, which is a technique called “Kannyu”, and it enhances and deepens the color.

  • The dimensions of the platter:   11" L x 7.5" W x 0.6" H (28cm L × 19cm W × 1.5cm H)  

Shallow Bowls

Shallow petal bowls are made by Haruya Abe, and come in three colors as a set. Abe’s works are known for being particularly detailed and intricate.

  • The dimensions of the plate:   6" L x 6" W x 1.6" H (15cm L × 15cm W × 4cm H)  

Abe has come to be somewhat of an Instagram celebrity, after releasing the footage of himself making his pottery. Here is a film we have made about him. Please note that we have changed the style of the bowls since this video was recorded. But the final products are made by the same artisan with the same care.

 

Hand-Painted Plate

Hand-painted plate is made by Mansaku Nakao. He started his career as a Japanese traditional kimono designer, but turned into a potter. His painting has been characterised by its sophisticated style over his 40 years of career, and this “spreading flower” motif is one of his trademark.  

  • The dimensions of the plate:   6.3" L x 6.3" W x 1.6" H (16cm L × 16cm W × 4cm H)  

Chopstick Rests

Chopstick rests are made by Hirohisa Ogawa. He has reproduced the shape and color of cherry blossom petals after numerous experiments. The set of five petals is a perfect gift to deliver spring blossoms to a friend or your loved-one.

  • The dimensions of each :   2" L x 1.4" W x 0.22" H (5cm L × 3.5cm W × 0.6cm H)  
Well made pottery will last you a lifetime (and longer), and with continued use, they will develop a unique texture and make people feel attached to them.
 

REWARDS

 

DONATE TO PROTECT CHERRY BLOSSOM TREES

We are located next to the Imperial Palace which it is renowned for one of the most famous cherry blossom viewing spots in Tokyo. We will donate 5% of the total funding to the cherry blossom tree conservation charity managed by the local government.

Your contribution to this project will also help everyone, including foreign visitors, to further enjoy the beautiful Spring scenery.

SHIPPING

We are capable of suitably packing for international shipping. Shipping fees depend on the size of products and the destination. Please note that you will be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region, which in the past have ranged from 0% to 20% in the US and EU countries.

TIMELINE

  • June 2016 : Project launch
  • July and August 2016 : Product design with artisans
  • September and November 2016 : Tested in New York and in London
  • March 2017 : Indiegogo launch
  • March 2017 : Production
  • April 2017 : Shipment

RISK AND CHALLENGES

We have a close relationship with artisans and have a long experience of making products with them. Thus we are confident to produce and deliver as we planned.

On the other hand, all of our products are hand-crafted. Because of this nature, they have different characteristics compared to tableware that is mass-produced.

Each piece is different

Even if the original designs are same, the hand drawing will be different in each piece, with their own individual characteristic and originality. The size of each piece may slightly vary.

THE TEAM

  • Eisuke Matsui : The owner of Hanada, Japanese tableware store in Tokyo
  • Misa Watanabe : Art direction
  • Lee Pyefinch : Photography
  • Jun Kaneko : Direction, crowdfunding support

Thank you for your support!

story:
As we focus on fulfillment and manufacturing, we decided to pause our crowdfunding campaign! If you're interested in purchasing the HD Mask Noir, you can order through our CrowdOx page!

 

Go HERE to order your HD Mask:

https://app.crowdox.com/projects/102344/noir-discreet-security-camera-and-usb-charger

 

 

 

Say goodbye to expensive, bulky, and painfully obvious security cameras. HD Mask Noir is a military-grade security camera that records 1080p HD video & crystal clear audio 24/7 with no battery necessary. All you have to do is plug it in and connect to WiFi and you’ll have peace of mind knowing you can:

With no batteries, no fees, and no wires, the HD Mask Noir is both the most advanced security camera on the market and the simplest to use.  

Ultra-compact and super discreet, no one will know the HD Mask Noir is a camera unless you want them to. Plug it in anywhere — as if you simply needed to charge your phone — and start recording HD video instantly.

The USB Charger Security Camera that goes unnoticed.

Treat it like your charger and no one will know the difference. Keep it in your pocket, bag, or briefcase to bring the power of military-grade security wherever you go.

Perfect to keep an eye on any room in the home or office.

HD Mask Noir doesn’t just look like a charger — it is a charger.

A USB port ensures no one will remove the camera from the wall because they need to charge their phone or tablet. It also provides a convenient excuse to keep one in every room.

Works perfectly as a charger and as a security camera.

Discreet and Functional.

HD Mask Noir plugs directly into the wall and therefore needs no wires and no battery. Once plugged in, it goes to work instantly and will not turn off or die due to lack of power.

Easy to Install and Setup

A 75˚ wide-angle lens ensures that you’ll only need one HD Mask camera to capture all the action in nearly any room or office. With a near-panoramic view, you’ll be able to track the movement of anyone from the time they enter the space to when they leave — as well as everything that happens in between.

For large dining rooms, conference rooms, or waiting rooms, place a camera on each side of the space for complete coverage from every angle.

Panoramic viewing angle means you cover an entire room

with just one camera.

 

Actual Camera Footage

Local Storage

The HD Mask Noir can store up to 128 GB of video on a removable SD card inserted just above the plug (invisible when the camera is rolling). This important failsafe protects your footage and ensures that your camera keeps recording even if the WiFi or phone connection fails.

 

Your security camera won’t do much good if it can only detect activity for half the day. HD Mask Noir’s camera is military-grade equipment designed to see clearly in a wide range of bright and dim light conditions. Protect yourself against break-ins at night and safeguard your workplace after the staff have gone home.

According to the Department of Justice, most violent crimes happen at night. Whether you’re in the same location as your HD Mask Noir or not, video footage will keep you and what you hold dear safer when the sun goes down.

Actual Camera Footage

Buying from manufacturers like us directly on Indiegogo makes things much cheaper than buying through traditional retailers. Even better — as a sign of gratitude to our early backers, we guarantee the lowest prices ever (even cheaper than our older model!).

Make sure you order now — prices are guaranteed to go up once crowdfunding is over!

Our team has been in the security technology industry for decades, with manufacturing experience from the oldest CCTV cameras to modern smart office solutions. In the past 2 years, we've been hard at work to bring our products to the consumer market with the HD Mask Security Camera brand. We've been featured as a Top Tech 2018 by Touch of Modern and won many other accolades around the world. We're excited to showcase the next generation of security cameras that combine utility and technology with your support!

 

What we’re made of

We are a team of engineers and designers motivated by making life more convenient. We believe that hassle-free, effective monitoring of your home shouldn’t be a luxury. We believe that everyone has the right to protect their homes and families. That’s why NOIR is bringing key features from military-grade security cameras and new, cutting-edge functions directly to the consumer. We’ve lined up the best suppliers and manufacturers in the industry, and we are ready to introduce NOIR!

story:
You can find the full description in the gallery
Ви можете знайти повний опис проекту в галереї
Вы можете найти полное описание проекта в галерее

Support Project Geosocial network for Citizens!

What is proposed?
Implement a national network to the next generation with geolocations coordinates, combined with existing social networks.
How it works?
On the smartphone or computer installed application which allows every citizen to work in real time with Global map of interaction. The card has many layers: the social, political, economic, entertainment, medicine, education, etc., which in turn have their own sublayers.
A citizen has the opportunity to inform the community about their attitude to the object or situation, intentions or plans for future actions by placing on the map with the beacon message. Beacons are displayed on the map interaction and may be supplemented by comments from citizens and other options for resolving the problem.
Using beacons will enable real-time to see a picture of the processes that take place in the country at all levels and directly affect them citizens.
What system can give you personally?
- Quality access to ideas and experiences of others in a particular situation in reality
- To jointly solve problem situations directly to their location, along with people who care about the same issues as you
- Vote and get information on services that you need to perform in a particular area and get a reward, and if necessary help - do volunteer work.
- Get service (chargeable or free of charge) from Citizen where you need them, through community posts in the most efficient way - setting lighthouse on the map with the message
- To jointly solve problems that are in a particular area
- The possibility of a joint defense against unjust acts against citizens
- And many, many exciting opportunities for communication, which you do not currently have

How to support?
Familiar:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/16gTJ20PrnXa...
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1rS_x5iVGVIo...
Video description of the system and an example of:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gW3fGhUtrpY&...
Example of implementation:
https://sturm.crowdmap.com

Support:

IDEA-X:
http://www.ideax-nescafe.com.ua/ideas/yellow/ge...
http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/geosocial-net...
http://biggggidea.com/project/178/
http://smipon.ru/projects/449
http://boomstarter.ru/projects/19399/4665

Report a problem to every citizen in the World!

Підтримайте Проект геопозиційної соціальної мережі для Громадян!

Що пропонується?
Реалізувати Національну мережу наступного покоління з використанням геопозиційних координат, поєднану з існуючими соціальними мережами.
Як це працює?
На смартфон чи комп’ютер встановлений додаток, котрий дозволяє кожному Громадянину в реальному часі працювати з Глобальною мапою взаємодії. Карта має багато шарів: соціальний, політичний, економічний, розважальний, медицина, освіта і т.д., котрі в свою чергу мають власні підшари.
Громадянин має можливість повідомити спільноту про своє ставлення до об’єкту чи ситуації, свої наміри чи плани на майбутні дії, шляхом встановлення на мапі маяку з повідомленням. Маяк відображається на карті взаємодії і може бути доповнений коментарями від інших Громадян та варіантами по вирішенню проблеми.
Використання маяків надасть можливість в реальному часі бачити картину процесів, котрі проходять в країні на усіх рівнях та безпосередньо на них впливати Громадянам.
Що система дасть особисто Вам?
- якісний доступ до думки та досвіду інших Громадян по конкретній ситуації в реальності
- можливість спільно вирішувати проблемні ситуації безпосередньо на місці їх знаходження, разом з людьми, котрих хвилюють ті ж питання, що і Вас
- обирати та отримувати інформацію по послугам, котрі необхідно виконати на певній території та отримати за це винагороду, а в разі потреби допомоги – зробити волонтерський вчинок.
- отримати послуги (оплатні чи безоплатні) від Громадян там, де Ви їх потребуєте, через повідомлення спільноти в найбільш ефективний спосіб - встановлення на мапі маяку з повідомленням
- можливість спільного вирішення проблем, котрі знаходяться на певній території
- можливість спільного захисту від несправедливих дій по відношенню до Громадян
- і ще багато-багато цікавих можливостей для взаємодії, котрих у Вас наразі немає

Як підтримати?
Ознайомитись:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/16gTJ20PrnXa...
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1rS_x5iVGVIo...
Відео опис системи та приклад роботи:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gW3fGhUtrpY&...
Приклад реалізації:
https://sturm.crowdmap.com

Підтримати:

IDEA-X:
http://www.ideax-nescafe.com.ua/ideas/yellow/ge...
http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/geosocial-net...
http://biggggidea.com/project/178/
http://smipon.ru/projects/449
http://boomstarter.ru/projects/19399/4665

Повідомте про проблему та своє ставлення до неї кожного Громадянина в Україні!
З повагою.

story:
I first met 21 year old Vicky Kumar (far left in above photo), in Kathmandu, Nepal a month before the recent Earthquake and a week before I was to start my pilgrimage to the Himalayas. I was immediately impressed with his kind demeanor, great smile and excellent English.  After a good while of chatting, I accepted his offer to come back to his home and meet his family for a cup of tea. 

I didn't realize that Vicky lived in one of the slum villages next to the Boudhanath (a UNESCO World Heritage site in Kathmandu said to entomb the remains of Kassapa Buddha). This particular village was constructed of about 100 small one room bamboo and tarp shacks and had been around for about 20 years.  Vicky and his family had moved there from India about 12 years ago in search of gainful employment.  

Unfortunately, Vicky's dad died due to alcoholism when Vicky was 9, leaving him the oldest male and responsible for supporting the family.  He was able to pick up the trade of shoe shinning and repair and for the next 12 years, he did what he was able to bring home sustenance for his mother, two brothers and two sisters.  

Many of you know that I was trekking in the Himalayas when the Earthquake occurred.  My group and I were trapped, and after several isolated days we managed to call our families. Eventually we were rescued by helicopter.  Upon my return to Kathmandu, I immediately went to Vicky's village to see what I could do to help those in need.

On the day of the earthquake Vicky was at work shining shoes.  He witnessed several buildings collapse, crushing and burying many people, but all he could think about was his family. He ran through the streets back to his village in hopes of finding them, but two members of his family, his mom and older sister were missing.  

When I finally arrived at his village, Vicky had been waiting for his mother and sister for several days, eating just a few crackers to tide over his hunger, afraid to go out in the trembling city, unable to shine shoes for money anymore anyway.

His village was in turmoil, and need so I quickly began making plans to get some supplies to the village. With Vicky's help we were able to get food to people, and  I think that the service work helped Vicky deal with some of his anguish over his community and family.  Fortunately, Vicky's mom and sister returned and the family was reunited.  

The continuing tremors and degradation of conditions in Kathmandu have left many families with no choice -- they must head back to their birthplace in India -- a country they have already escaped as refugees.  Vicky's family decided that would be the best option for them also, and we started making plans for them to travel to Punjab where Vicky's grandmother was living.  

His plan was to potentially build another shack at his grandmother's, but due to severe overcrowding of family members, that is not a possibility.

I have been able to continue to offer them support, and we have the good fortune of staying with friends of the family here in Ludhiana. 

Despite the crowded conditions we are safe. However, this living situation is not sustainable.  The family is sleeping in a temple next door to family friends in the evening but this is also not sustainable. 

However, GOOD NEWS! Just two doors down from where we are staying, there is a good "second hand" home that would completely satisfy the needs of this family.  It is a relatively modern reinforced structure that would likely withstand a little earth shaking.  The house will need a little remodeling, but most of the work, we will be able to accomplish ourselves.  We can purchase the home for about $8000 and our intention is to use the remainder of the funds for remodeling.

I have been working on getting the basic needs of this family taken care of, spending my own resources and those of a few other generous friends.  So far, we have set them up with their own kitchen, including a gas burner, propane tank, pots & pans, dishes and silverware.  

This home will be owned by Vicky and his family for generations to come and this act of charity will surely be talked about for a very long time.  It is our hope that this home will become a place of healing for all who spend time here.  

Please consider what it would be like to be born into the poverty conditions of a ghetto.  Maybe we can't buy houses for everyone in the world, but here is a family that we CAN help. Please, let's give them a new foothold on life. 

Anyone making contributions will be considered part of this loving family, and you will be forever welcomed with open arms.

story:
See GALLERY (tab above video) to view product images.
 
Hi there, we are Trish & Elise: two mom’s who have teamed up to bring you a new and exclusively on-line Christian gift store.  We are aware of the many smaller towns and rural areas across Canada where people don’t have access to a Christian gift store without having to travel a distance to a city store. We are excited to offer you the convenience of on-line shopping with the ability to ship anywhere in Canada!  

We will be offering a full and unique selection of Christian gift items, books, music and more.  In a special section of our website, we will offer gift boxes: we will put together gift items for various gift-giving occasions, and they will be beautifully packaged to make gift selecting and gift giving easy! We will ship your gift with your personal message directly to your gift recipient!

WE NEED YOUR HELP PLEASE! 

The purpose of this campaign is to raise funds by means of a pre-sale so that we can start out our store with a great selection of products for you to choose from.  You can support us by checking out the items we have listed as “perks”.  Buy something for yourself, and/or send a gift to a friend (just let us know in the comment section who you want to send the item you’ve selected to with their address and a personal note we will attach). Please note that all perk prices include HST and shipping.

You can also help us by spreading the word, (so we can help you “spread the Word!” each time you send a gift). 

Please tell anyone and everyone you know about this campaign, our website www.underhisgrace.ca and our facebook page: Under His Grace On-line Christian Store.  Both of us have prior experience in retail, and know well that “word of mouth” is the best advertising, and with social media today, it’s like word of mouth with a megaphone!  Thank-you for sharing our info with anyone you think will ever have the occasion to buy a gift for a christening or baptism, wedding, anniversary, get well or encouragement or any other gift giving occasion. 

Our mission is to make available God’s Word in gift form.

Special occasions or thinking-of-you moments are gift-giving moments.  The most meaningful gifts we can give are gifts that help lead others into a relationship with Christ.  We have both been blessed and touched by gifts given to us which have spoken God’s truth into our hearts. It is our hope that through this store, many more hearts will be touched by the gift of God’s word. 

We have set our goal at $11,000 as a statement of faith.  Hebrews chapter 11 is known as the “faith” chapter as it lists many of the thing that the great patriarchs of the Old Testament accomplished “by faith”.  We are two busy moms with lots of support from our families and “by faith” we are taking the steps God is leading us to in opening this store. We are offering God our all and trusting Him with the rest.

"You must each decide in your heart how much to give.  And don’t give reluctantly or in response to pressure. ‘For God loves a person who gives cheerfully’” (2 Cor. 9:7).

Grace and blessings to you and THANK-YOU for your support!

Elise & Trish

Special thanks to Naomi Striemer, Joe Zambon, Jon Bauer, and Sheila Wray Gregoire for your support in helping us get started.  Please check out these wonderful people on their websites:

www.naomistriemermusic.com

www.joezambonmusic.com

www.jonbauermusic.com

www.sheilawraygregoire.com

. . . and thanks to our tech-guy, and talented film artist, (Elise's brother) . . . check out www.heroastudios.ca

* Just a few notes:

See GALLERY (tab above video) to view product images.

When claiming the "JOY" perk, please specify in STEP 4: in the comment box which one of the Christmas CD's you would like to receive.  Also, if you would like us to email you the digital downloads of the three songs available in all perks, please keep the box checked in Step 4 which stated that you would like to receive email updates from the campaign owner.  Thank-you!

story:
ZeroWatt lamps -  light up your home without paying an electricity bills.
The world's most effective  luxury lights, with no measurable energy consumption.  

ZeroWatt is the world's first, high-efficiency lamp which consumes no measurable energy. With the ZeroWatt lamp, you can illuminate the most important areas in your home without paying for electricity. The technology is based on maximum increase efficiency (250lm/W, 2-3 times more effective than LED bulbs), and on the fact that a conventional wattmeter cannot measure very low, idle power less than 1 -3W (depending on the version of wattmeter). The lamps theoretically consume about 0.2W. Therefore, you can use between 5 and 15 of these lamps at home without recording any energy consumption, and the lighting corresponds to 80-240 candles.

ADDED LUXURY
With this product, you can walk around the home when it's dark, and still see everything. You will not be blinded after switching on the main lights, and you are not in complete darkness when you switch them off. You don't need to mess around with turning switches on and off onw hundred times a day. Now, everyone can have the luxury of permanent lighting without any measurable energy consumption.

FOR USE ANYWHERE
With these small lights, you do not need to switch on the main lights every time you are walking around your home. Wall lights can be mounted on wall with 2 wood screw, everywhere you need, on the stairs, into the hallway, the bathroom, the toilet, under cabinet. They come with either US or Euro plugs (for other plug use converter), and work on 100-240 volts. We have many designs: downlights, mini-panels, micro-panels, under-cabinet lights, wall lights, work table lamps, and pendant chandeliers, all with Zero-Watt technology to completely illuminate your home.  All of these new products will be probably on IndieGOGO during the next campaign.

SUSTAINABLE WORLD
Our civilization is dependant on fossil fuels, but most of these resources will be gone in one to two decades, so this energy-efficient product will help prolong the time left for developing new sources of clean and cheap energy, such as our battery size Graviton Fusion Nuclear Reactor, based on new theoretical physics - Theory of Everything (we will need 10 years on research and developing, and possible generously funding).

Most people now know that excessive energy consumption is one of the causes of global warming and climate change, but real catastrophe will be end of fossil fuels. Scientists say that: "After the end of fossil fuels, there will only be enough food for 20% of the world’s population." We do not know how much time we have, but if we do not start to solve this problem today, it will be too late. As customers, we can vote every day. Our future depends on each one of us.

So, please help us build a sustainable world with energy efficient products, and help save our civilization.

After end of campaign, products will be on web http://www.1-energy.eu/zero-watt/

Zero Watt crystal mini wall light

Zero Watt crystal mini table lamp

Zero Watt crystal mini table lamp, and crystal mini wall light

 

You can be part of luxury and confortable and ecological world.

story:
"At a time when security is becoming a form of luxury, GATE developers offer an intuitively anticipated product and service to relieve anxieties of the increasingly mobile global public."
— Forbes

"GATE is an intuitive “invention” that seems like it should have been here all along."
— Huffington Post

"Gate combines nearly every smart home feature in a minimalistic deadbolt lock"
— 9TO5Toys

"[Gate's] problem-centric approach means — unlike some smart locks — Gate feels necessary, rather than a gadget that exists purely to give tech geeks another way to show off."
— Digital Trends

"For those of us who don’t live in a Manhattan high-rise, Gate is the ultimate safety solution. To everything."
— InsideHook

Listed as the #1 smart home security device by Elle Decor

"The Gate smart lock is a Swiss Army knife for home security"
— CNET

"Gate brings your deadbolt into the 21st century"
— The Next Web

For press inquiries please email contact@gatelabs.co.

Gate enhances your deadbolt lock capabilities. Gate will send you instant mobile notifications when it detects motion in front of your door or when somebody presses its call button. If you answer the notification and open the Gate Door App, you will be able to see, hear and speak to your visitor from your mobile device. The visitor at your door can hear you and speak back to you with Gate's built-in speaker and microphone. The device connects directly to your home's WiFi network and sends the live video to your mobile devices over WiFi and 4G cellular networks. Lock and unlock your door remotely, as well as assign temporary or permanent passcodes to your visitors. 

 

Gate features a keypad lock, 2-way audio, motion activated camera, speaker, rechargeable battery and a call button.

With Gate, you can remotely lock and unlock your door for your family, friends, travel guests, and services or create temporary or permanent access codes for easy entry. Gate is the first connected camera lock that allows you to manage your front door from anywhere, anytime.

Gate was co-founded by a team of successful engineers, who were leading projects at Sandia National Lab, Qualcomm and Google X.   

On top of Gate's full-time team, we are working with top designers, engineers, and industry experts. Our partners include the award-winning industrial design firm, Box Clever, and we are backed by Cota Capital. If you would like to work with Gate, contact us at jobs@gatelabs.co. 

Ehsan was tired of having to stay at home just to receive his packages or let service people into his house. After bringing this up with Harvey and Danial, he learned that they shared similar frustrations about this inconvenience. They were not happy with the available solutions in the market as they all required multiple components to be installed on the entryway. Ehsan, Harvey, and Danial quit their jobs at Google and Qualcomm and formed Gate to build a singular solution to their home access management problem.

With advanced academic degrees and experience in engineering and business, Gate founders applied their combined knowledge and experience towards solving this common problem.

After 2 years of prototyping, Gate teamed up with the award-winning design firm Box Clever to create a product that is not only functionally robust but beautifully designed as well.   

To strengthen communities and establish a bridge of trust and security between home service providers and homeowners in our neighborhoods. We are partnering with companies that share our vision for a secure and connected community.
 

Fall Special  — $330 ($345 Retail)

Extra Battery — $50 ($60 Retail)

Family Pack 2 Gates  — $610 ($690 Retail)

Super Early Bird 10 Pack — $2070 ($3450 Retail)

Gate Device

How is Gate different from August?

For August to have all the device functionalities of Gate, you will need to buy 4 products: The August Smart Lock, Doorbell Cam, Smart Keypad, and Connect. In total, this costs $559 at retail, compared to Gate's $179 Indiegogo Super Early Bird ($299 retail). Rather than having to set up 4 separate products, Gate is a single device that takes only 4 minutes to install. Also, being one device, Gate is more reliable in that it would not have to talk to multiple pieces of hardware via Bluetooth radio. 

How is Gate different from Ring?

Ring is a camera doorbell that does not unlock the door. Gate has all the functionalities of Ring (Motion-activated camera, 2-way audio), as well as all its added capabilities including remote lock/unlock and pin access codes. 

What is Gate's expected battery life?

1-3 months before needing a recharge. Note that the battery pack is also very easily swappable.

What if Gate runs out of battery and I am outside my home?

See next question! You will also get push notifications and text messages when your Gate has a few days left of battery so you will have more than enough time to recharge it. 

Can I still use keys?

Absolutely! Our device allows you to use both your mobile phone and your keys to lock and unlock your door. We will ship you three sets of new keys for your Gate. 

Can Gate automatically unlock for me as I approach the door?

Besides keys, codes, and the app, Gate will have auto-unlock capabilities in the future. A few other smart locks do currently have this feature, however, there has been several reports about people unlocking their doors from inside their homes which can be a safety issue. We want to make sure this is 100% reliable before rolling it out.

How does it work from the inside?

The Gate lock can be turned manually from the inside just like a regular deadbolt lock.

Manufacturing

Our tooling for the mechanical components is finished. The first parts are now coming out of the tools! We are using the parts to build additional units for reliability and user testing. 

Picture from our circuit board manufacturing facility. 

Parts are finally in the office!

Building units for reliability, stress testing and user testing.

 

Gate Verification Service for Partners

What is the Gate service verification?

Gate provides verified access to your home through your mobile phone. The Gate video lock lets you see who is at your door through a live video stream, verifies the appointment and the delivery person/home services professional, and allows you to remotely unlock the door for them with your mobile phone.

How does the verification work?

Our partners’ services are pre-set to work with the Gate lock. The Gate lock will only start recording video after a partner presses a code at your door. We perform the verification and check the appointment through our proprietary software. Video recordings of all transactions will be made available to customers.

Do I always have to be available to open the door for deliveries and home services?

You are also able to select a fully automated delivery or home access option. Gate will work with the partner to verify your delivery or home services appointment, and you will receive notifications and recorded videos upon completion.

Can I use Gate to receive packages and other deliveries into my home?

Yes, Gate enables you to see who is at your front door and remotely unlock your door through your mobile phone for whoever you choose. However, only our partners' delivery persons and orders will be verified by Gate.

Installation

 

How does the installation work?

You can install Gate on any standard deadbolt with only two screws. It should take less than 5 minutes. 

On what types of doors can I install a Gate lock?

Gate can be installed on your front door, side door, back door, garage side door — any door that uses a standard deadbolt lock. It can even be installed on some metal gates.

I'm interested in trying Gate but I have a metal gate in front of my wooden front door. What are my options?

Gate can be installed on some metal gates but is not compatible with most of them. If your metal gate is not compatible, we can install the Gate device on your front door. Our partners frequently deliver to homes with metal gates and are open to discussing workarounds ahead of time.

Do you have a warranty?
Gate has a 1-year warranty.

Misc

How much does Gate Door App cost?
For your convenience, Gate Door App is absolutely Free. 

Gate, protecting what’s inside and connecting what’s outside, securely.

Shipping Questions:

US and Worldwide shipping available. Shipping is calculated at the checkout.

Spread The Word

Even if you can't contribute, we ask for your help in raising awareness. We're grateful to you for sharing this on social media with the Indiegogo sharing tools below or emailing the page to someone you feel could benefit from Gate.


Website:  www.getgate.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/gatelabs
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gatelabs

story:
/// Bagby is ready to ship within 2-5 days after your place your order.  Don't pay attention to the dates on each perk ///

We have evolved thank to you. Come visit our new website and discover our new Branding, new Products and new Goals for 2019. 

 

A MINDFUL AND HANDMADE SLEEPING BAG SOLUTION FOR YOUR SMARTPHONE. 

CHECK OUT THE NEW COLORS!
- Improved fabrics
- Better fit
- Home decor touch
- 100% silent alarm-clock

BAGBY 2X FULL - NEW YEARS RESOLUTION PACK (Bagby Full for Singles)



BAGBY CHEVRON TURQUOISE


BAGBY CHEVRON GREY

 

BAGBY CIRCLES GREY


BAGBY VINTAGE ROSE



We are taking orders and delivery within 3-4 days in The USA and 7-15 days rest of the world. Don't worry about the individual delivery date in each perk. 

We are happy to share with you that our cell phone bag has
been featured on Bustle and RTed by Arianna Huffington

Great piece by @AyanaLage on her attempt to stop sleeping with her phone. Keep trying, Ayana — even being more aware of your phone use is progress! https://t.co/pMkQPGN1oF

— Arianna Huffington (@ariannahuff) February 22, 2018










 

In January, my wife and I decided to take our relationship to the next level. We realized that, like many other couples around the world, we were very distracted so it was difficult for us to connect with each other. I suggested a #PhoneFreeBedroomChallenge. No phones, no distractions. Soon after, we discovered the benefits this simple change in behavior could bring to people, especially couples like us, so we decided to create Bagby. Truth be told, we haven’t brought our phones back in the bedroom since. 

Bagby helped us to reconnect and be mindful as first-time parents!


 


BAGBY IS READY TO SHIP!
"We are taking orders and delivery within 3-4 days in The USA and 7-15 days rest of the world" 
Cell phone bag



 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 


 




1- Bagby is handmade in a small workshop in Argentina. It's made slowly and with love. 

Bagby is made of quality materials: 
- EXTERIOR: Although the first samples were made in "arpillera" (burlap), we decided to use "símil arpillera", a similar material to burlap that is more solid and durable. 
- INTERIOR: The inside is made of premium cotton with a very soft texture.



2- Bagby is a non-tech solution. 

Our positioning is clear, LESS technology is MORE. No apps, no fancy tech tricks.  This is our way to fight smartphone addiction. 

3- Bagby has a rustic look and fits in any home. 

Bagby is above all a cute home-decor product. You will love it! 

4- Bagby works as a great reminder for your "phone-free ritual" before you enter the bedroom or any other room. 

Bagby will be the last thing you see when entering the room and trust us, that's helps!

 

5- Bagby is the result of a primary market research to overcome the three main barriers we have to embrace a phone-free time. 


 
 


 

 
 

 
 
 

 

By the way, did you know you can find Bagby at Le Pain Quotidien coffeeshops now? We just placed the first Bagbys in the first location (13050 San Vicente Blvd #114 Los Angeles, CA 90049)

Come ! The dessert is on us! #DisconnecttoReconnect

 

Bagby was designed to hang them in your bedroom door. However, feel free to make the most out of it. Bagby is a versatile solution. You can stick it anywhere, your balcony, the bathroom, your studio, the kitchen, etc.


1- Bagby Full or Basic (The original)


We offer Bagby in 3 different colors (+ 2 Premium version ) named after our favorite baby names. We want to have many, so if we make this dream come true, we will be creating many more choices!



PERK: Bagby 1x Full
 


PERK: Bagby 2x Full


2- Bagby Living & Chilling 

 
PERK: Bagby Living and Chilling

 

PERK: Bagby Basic 2x + Bagby Living 1x



3- Bagby Social. 12 Pockets of Joy (New Release)
 

The perfect solution for a yoga studio, a retreat, a meeting room,  events or social gatherings at home. It comes with 3 removable hooks. 


 


3 Simple steps to get your right Bagby pack.  

1- Decide on the amount you want/need. Are you a single? Do you have a partner? Do you want it for the family?
 

  • Single packs (1x) = 1 Bagby
  • Couple packs (2x) = 2 Bagbys
  • Family packs (5x)= 5 Bagbys or Bagby Social
  • Special packs (20x)= 20 Bagbys 
     

2- Where are you planning to use it?

  • In the bedroom = Bagby Full or Basic 
  • In the living room (table) = Bagby Living & Chilling
  • In a yoga studio, the main door of your home, a meeting room or for events or social gatherings = Bagby Social ( 12 pockets)



3- Do you already own an alarm clock? 

We always recommend to get our alarm clock because it has a classic and rustic look, has not annoying light or ticking noises and features snooze function. However, we can understand you love yours. It's up to you. 

  • Bagby Basic: No alarm clock
  • Bagby Full: Comes with our fantastic alarm clock. 

 

 


 

 

 


We are shipping now!



Stay tuned for the release of 5 new products: 

- Bagby Living Room when reached 13K (RELEASED)
- Bagby Premium when reached 14K (RELEASED)
- Bagby "Surprise" 1 when reached 15K (RELEASED) -> Bagby Social
- Bagby "Surprise" 2 when reached 16K
- Bagby SUPER "Surprise" 3 when reached 20K

30 seconds of your time can make the difference in growing the Bagby community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who can't live without their phones!


 




 


Risks & Challenges

We are a couple with several years of experience working for large companies and setting up new businesses and projects. While we have been relentlessly concerned with the details throughout prototyping, finding the best materials and planning for production, there is always the chance that omnipresent Murphy guy may make an entrance with that law of his.

In the event that things don't go as planned, whether it's a delay in the manufacturing timeline, shipping date, or something else, we promise to communicate honestly with you and work around the clock until we correct the issue.

We are not responsible for any damages to mobile phones, such as dropped or cracked phones that may happen while putting your phone in Bagby. We ensure Bagby holds up to 2kg. It's designed to be durable and solid, but we cannot control how people put their phones inside a Bagby. Also, although we have tested many surfaces, our hook might leave some marks if your door or wall paint is too old or of low quality.

Thanks for your understanding.
