The dessert is on us! #DisconnecttoReconnect Bagby was designed to hang them in your bedroom door. However, feel free to make the most out of it. Bagby is a versatile solution. You can stick it anywhere, your balcony, the bathroom, your studio, the kitchen, etc.
1- Bagby Full or Basic (The original)We offer Bagby in 3 different colors (+ 2 Premium version ) named after our favorite baby names. We want to have many, so if we make this dream come true, we will be creating many more choices!
PERK: Bagby 1x Full
 PERK: Bagby 2x Full2- Bagby Living & Chilling  PERK: Bagby Living and Chilling PERK: Bagby Basic 2x + Bagby Living 1x
3- Bagby Social. 12 Pockets of Joy (New Release) The perfect solution for a yoga studio, a retreat, a meeting room,  events or social gatherings at home. It comes with 3 removable hooks.  
3 Simple steps to get your right Bagby pack.  1- Decide on the amount you want/need. Are you a single? Do you have a partner? Do you want it for the family? 
Single packs (1x) = 1 Bagby
Couple packs (2x) = 2 Bagbys
Family packs (5x)= 5 Bagbys or Bagby Social
Special packs (20x)= 20 Bagbys  
2- Where are you planning to use it?
In the bedroom = Bagby Full or Basic 
In the living room (table) = Bagby Living & Chilling
In a yoga studio, the main door of your home, a meeting room or for events or social gatherings = Bagby Social ( 12 pockets)

3- Do you already own an alarm clock? We always recommend to get our alarm clock because it has a classic and rustic look, has not annoying light or ticking noises and features snooze function. However, we can understand you love yours. It's up to you. 
Bagby Basic: No alarm clock
Bagby Full: Comes with our fantastic alarm clock. 
  
   We are shipping now!
Stay tuned for the release of 5 new products: - Bagby Living Room when reached 13K (RELEASED)- Bagby Premium when reached 14K (RELEASED)- Bagby "Surprise" 1 when reached 15K (RELEASED) -> Bagby Social- Bagby "Surprise" 2 when reached 16K- Bagby SUPER "Surprise" 3 when reached 20K

30 seconds of your time can make the difference in growing the Bagby community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who can't live without their phones!


 

 



Risks & Challenges
We are a couple with several years of experience working for large companies and setting up new businesses and projects. While we have been relentlessly concerned with the details throughout prototyping, finding the best materials and planning for production, there is always the chance that omnipresent Murphy guy may make an entrance with that law of his.
In the event that things don't go as planned, whether it's a delay in the manufacturing timeline, shipping date, or something else, we promise to communicate honestly with you and work around the clock until we correct the issue.
We are not responsible for any damages to mobile phones, such as dropped or cracked phones that may happen while putting your phone in Bagby. We ensure Bagby holds up to 2kg. It's designed to be durable and solid, but we cannot control how people put their phones inside a Bagby. Also, although we have tested many surfaces, our hook might leave some marks if your door or wall paint is too old or of low quality.
Thanks for your understanding.

story:
"A hand up, not a hand out."

 The Oxford House Society of Regina (OHSR) has the vision of establishing Oxford House residences in Regina sufficient to meet the community’s need for supportive, transitional housing as part of a continuum of community supports following addiction treatment. 

OHSR ensures safe, supportive and sober living environments for individuals in recovery so they will have a sense of belonging and want to be contributing members of society. 

We provide safe third stage housing and support for individuals who have recently completed an addictions treatment program; are homeless or at risk of homelessness; and, express a sincere desire to maintain their sobriety. 


Our Community Development Goals:

Promote self-reliance: 

  • Members are expected to contribute financially and morally to the wellness of their House
  • Members either work or attend an educational institution
  • Members support each other in their quest for continued sobriety
  • Members and staff do not enable

Create opportunities: 

  • We provide the stability necessary for Members to get their lives back on track
  • We give this population a second lease on life by proactively assisting them in a critical period of their recovery

We provide this (often forgotten and overlooked) hard-to-house sector of the Canadian population an opportunity to re-establish themselves as productive, useful members of society, reversing the trend of abusing public resources such as emergency, health, welfare, unemployment, policing, justice and corrections services.

What We've Accomplished So Far:

Operational since 2009 OHSR currently operates four Houses (3 leased, 1 owned). Our front line staff currently consists of two part-time employees, an outreach worker, a housing supervisor, and an executive director.  

  • Opened its doors to approximately 150 individuals
  • Average length of stay for House Members in 2014 was 6.6 months
  • Members are allowed to stay as long as they wish
  • OHSR operates at 80-85% occupancy rate

Our Goals:

We are hoping to expand our housing capacity and save lives. 

  • Acquiring our second owned residence will provide stability to the organization
  • Lay the groundwork for subsequent expansion in other cities in Saskatchewan 
  • Furnish/equip/renovate the residence
  • To fund more operational outreach costs

The Impact:

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Increase in the number of individuals who do not recidivate 
  • Increase in the number of individuals who are able to live independently without government assistance
  • Reduction in government services required by individuals leaving as Members In Good Standing - in the fields of emergency, health, welfare, policing, justice and correction.
  • For more info click here

Risks & Challenges:

Operational costs - reduction of operational costs while simultaneously increasing support for additional Members is a challenge. Currently OHSR pays $6300 monthly in lease of three Houses compared to $550/mo in mortgage and taxes for the owned House. Clearly, ownership is essential to growth and development of OHSR. 

 NIMBYism - the challenge of reducing concerns associated with expanding operations is always a priority. An understanding of our purpose and positive comfort level felt by the community members is achieved. As soon as the House is operational, concerns subside. 

One Story:  

This marginalized population can be brought from a state of self-destruction to living a useful, proud life. Here is one such story: 

"Joe" was a long distance trucker. He spent over 30 years behind the wheel of a semi, most of it inebriated. The last time he drove, he tried to outrun the RCMP. "Joe" went into Corrections for some time and then checked into a recovery centre. 

Upon completion of the course, our Outreach Worker picked him up and brought him to OHSR. His sole possessions upon entry to OHSR were contained in two plastic bags - a razor and a single change of clothes. OSHR was able to help "Joe" find work as a part-time casual custodian. He gradually gained confidence and self-respect - enough to be promoted - several times. Today - 4 years later - "Joe" is the supervisor of 40 people. He still lives at OHSR and it is his home and he feels connected, something he hasn't felt for many years. He epitomizes what OHSR is about - giving others a second chance.

Together We Are Stronger:

Support for this program and its target population will strengthen individuals and families directly involved in the process of addiction recovery. But we all gain by fewer tax dollars spent on individuals who are caught in the vicious cycle of addictions and homelessness. OHSR has built a five year track record of housing and support proving that together, we are all stronger.

For more Information head to Oxford House Society of Regina.

story:
We are now fully available and shipping - visit us at www.toddlermonitor.com

 

DECCO the Toddler Monitor is the next stage of baby monitor! 

Cute and friendly, DECCO is a motion sensor device designed to alert parents if their toddler has left their bedroom or other safe space, and is on the move. 

We were inspired to create this device when one of our kids left the house undetected in the middle of the night. We discovered there was nothing on the market to help parents monitor their toddlers after they outgrow their baby monitor.

After speaking with friends and conducting market research it became clear that there was a strong demand for a simple, reliable, and travel friendly solution to this problem. DECCO the Toddler Monitor is exactly that, and we are excited to be sharing it with you through this campaign!


 

Through our market research, we uncovered a strong interest in this type of product from parents and caregivers of children with special needs such as Autism and Down Syndrome. 

We are excited to be partnered with Changing the Face of Beauty, an organization that encourages the integration of individuals with disabilities into general advertising and the media. 


 

Download the Toddler Monitor app from the App Store or Google Play and follow the instructions. Once paired to your phone it is as easy as:  
 

DECCO the Toddler Monitor pairs via Bluetooth with an iOS or Android phone. Through the user-friendly app, you will receive alerts about detected motion, connectivity, and battery status.  


 

Toddler Monitor will enable you to enjoy the peace of mind knowing your toddler is safe in a:  

  • Bedroom
  • Home
  • Hotel
  • Cottage
  • Friend's or family member's home


 


 

Like many of you, we are inspired by our children; meet Dec and Coop! 

We invented Toddler Monitor because we needed it for our families. We worried about traveling with our kids to places with pools or lakes, leaving our kids with family members, and were constantly checking to make sure our kids were safe in their beds. Our vision is: 

We want to keep kids safe, and we know we can do this by making Toddler Monitor available to families just like us. We started this journey over a year ago and have put our hearts, souls, time and money into making Toddler Monitor a reality. 
 

 

For the last year, we have worked to complete product design, engineering and manufacturing setup with minimal funding but now we need your help to bring Toddler Monitor to life! 

Initially, we worked to create our proof of concept and show how we believed the Toddler Monitor should work.  We also talked a lot about how we wanted our product to look; we knew we wanted it to be fun and friendly, we also knew we wanted him to be durable and made of a soft material.

Our proof of concept - a real beauty...

 Once we understood our requirements, we engaged Design1st, an Ottawa based firm that supports the design process from concept through to manufacturing and commercialization. We traveled to meet them in September to kick-off the project and have been working with them ever since to understand the user experience, create DECCO and the app.  

The arrival of our 4th child, our 3D printed DECCO the Toddler Monitor...

We now have a working prototype and app, that we are continuing to refine. With your support, we will be able to fund and manufacture our first run of product and get it into the hands of families all over North America! We plan to travel to China this summer to visit the factory and see the first run of DECCOs and ensure that it meets our exact specifications.  
 

    

  

  

 

Also see our coverage on Mashable!

 

 and on CTV News!

 

We have been so thankful for the support that has brought us to this point. Thank you to all of our team members and partners!

story:
Our campaign is over but we are accepting pre-orders at MiiR.com!

THE TUMBLER
We designed this amazing insulated coffee and tea tumbler for several great reasons:
1. We are tired of paper coffee cups littering our world
2. We HATE cups with silicone lids (it's just gross)
3. We want to give the nearly one billion people without clean water access to it

**Please note we will email you about your color choice once you choose the perk




WHAT YOU GET

  • Volume: 12oz
  • Height: 6" tall
  • Fits in cup holders (YAY!)
  • 18/8 medical grade stainless steel
  • BPA-free
  • Dishwasher safe (hand wash recommended for color tumblers)

 

Each Tumbler additionally comes with a unique tracking bracelet that has an engraved identification number. Enter this identification number into our tracking system online (www.miir.com/impact), and you will be able to see what project you helped fund; complete with interactive maps, photos, and testimonials from the water project site.


THE IMPACT
There is a harsh reality that almost one billion people in the world live without access to clean, safe water. According to the World Health Organization, diseases from unsafe water and lack of basic sanitation kill more people every year than all forms of violence, including war.

Here at MiiR, we resolved to create a sustainable business model to address these alarming statistics. We’ve committed to donate one dollar of every MiiR Tumbler you purchase, which provides one person with clean drinking water for an entire year.

Here’s how it breaks down: A typical clean water project costs between $2,500-5,000 and typically serves around 500 people for 10-20 years. An example is the well we built in the Dark Forest community in Buchanan, Liberia in the winter of 2011. The well project cost $2,500 and is now serving close to 1,000 people. Follow the story here: http://community.miir.com/blog/2011/02/10/liberia-expedition-day-one/.

Help us improve the quality of life for those around the world, and reduce the 24 billion single use cups that go to landfills every year.

WHO WE ARE

At MiiR we believe in challenging the status quo by empowering you to close the gap between your wants and others' needs. Our products are catered to exhibit iconic design while maintaining the highest level of functionality. By backing our project, you also promote a model of sustainable giving with tangible purpose: For every MiiR Tumbler purchased, we donate partial proceeds to give one person access to clean water for an entire year.

WHAT WE NEED
With your help, we’ll get this great tumbler into production if we can cross $10,000. We will invest $1 of every MiiR Tumbler (5% of revenue direct, 10%+ of revenue at wholesale) purchased regardless of how much we raise.


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
Join the cause to bring clean water to where it’s needed by contributing directly to our giving partner, One Day’s Wages (www.onedayswages.org).

Share our story and mission with your own community. Connect with us here:
facebook - twitter - instagram - pinterest

FAQ

If my question isn't answered here, how do I ask?
Just email us - hello@miir.com.

When will my Tumbler be delivered?
Shipping Date: April 2013
We know you want to show off your Tumbler, so we are working hard to get them manufactured and ready to ship as soon as possible. We refuse to send you anything but the highest quality product!

What warranty is included with my MiiR Tumbler?
We have worked hard to ensure we produce the highest quality MiiR Tumbler possible. This includes the raw materials that go into the final product as well as the required craftsmanship required to create a durable, attractive and functional bottle. We offer a lifetime warranty against manufacturer defects. Normal wear and tear, including scratches and dings, are not covered under the MiiR warranty.

Is the Tumbler insulated?
Yes, the MiiR Tumbler is double-wall insulated, keeping your hot drinks hot and your cold drinks cold during the long commute.

Are the Tumblers available in retail stores?
Not yet, but hopefully soon! Check out MiiR bottles coming to your local Eddie Bauer this year.

How much of my MiiR Tumbler purchase will be donated to build water wells?
One dollar of each MiiR Tumbler you purchase provides one person with clean water for one year. The full $1 investment, all 100 pennies, will go directly to those in need. Clean water transforms lives, communities and generations -- and at a surprisingly low cost. Just $20 can provide clean water for one person for 20 years.

Where are the Tumblers manufactured?
We work with a family owned factory in China because they have been working with stainless steel for many years and can ensure quality handcrafted products that meet acceptable standards for quality, safety, fair labor, ethical business practices and environmental responsibility. We maintain a close relationship with our partners in China to ensure that all of the above standards are upheld. Our factories have passed SA8000 social audit tests, ISO 2001 & environmental standards of ISO 140000.

What is the Tumbler made of?
We started with robust, high quality 18/8 stainless steel for our Tumblers. It’s more expensive than aluminum, but is a far superior metal for drinking containers. It's safer, stronger, and doesn't absorb flavors. Your Tumbler is also BPA-free and contains no phthalates, lead or toxins. Independent labs test all products regularly; our mothers made sure. Lids are made of BPA-free polypropylene #5 plastic. And every Tumbler is 100% recyclable.

Are MiiR Tumblers dishwasher safe?
Yes. However, we recommend hand washing any of our colored bottles. With the exception of the natural stainless steel, our bottles feature a water-based paint followed by a clear protective coating, which can deteriorate when regularly exposed to high water temperatures. For best results, bathe your bottle with a long-handled bristle brush, soap and warm water.

Is there a charge for International Shipping?

Yes, there will need to be an additional charge to ship internationally. It costs $15 per tumbler to ship to international addresses.  If you buy a 4 tumbler set ($80 perk), international shipping is $25. For a 6-tumbler full-set ($120 perk, $150 perk, $2500 perk), international shipping is $40. For a 30-tumbler co branded set ($400 perk), international shipping is $80. Please include that in the checkout price.  If you forget, we'll contact you prior to shipping.

story:
Q: What are the technical requirements for using hiku?  
A: Basic requirements: An Internet connection at home with a Wi-Fi network, and an iOS or Android device.

Q: Why did you make a separate device? Can’t I scan and voice record with my mobile phone?
A: From the earliest days of hiku, we set out to make a product that was instant so it would satisfy the demands of a busy family. One that’s as fast, if not faster, than pen and paper. You simply can not do that with a mobile app alone. 

For example, hiku’s scanner is a dedicated piece of hardware that scans over 50 times per second, making scans instantaneous and ultra accurate. With a mobile app alone, every time you want to scan an item you have to find your phone, unlock it, find your app, launch it, tap add, choose scan, wait for the camera to load, focus on the barcode, and then wait for the results. With hiku you press one button and you're done, it's always handy, and anyone in the family can use it. 

Q: How do you charge it? How long does the battery last? 
A: hiku uses a standard micro-USB connection like the ones found with many popular electronics today for charging. The battery will last 2 months between charges with normal use, so you don’t have to worry about constantly recharging.    

Q: How rugged is it? Will it break if I drop it?
A: hiku was designed to live in the kitchen and be handled by kids of all ages, so we knew we had to build it tough and water resistant. To withstand falls, there are no moving parts, the electronics inside are locked in place with metal screws during assembly, and the round design minimizes force impact during a drop distributing impact across the entire surface. 

Q: How does the voice recognition work? How good is it?  
A: hiku uses industry leading voice recognition technology, like what you find in Apple’s Siri or Google’s Assistant. hiku records your voice and sends it to the cloud, where it is transcribed and the item added to your list. Since we all know voice recognition isn’t 100% perfect, hiku also saves the recording so you can play it back as an audio file right from your list if needed.  

Q: I don't shop at Walmart.com or Peapod, can I still use hiku?
Absolutely! The primary way our customers use hiku is to create shopping lists for use at any store. Scan it or say it at home, and your list is with you on your phone wherever you go.

hiku supports multiple lists, and many customers name their lists after the stores in which they shop. For instance, you might have a Trader Joe's list, Target list, Drug store list, etc.

hiku also integrates with online retailers so you can send your items straight to your online shopping basket. Today hiku is integrated with Walmart.com and Peapod for online shopping in the United States, and we will continue to add more integrated retailers. 

Don't shop at either of those retailers? No problem! Use the hiku shopping list at any store you shop.

story:
Available now. Use PayPal just click on contribute

 Utility Patent just issued. New stock on the way.

  • Tired of hard to use pet leashes?

  • Ever struggled to put your pet on his or hers leash?

  • Did the slide bolt suddenly snapback and injure your thumb or startle your pet?

  • Have you struggled in the cold with a carabineer on your backpack?

  • Did sand jam your pet leash making it impossible to open?

  • Do you have arthritus and find traditional pet leashes or carabineers hard to use?

  • Throw out your old spring snap hooks or carabineers and replace them with a MagneClip®

 

 

How it works

A powerful magnet is housed securely in the body of the hook. The moving part contains iron and is attracted to the magnet.

 

To open simply push near where the two tips meet. This is easy to do even it you can’t see the snap. The moving part quickly closes and is held in place by the magnet. The MagneClip® is strong and cannot be pulled open.

 

 

 

The MagneClip® is easy to keep open. Because the magnetic force is at a minimum when the snap hook is fully open there is just enough force to gently close it.  

If you need extra time to find the D ring on your dogs collar it won’t strain your hands and it won’t leave painful dimples in your thumb.

Leash and collar designs

We currently are concerntrating on 5 designs. We will add more later in the year.

 

 

Our first shipment just arrived in the US. We have a small amount of medium leashes available to the first few sponsors.

 

Why we need your help

We need to place a large order so we have stock on hand to sell to retailers. Our lead time with shipping can be up to 3 months. Retailers don't want to wait for stock to arrive, they are in business to sell and will drop unreliable vendors.

Stocking thousands of products in a warehouse costs money. Everytime we add a design or new product we have to buy stock.

We are going to print our new design hang tags for retail stores. We have a minimum order to the printers and we will store them at the factory to speed up delivery times.

We want to make a larger MagneClip® Ease so that the very largest therapy dogs can use them. The larger size will be used for 1" leashes and will be just as easy to use for disabled people.

We are about to launch another product. It is still being developed but tooling costs will be around $3,000. The utility patents have already been filed in the USA but more countries need to be added as cash flow improves.

I like to help but don't need a MagneClip®

Please help us by passing on this link to all your friends. Email it or post in on your facebook page.

Drop into your nearest DIY or pet supply store and ask for products that have MagneClips on them. 

FAQs

Q How strong are they?

A The small MagneClip® can hold around 250 lbs. For dogs that means up to 35 lb dog.

The medium holds 570 lbs. for dogs that means 80 lbs.

Q Any dangers of using magnets.

A Magnets should not be swallowed. They will be attracted to each other and get stuck in the intestines. So please don't let children play with them.

Q Is the MagneClip® Ease good for all dogs?

A The MagneClip® Ease is designed to be easy to use. It is very good for anyone that has problems with movement with their hands and thumbs. They are perfect for guide dogs, seeing eye dogs or therapy animals. They are not recommended for young rambunctious, or any dogs that are nervous in traffic or easily lunges at other animals.

Q Aything else I should be concerned about

A Please don't use these for rock climbing. Specilzed carabineers are the only equiptment you should use.

Q What is your next product? 

A Our next product is MagneClip® Secure. This is a development of our current Ease model and will be recommneded for young dogs that need extra security. They will be stronger and will not open as easily. They have a locking feature.

Q Will I be able to buy on line or at a retail store.

A We hope so. With your support we will be in both retail and on line stores soon. Please ask for us by name.

 

The Creator

Lucy, the inventor of the MagneClip® was an airline pilot working for a major US Airline in 2000. After 9/11 she lost her job and started to sell real estate in Florida. She returned to work as an airline pilot in 2007 only to be laid off again in the economic down turn in 2009.

While at a Trade Show in May 2010 she was talking to a vendor about his pet leashes, and broke her thumbnail when the snap hook snapped closed. The vendor told her all the pet snap hooks did that and they had been looking for an alternative for sometime.

Thinking 'there has got to be a better way' she saw the problem was the spring. They have little or no force when the snap hook is closed so it can rattle loose. But as you open them they become increasingly harder to open.

She thought the force should be the opposite way around. Exerting the maximum power then they are closed and the least when they are open. This would stop the snap back injuries and make it easy to keep open.

A magnet was the obvious choice. It keeps it strength for life and sand won’t get caught in it to jam the mechanism.

story:
We set out to design a better home security system than anything out there...

We wanted it to do three things that you can't get in a security system for your family and home today. 

  1. We wanted the system to provide complete security.
  2. We wanted it to be dead simple to install and operate. 
  3. And we wanted it to be very affordable. 


 

When it comes to personal security, every one of us has our own view about what we need in a home security system…

  • Whether it is a simple way to view surveillance video from your living room, foyer, front door or backyard, on any device. Anytime.  From anywhere. 
  • Whether you want to be notified through a text, an image, or to view live video from your house.
  • Do you want to be able to check in on an empty house, your pets, your kids arriving home from school, the babysitter watching your child? 

So… what exactly is Sandbox? 

Sandbox's engineers have created a far-reaching, next generation system for home security.

Sandbox makes use of unlimited wireless connectivity, extensive sensors, and HD video. These capabilities are integrated into a system that is compact and beautiful.

Sandbox is well suited for a whole lot of situations – not just homes... 

Some examples include: 
  • Single people, the elderly, in homes, apartments, town homes, condos, rental homes, and high rises
  • Families with young children, and active families

 

And institutions or organizations that can benefit from the intelligent, end-to-end, affordable security that Sandbox enables:

  • Elementary, middle and high schools
  • Child care centers
  • Places of worship
  • Shelters
  • Community centers
  • Small offices and businesses


We've packed more processing power, wireless options and bandwidth, sensors, analytics and intelligence into the Sandbox system than what is out there in the market today. And we've done so while significantly lowering the cost of the equipment, and the 24/7 monitoring service. The savings on a family's home insurance premium from installing the Sandbox system will pay for the system's cost in a few months. 

Your support is very valuable to us. Thank you.
